description.hltext_display: � 内亚新总统宣誓要成为“曼德拉”
유병수, "감독님 스타일 맞추기 위해 노력했다"
description.content: [OSEN=서귀포, 우충원 기자] "감독님 스타일 맞추기 위해 노� �했다".조광래 감독이 이끄는 축구 국가대표팀이 22일 � �주 서귀포 월드컵경기장에서 자체 청백� �을 통해 아시안컵을 위한 국내 훈� �을 사실상 마무리했다.이� 자체 청백� �에서 골 맛을 본 � 병수(인천)은 아시안컵 대표에 대한 욕심을 나타냈다. 몸 상태도 완벽하게 끌어 올리� 있는 상황이기 때문에 더욱 좋다는 것.� 병수는 훈� �을 마친 후 가진 인터뷰서 "� �체� �으로 몸이 무거� 지만 시간이 지나면서 좋아졌다"면서 "골을 넣기 위해 노� �했다. 경쟁� � 있는 모습을 통해 기회를 잡기 위해 노� �했가"� 소감을 밝혔다.올 시즌 K리그 득� �왕에 오른 � 병수는 "몸 상태도 거의 완벽하게 끌어 올리� 있다"면서 "만약 아시안컵에 나서게 된다면 최상의 몸상태가 되어 나갈 수 있다. 더욱 잘 � 수 있는 기회가 � 것"이라� 강조했다.한편 � 병수는 "누가 아시안컵에 나가게 � 지 아무도 모르는 상황이다"라며 "어쨌� 열심히 노� �했다. 기회를 잡게 � 지 모르� 지만 감독님께서 원하는 축구를 하기 위해 노� �했가"� � �했다.10bird@osen.co.kr[Copyright ⓒ 한국 최� 의 스포� 엔터테인먼트 � �문 미디어 OSEN(www.osen.co.kr) � �보및 보도자료 osenstar@osen.co.kr 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: India prueba cohete con capacidad para ojiva nuclear
description.content:
hace 31 mins
India realizó con éxito el miércoles una prueba de un cohete de corto alcance con capacidad para ojiva nuclear que cubrió una distancia de 350 kilómetros (220 millas), dijo un funcionario. Seguir leyendo el arículo
El ejército disparó dos cohetes tierra-tierra del modelo Prithvi II desde Chandipur en el estado oriental de Orissa, informó S.P. Dash, funcionario de alto rango en la plataforma de lanzamiento. "La prueba fue un éxito", dijo Dash a The Associated Press.
El cohete, que sería usado principalmente para atacar instalaciones militares, puede llevar una ojiva de hasta 500 kilogramos (1.100 libras), destacó Dash.
El artefacto ya ha sido usado más de media docena de veces. Sin embargo, una prueba del mismo cohete falló hace tres meses debido a problemas técnicos.
La India y su antigua rival Pakistán con frecuencia realizan con frecuencia pruebas de lanzamiento de cohetes, y por lo general se comunican mutuamente con anticipación a los lanzamientos.
Nueva Delhi ha señalado que su actual serie de cohetes, entre ellos el Prithvi de corto alcance, el antitanque Nag y el supersónico BrahMos _ constituyen elementos de disuasión contra sus vecinos como China y Pakistán.
El cohete Agni-II de la India, con una capacidad de hasta 2.000 kilómetros (1.250 millas) de alcance, puede poner distancias del sur de China dentro de un área de ataque. Y el Agni-III, que fue probado con éxito el año pasado, puede portar ojivas nucleares a través de Asia y el Medio Oriente.

description.hltext_display: 조광래 감독 "손흥민 아시안컵 데� �가� 다"
description.content:
[서귀포(제주)=CBS 체육부 박지은 기자]
점검은 끝났다. 독일 분데스리가에서 돌풍을 일으키고 있는 '슈퍼 신인' 손흥민(18, 함부르크)이 조광래호에서 훈련한 시간은 이틀. 23일 오전 한 차례의 개인훈련만을 남겨둔 가운데 조광래 감독은 22일 제주월드컵경기장에서 실시한 자체 연습경기를 통해 손흥민에 대한 평가를 마쳤다. 결론은 합격점이다.
이날 손흥민은 전반에 오른쪽 측면 공격수로, 후반에 왼쪽 측면 공격수로 뛰었다. 골은 넣지 못했지만 감각적인 움직임으로 조광래 감독의 시선을 붙잡는데 성공했다. 조 감독은 경기 후 인터뷰에서 "오늘 플레이 봐서는 아시안컵에 기용할 가능성이 상당히 높다"면서 "코치들과 의논해야 겠지만 기대보다 좋은 플레이를 했다"며 만족감을 표했다.
이어 조 감독은 "공격적인 측면에서 상당히 날카롭다"면서 "해외파들이 가세해 빠른 패스가 이뤄지면 날카로운 공격 장면들을 만들 수 있을 것이다. 아시안컵에 기용했으면 한다"며 손흥민의 아시안컵 합류를 기정 사실화했다.
◇손흥민, 조광래 감독에게 매력적이었던 이유
손흥민은 만 18살이다. 아시안컵 예비엔트리 47명 가운데 가장 어리다. 경험도 적다. 이제 겨우 분데스리가에서 7경기를 뛰었을 뿐이다. 아직은 '즉시전력감'으로 확신할 수 없는 손흥민이었다. 그럼에도 불구하고 조광래 감독이 일정 맞추기도 쉽지 않았던 손흥민을 제주로 불러들인 이유는 손흥민의 공격 스타일에 있다.
조 감독은 손흥민의 공격스타일에 대해 "대담하고 과감하다"고 표현하고 있다. "우리 공격수들은 너무 안전한 움직임을 하는 것이 문제"라는 조 감독은 슈팅 사전거리에 들어섰을 때 슈팅을 생각하기보다 패스할 곳을 찾는 소극적인 공격수들과는 달리 "틈만 나면 (슈팅)때릴 생각을 하는" 손흥민의 플레이 스타일에 큰 점수를 주고 있다. 또한 빠른 템포의 분데스리가에서 90분 풀타임 무리없이 소화해낸다는 점도 '빠른 템포의 경기 운영'에 포커스를 맞추고 있는 조광래 감독의 코드와 맞아 떨어지고 있다. 조 감독은 이런 손홍민을 "파닥파닥하다"며 그의 역동성을 흡족해 했다.
이 같은 손흥민의 모습에 조광래 감독은 일찌감치 손흥민을 직접 불러 보고 싶은 욕심을 감추지 않았다. 그러나 소속팀 일정으로 인해 손흥민은 21일에야 팀훈련에 참가했고 이틀간 조광래 감독 앞에서 부지런히 뛰어다녔다.
조광래 감독은 21일 훈련을 마친 뒤 "컨디션 회복도 안된 상황에서 무슨 말을 하겠냐. 내일 오후 연습경기를 해봐야 할 것 같다"며 손흥민에 대한 평가를 유보하면서도 "생각보다 볼 다루는 감각이 있다"며 미소를 지었다. 22일 연습경기에 나선 손흥민은 기대하던 골은 넣지 못했지만 좌우를 가리지 않는 부지런한 움직임, 그리고 감각적인 볼 트래핑 능력, 적절한 패스 타이밍을 보여주는데 성공하며 결국 조 감독의 마음을 사로잡았다.
nocutsports@cbs.co.kr
[관련기사]
(대한민국 중심언론 CBS 뉴스FM98.1 / 음악FM93.9 / TV CH 412)
< 저작권자 ⓒ CBS 노컷뉴스( www.nocutnews.co.kr ) 무단전재 및 재배포 금지 >

description.hltext_display: Quince represores de la dictadura argentina, condenados a prisión perpetua
description.content:
hace 26 mins
Quince represores de la última dictadura argentina (1976/83) fueron condenados el martes a penas de reclusión perpetua por crímenes de lesa humanidad en centros clandestinos de detención de la ciudad balnearia de Mar del Plata y Buenos Aires, informó una fuente judicial. Seguir leyendo el arículo
"El ex militar (del Ejército terrestre) Alfredo Manuel Arrillaga y los ex marinos Justo Ignacio Ortiz y Roberto Luis Pertusio fueron encontrados responsables por crímenes de lesa humanidad cometidos en la base naval" de Mar del Plata (400 kilómetros al sur), informó el Centro de Información Judicial (CIJ).
Los ex uniformados fueron sentenciados por violaciones a los derechos humanos contra nueve opositores en el centro de exterminio, que funcionó en la base naval de esa ciudad atlántica, el principal destino turístico argentino.
El Tribunal Oral Federal de Mar del Plata imputó a los tres por "privación ilegal de la libertad doblemente agravada e imposición de tormentos agravada".
En tanto, el Tribunal Oral Federal de Buenos Aires condenó a prisión perpetua a ocho ex policías, un ex agente penitenciario, un ex capitán del Ejército y dos gendarmes (policía militarizada) que actuaron en tres centros clandestinos de detención de la capital argentina.
Los imputados, entre ellos Julio Simón (alias 'El turco Julián') y Samuel Miara, fueron hallados culpables de más de un centenar de secuestros y asesinatos en los centros clandestinos de detención El Banco, Club Atlético y El Olimpo.
El tribunal también condenó a 25 años de cárcel a Raúl Antonio Guglielminetti (ex agente civil de inteligencia del Ejército), Carlos Alberto Roque Tepedino (jefe del Batallón de Inteligencia 601), Ricardo Taddei (principal de la Policía Federal) y Mario Alberto Gómez Arenas (segundo jefe de la Central de Reunión del Batallón de Inteligencia 601).
Los 19 condenados se suman a los 131 represores que recibieron sentencias por crímenes de lesa humanidad en la dictadura, según un informe del Centro de Información Judicial del 9 de noviembre.
La mayoría de las condenas corresponden a juicios realizados tras la anulación en 2003 de las leyes de amnistía (1986 y 1987) y la reapertura de las causas.
Decenas de juicios orales están en marcha en Argentina por crímenes de lesa humanidad, incluido uno contra el ex dictador Jorge Videla, cuya sentencia se difundirá este miércoles.
Videla asumió "con plenitud" la responsabilidad por los crímenes políticos cometidos durante el régimen cívico-militar (1976-83), en su descargo final el martes en un juicio por el fusilamiento de 31 presos políticos en Córdoba (centro). "Asumo con plenitud mis responsabilidades. Mis subordinados se limitaron a cumplir órdenes", sostuvo ante el tribunal de Córdoba un día antes de conocerse la sentencia en el juicio oral en el que está acusado junto a otros 29 represores, entre militares y policías.
En su intervención, que leyó pausadamente durante 49 minutos, el ex dictador, de 85 años, dijo que asumirá "bajo protesta, la injusta condena que se me pueda dar" y se definió como "un preso político".
La fiscalía pidió en noviembre la pena de reclusión perpetua para Videla, quien el 24 de marzo de 1976 comandó el golpe cívico-militar que instauró una feroz dictadura que dejó 30.000 desaparecidos, según entidades humanitarias.
En el juicio oral, que se inició hace cinco meses y concluirá este miércoles, se reunieron pruebas suficientes "para decir que (Videla) fue el máximo responsable de la elaboración de este plan de eliminación de opositores que tuvo la dictadura militar", había dicho el fiscal Maximiliano Hairabedian ante el tribunal.
"Reclamo el honor de la victoria y lamento las secuelas. Valoro a quienes con auténtico dolor lloran a sus seres queridos y deploro que se utilicen los derechos humanos con fines políticos", sostuvo el martes Videla, al pronunciar sus palabras finales en la sala, donde estaban varios de sus familiares.
En otro sector, los familiares de las víctimas, acompañados por el Premio Nobel de la Paz (1980) Adolfo Pérez Esquivel escuchaban el testimonio de Videla con gestos de desaprobación pero sin que se registraran incidentes. El juicio "es un avance importantísimo en el derecho de verdad y justicia, donde un Poder Judicial y la decisión política de avanzar, va a establecer quiénes son los responsables de estos crímenes contra el pueblo y que esto no vuelva a ocurrir", dijo Pérez Esquivel a la AFP previo al inicio de la audiencia. El Premio Nobel sostuvo que Argentina "es uno de los pocos países que está avanzando" en dilucidar en juicios los crímenes de lesa humanidad.
En su discurso final, Videla apuntó contra el gobierno de la presidenta Cristina Kirchner, al señalar que "los enemigos de ayer no necesitan ya de la violencia para acceder al poder, porque ya están en el poder, y desde él intentan la instauración de un régimen marxista a la manera de (Antonio) Gramsci" (téorico marxista italiano).
Videla, como jefe de la dictadura (1976-81), y Luciano Menéndez, 83 años, como ex jefe castrense con jurisdicción en 11 provincias, son en el juicio los dos mayores jerarcas acusados junto a policías y otros militares por el asesinato de 31 presos políticos en una cárcel de Córdoba (700 kilómetros al norte).
El ex dictador había sido condenado a prisión perpetua en un juicio contra los comandantes militares en 1985, pero fue indultado años más tarde por el entonces presidente Carlos Menem (1989-99). El perdón fue anulado por la Corte Suprema en 2007 y Videla sumó desde entonces varias causas por delitos de lesa humanidad en la dictadura.

description.hltext_display: 英国俄罗斯互逐外交官
description.content:
来源：解放牛网 新闻晚报
【收藏】[0]
【评论0 查看】 【我要评论】 【发起话题】
英国政府21日说，已经驱逐一名俄罗斯驻英使馆外交官。俄罗斯随后驱逐一名英国驻俄使馆外交官作为回应。
英国外交大臣威廉·黑格21日说，本月10日，英国已经要求俄罗斯驻英使馆撤回一名工作人员。因为有“明确证据”显示，俄罗斯情报机构从事针对英国利益的活动。
英国方面说，俄罗斯16日驱逐一名英国驻俄使馆外交官。
美联社21日援引英国一份部长级书面声明报道，两国两名外交官已遭驱逐。美联社记者联系俄罗斯方面时，俄方外交部和克里姆林宫拒绝置评。
英国《星期日泰晤士报》先前报道，英国指控一名议会下院议员的俄罗斯籍女助理卡蒂娅·扎图利韦特是俄方间谍。俄方抨击英方对扎图利韦特案的处理方式。

description.hltext_display: 太敏感就必作“冤死鬼”！
description.content:
手机免费访问 www.cnfol.com 2010年12月22日 15:57 中金博客 周本泉
查看评论
午后受“李小眼”军演的消息，中国股市又在作“过激反应”！人家韩国股市照涨不误；同样是中国人，港股就在稳健上扬！哈哈，“大国国民”就连最起码的常识都忘掉了――别说打不起来，就算它们干个头破血流，炮弹也不会落到中国来；就算它们干个头破血流，中国目前也不会去买“战争的账”；就算它们干个头破血流，岂不是更好？粮油、医药、资源、军火就是“奇货可居”！
“李小眼”今天开始的军演，听起来是挑衅，实际属于“防卫性质”――因为20日“草草军演”之后 ，金胖子在西海岸增加了大炮，“李小眼”它怕了……周博的预判是：1、两个孩子闹事，家长说了算――李小眼的家长是美国，美国意在搅局、不在战事；2、金胖子的家长是中俄，心思也不在战事；3、至多“相互打几炮”，大家看看热闹也就罢了……
而周博倒是要给惊慌失措的“你”提个醒――不要太敏感！“成人”就该有个“成熟的主见”！要么，这次朝韩无战事，而你又做了无谓的牺牲品！

description.hltext_display: El Senado de EUU cierra el debate sobre la ratificación del tratado START
description.content:
hace 15 mins
El Senado estadounidense aprobó el cierre del debate sobre la ratificación del tratado de desarme nuclear START, abriendo el camino a la votación final, prevista para este miércoles. Seguir leyendo el arículo
Foto y Vídeo relacionado
Noticias relacionadas
Los legisladores aprobaron por 67 votos contra 28 la moción que le permitió poner fin a siete días de intensos debates en el Senado.
"Este tratado hará más seguro a Estados Unidos y restaurará nuestro liderazgo en materia de esfuerzos mundiales para parar la proliferación nuclear", estimó el jefe de la mayoría demócrata del Senado, Harry Reid, en un comunicado.
Los demócratas esperan ahora un voto final en las próximas horas, probablemente este miércoles.
El tratado fue firmado en abril pasado por el presidente estadounidense, Barack Obama, y su par ruso, Dimitri Medvedev.
El senador demócrata John Kerry, presidente de la comisión de Asuntos Exteriores, que llevó los debates al Senado, estimó poco después del voto, en una rueda de prensa, que "finalmente, el Senado en su sabiduría ratifica este tratado, es una victoria para el país".
Los demócratas controlan actualmente 58 escaños de 100 en el Senado estadounidense. Hacen falta otros nueve votos para alcanzar los 67 (dos tercios) necesarios para la ratificación.

description.hltext_display: ANALYSE-FLASH: Berenberg Bank belässt Bayer auf 'Buy' - Ziel 68 Euro
description.content:
HAMBURG (dpa-AFX Broker) - Die Berenberg Bank hat Bayer nach
Studienergebnissen für das Augenheilmittel VEGF Trap-Eye auf "Buy" mit einem
Kursziel von 68,00 Euro belassen. Während die Effizienz mit dem
Konkurrenzmedikament Lucentis von Novartis vergleichbar
sei, lasse VEGF Trap-Eye sich viel bequemer dosieren, schrieb Analyst Alistair
Campbell in einer Studie vom Dienstag. Das Mittel aus dem Hause Bayer müsse nur
alle zwei Monate direkt injiziert werden, Lucentis hingegen monatlich. Er rechne
nun mit einem Spitzenumsatz des Medikaments von 750 Millionen Euro./msx/ajx/la
-----------------------

description.hltext_display: 박찬호의 61번으로 본 등번호에 대한 � 수들의 ‘집념’
description.content: 박찬호(37)는 21일 오릭스 입단 기자회견에서 61번이 새겨진 유니폼을 입고 팬들 앞에 섰다. 박찬호에게 61번은 또 다른 박찬호다. 박찬호는 메이저리그 7개 팀을 옮겨 다니는 동안 줄곧 61번을 고집했고, 오릭스에서도 61번을 받았다. 공주고 시절부터 16번을 달았던 박찬호는 다저스 입단 후 차마 코치의 번호를 뺏을 수 없어 16번을 뒤집은 61번을 택했다. 박찬호뿐 아니라 선수들에게 등번호는 상징이자 분신이다. 선동열은 18번, 장종훈은 35번, 이종범은 7번, 양준혁은 10번의 대명사다. 선동열 장종훈 양준혁의 번호는 영구결번이 됐다. ▲이승엽은 27→36→33→25→3 이승엽은 1995년 삼성에 입단할 때 36번을 달았다. 경북고 시절에는 27번이었지만 마땅한 번호가 없어서 36번을 골랐다. 이후 이승엽은 지바 롯데 소속이던 2005년까지 11년간 36번을 유지했다. 그러다 요미우리 첫해였던 2006년 33번으로 바꿨다. 33번은 요미우리의 간판선수였던 나가시마 시게오 전 감독의 번호다. 이승엽은 그러나 이듬해 25번으로 바꿨다. "같은 숫자는 이상하게 싫다"는 게 이유였다. 이승엽은 2006년 월드베이스볼클래식(WBC) 때도 25번을 달았다. 25번은 배리 본즈(전 샌프란시스코)의 상징이다. 내년부터 오릭스에서 뛰는 이승엽은 새 출발을 다짐하는 의미에서 3번을 골랐다. ▲번호도 계약조건 메이저리그 명포수 게리 카터는 계약할 때 8번을 달라고 요구했다. 자신의 생일이 8일이기 때문이었다. 돈 머니도 현역 16년 중 11년 동안 7번만 달았다. 역시 생일과 관련이 있다. 프로야구 역대 신인 최고몸값의 주인공 한기주(KIA)도 구단에 10번을 달라고 했다. 한기주는 광주 동성고 시절부터 10번을 애지중지했다. 한기주는 선배 한규식의 양보로 10번을 물려받았다. ▲지켜주지 못해서 미안해 삼성에서 김시진은 29번, 장효조는 10번이었다. 그러나 1988년 11월 롯데로 이적하면서 분신을 잃었다. 롯데에서는 에이스 윤학길이 29번, '자갈치' 김민호가 10번의 주인이었다. 하는 수 없이 김시진은 28번, 장효조는 20번을 택했다. 김시진 넥센 감독은 "대구상고 때부터 29번이었다. 롯데에서는 28번을 달아야 했지만 29번에 대한 아쉬움은 많았다"고 말했다. 한국아이닷컴 인기기사 ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ 최경호기자 squeeze@sphk.co.kr [ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: ANALYSE-FLASH: Independent Research hebt Ziel für BP auf 500 Pence - 'Halten'
description.content:
FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX Broker) - Independent Research hat das Kursziel für BP
jedoch auf "Halten" belassen. Die deutliche Erholung des Ölpreises werde die
Gewinn- und Cashflow-Generierung des Ölkonzerns unterstützen, schrieb Analyst
Sven Diermeier in einer Studie vom Dienstag. Dies werde wiederum die Bewältigung
der finanziellen Belastungen durch die Ölpest im Golf von Mexiko erleichtern. Er
geht zudem unverändert davon aus, dass BP die Dividendenzahlung für das vierte
Quartal 2010 wieder aufnehmen wird./mbx/ajx/la
-----------------------
dpa-AFX Broker - die Trader News von dpa-AFX

description.hltext_display: Lawyer: Delco man who was engaged to girl, 14, misportrayed by media
description.author: WILLIAM BENDER
description.content:
Robert Nickson Jr., the 28-year-old Delaware County man who made national headlines in September by announcing on Facebook that he was engaged to a 14-year-old girl, has been misportrayed in the news media, his lawyer said yesterday.
Nickson, of Lower Chichester, was not the "aggressor" in the forbidden romance, defense attorney Enrique Latoison said. "This wasn't a predator-type situation," Latoison said. Nickson, who has pleaded guilty to statutory sexual assault and corruption of a minor, was arrested in September after he took the teenage girl to a mall and bought her an engagement ring, police said.
Detectives got word of the wedding plans through Delaware County Children and Youth Services, which was tipped off by Facebook postings listing the couple as "in love" and "engaged." Latoison, however, said his client, who was quietly sentenced Nov. 30 to six months in prison followed by probation, had not pursued the girl. "You naturally assume a 27-year-old is trying to exploit a young girl. Once all the facts came out, it was not that situation," he said, referring to Nickson's age when he was arrested. "She was the aggressor, let's put it that way. He was not." Latoison, who described Nickson as "having the maturity of an 18-year-old," said the girl is still trying to contact his client. "She hung out with older people and was around those people," Latoison said. Police say Nickson met the girl, who has not been identified because of her age, through a mutual friend about a month before his arrest. The juvenile told investigators that she had sex with him on at least four occasions at the Lower Chichester apartment that he shares with his father, according to the criminal complaint.
Latoison admitted that his client broke the law because of the victim's age, but said he's not a child predator. Prosecutors dropped charges of aggravated indecent assault and related offenses. "He was just stupid," Latoison said, "and made a very immature decision."

event_or_fact.property: You naturally assume a 27-year-old is trying to exploit a young girl.; Once all the facts came out, it was not that situation
his client broke the law because of the victim's age, but said he's not a child predator.
She hung out with older people and was around those people

description.hltext_display: AOL宣布收购个人档案网站About.me
description.content:
北京时间12月21日消息，据国外媒体报道，美国在线(AOL)宣布已收购个人档案网站About.me，并将这家新创公司并入到由AOL高管布拉德·加林豪斯(Brad Garlinghouse)领导的消费者应用部门。收购金额未披露，但预计在数千万美元。
About.me是在9月才开始短暂测试，目前已有40万人注册。尽管该服务很简单，但还是有一些引人注目的东西。该公司联合创始人和CEO托尼·康拉德(Tony Conrad)也将他的另一家公司Sphere卖给了AOL。康拉德还是Oddpost的投资者，后者在本世纪初被加林豪斯收购，用于加强雅虎电邮。
AOL真正关心的似乎是About.me的团队，并寻求将该服务集成到他们的电子邮件和即时信息产品中。这对另两位联合创始人蒂姆·杨(Tim Young)和瑞安·弗雷塔斯(Ryan Freitas)等员工和投资者来说是一次大胜利。About.me刚从包括AOL Ventures和True Ventures等风投公司融资42.5万美元。
这对About.me的竞争对手flavors.me也是最佳消息，因为其也有类似的产品。其他买主可能会在短期内关注他们。

description.hltext_display: Transfer station plans move along in Haddam
description.content:
HADDAM — The way has been cleared for the town to move forward to develop a new transfer station.
First Selectman Paul J. DeStefano said the town has won approval to develop the Baumgartner property, which the town owns, and which adjoins the site of the present transfer station.
DeStefano is scheduled to meet with the Board of Finance this evening during a special session to lay out the schedule and outline the projected costs for developing of the new site.
With luck, DeStefano said Tuesday, the town could begin creating a new site by next summer.
Approval for development of the new site ends a three-decade long battle with the state over the transfer station issue.
The present site sits between a currently unused rail line and the Haddam Meadows State Park.
The state has pressuring the town to close the transfer station and move it so that the station will no longer impinge on the parkland.
However, finding a new site has been a vexing matter for successive town administrations.
In this year alone, DeStefano tried to gain approval for two sites in town, one located off Route 81, the other just a mile north of the present site on Route 154.
In both cases, the opposition of residents squashed both those efforts. Continued...
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
The issue was becoming increasingly fraught; the state had set a deadline of Dec. 31 to resolve the issue.
DeStefano has said residents overwhelmingly want to keep a transfer station in town. But absent a new location, it looked as if the town might have to shift to a town-wide trash collection policy instead.
But, DeStefano said, thanks to the efforts of town and state officials, various individuals and groups of concerned citizens – as well as the Valley Railroad – the town was able to convince the state to let them develop the Baumgartner property.
DeStefano said Tuesday he was heartened by the way in which residents banded together to deal with the problem.
Several residents with current or past links to state government applied pressure in an effort to sway the state. So, too, did State Sen. Eileen Daily and State Rep. Jamie Spallone.
The Valley Railroad’s board of directors supplied key support as well to the effort, DeStefano said.
The state has said it wants to revive the rail line to enable it to carry freight service north towards Middletown and beyond.
In light of that, the state Department of Transportation was demanding the town spend as much as $1 million to create a grade-level crossing.
But during face-to-face discussions with DOT officials earlier this month, DeStefano was able to convince the DOT to waive that requirement.
That decision proved key in resolving the issue, he said. Continued...
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
In a message to residents that has been posted on the town’s web site, DeStefano said, “Now, the door is open and the schedule to construct the new station is doable.”
He has scheduled a town meeting for Jan. 5 to discuss the issue in depth.
Jeff Mill can be reached via e-mail at jmill@middletownpress.com.
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
Reader Comments »
View reader comments (0) » Comment on this story »
HADDAM — The way has been cleared for the town to move forward to develop a new transfer station.
First Selectman Paul J. DeStefano said the town has won approval to develop the Baumgartner property, which the town owns, and which adjoins the site of the present transfer station.
DeStefano is scheduled to meet with the Board of Finance this evening during a special session to lay out the schedule and outline the projected costs for developing of the new site.
With luck, DeStefano said Tuesday, the town could begin creating a new site by next summer.
Approval for development of the new site ends a three-decade long battle with the state over the transfer station issue.
The present site sits between a currently unused rail line and the Haddam Meadows State Park.
The state has pressuring the town to close the transfer station and move it so that the station will no longer impinge on the parkland.
However, finding a new site has been a vexing matter for successive town administrations.
In this year alone, DeStefano tried to gain approval for two sites in town, one located off Route 81, the other just a mile north of the present site on Route 154.
In both cases, the opposition of residents squashed both those efforts.
The issue was becoming increasingly fraught; the state had set a deadline of Dec. 31 to resolve the issue.
DeStefano has said residents overwhelmingly want to keep a transfer station in town. But absent a new location, it looked as if the town might have to shift to a town-wide trash collection policy instead.
But, DeStefano said, thanks to the efforts of town and state officials, various individuals and groups of concerned citizens – as well as the Valley Railroad – the town was able to convince the state to let them develop the Baumgartner property.
DeStefano said Tuesday he was heartened by the way in which residents banded together to deal with the problem.
Several residents with current or past links to state government applied pressure in an effort to sway the state. So, too, did State Sen. Eileen Daily and State Rep. Jamie Spallone.
The Valley Railroad’s board of directors supplied key support as well to the effort, DeStefano said.
The state has said it wants to revive the rail line to enable it to carry freight service north towards Middletown and beyond.
In light of that, the state Department of Transportation was demanding the town spend as much as $1 million to create a grade-level crossing.
But during face-to-face discussions with DOT officials earlier this month, DeStefano was able to convince the DOT to waive that requirement.
That decision proved key in resolving the issue, he said.
In a message to residents that has been posted on the town’s web site, DeStefano said, “Now, the door is open and the schedule to construct the new station is doable.”
He has scheduled a town meeting for Jan. 5 to discuss the issue in depth.
Jeff Mill can be reached via e-mail at jmill@middletownpress.com.

description.hltext_display: ANALYSE-FLASH: M.M.Warburg senkt Aurubis auf 'Hold' - Ziel hoch auf 41,5 Euro
description.content:
HAMBURG (dpa-AFX Broker) - M.M.Warburg hat Aurubis nach Zahlen zum
vierten Geschäftsquartal 2009/10 von "Buy" auf "Hold" abgestuft, das Kursziel
aber von 41,00 auf 41,50 Euro angehoben. Die Ergebnisse des Kupferproduzenten
hätten in erster Linie wegen positiver Metallpreis-Wertberichtigungen die
Erwartungen übertroffen, schrieb Analyst Eggert Kuls in einer am Montag
vorgelegten Studie. Aber auch die operative Entwicklung sei besser verlaufen als
erwartet. Kuls hob seine Gewinnschätzungen an. Da das Kursniveau mittlerweile
ungefähr dem Ziel entspreche, laute sein Votum allerdings nur noch
"Hold"./msx/ajx/la
-----------------------
dpa-AFX Broker - die Trader News von dpa-AFX

description.hltext_display: 罗马一地铁站发现疑似炸弹
Parlament in Athen stimmt über Sparhaushalt ab
description.content:
ATHEN (dpa-AFX) - Im griechischen Parlament geht die Debatte über den
umstrittenen Sparhaushalt in die letzte Runde. Nach fünf Tagen hitziger
Kontroversen soll am Donnerstagmorgen unmittelbar nach Mitternacht die
Abstimmung über den Haushalt 2011 beginnen. Das neue Budget sieht massive
Sparmaßnahmen und Mehrbelastungen für die Bürger vor. Damit will die
sozialistische Regierung über sechs Milliarden Euro zusätzlich aufbringen. Das
Defizit soll dadurch auf 7,4 Prozent gedrückt werden. 2009 waren es nach
EU-Angaben noch 15,4 Prozent.
Die regierenden Sozialisten von Ministerpräsident Giorgos Papandreou
verfügen über eine Mehrheit von 156 Abgeordneten im 300-köpfigen griechischen
Parlament.
Aus Protest gegen die harten Sparmaßnahmen legten Busfahrer und Zugführer in
Athen am Mittwoch erneut für 24 Stunden die Arbeit nieder. Auch
Staatsbedienstete wollten um die Mittagszeit für drei Stunden in den Streik
treten und vor dem Parlament demonstrieren. Auf den Zufahrtsstraßen zur
griechischen Hauptstadt entstanden große Staus, weil viele Menschen versuchten,
mit dem eigenen Wagen oder mit dem Taxi zur Arbeit zu kommen./tt/DP/bgf

description.hltext_display: 三只新股今日上市 世纪瑞尔首日大涨80%
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
网易财经12月22日讯 三只新股今日登陆创业板，近期大盘窄幅震荡，为新股创造了炒作环境。
截止收盘，世纪瑞尔报59.4元，涨幅80.05%，成交高达14.19亿元，换手率高达86.31%；量子高科报42.41元，涨幅51.46%；昌红科技报收44.49元，涨幅30.85%。
量子高科 （300149 股吧,行情,资讯,主力买卖）本次上市1360万股，该股发行价为28元/股，对应市盈率为64.39倍。公司致力于以低聚果糖、低聚半乳糖为代表的益生元系列产品的研发、生产和销售。在低聚果糖细分领域，公司占据大约40%的市场份额，是该领域的龙头企业。本次募集资金将用于年产1万吨低聚果糖及其包装生产线扩建项目、年产2000吨低聚半乳糖扩建项目、研发中心扩建项目，总投资1.88亿元。预计该股上市后定位在43元左右。
世纪瑞尔 （300150 股吧,行情,资讯,主力买卖）本次上市2807万股，该股发行价为32.99元/股，对应市盈率为105.40倍。公司长期专注于铁路行车安全监控系统软件产品的研发、生产与销售。2008年、2009年公司在行车安全监控系统领域的市场占有率为17.15%、20.12%，位列第一，而且占有率逐年提升。公司在铁路用户中长期积累了良好的品牌效应，有助于其持续获得项目订单。本次募投项目包括铁路综合视频监控系统项目、铁路防灾安全监控系统项目、铁路综合监控系统平台项目、销售与客户服务中心建设项目、研发中心建设项目，投资总额2.55亿元。预计该股上市后定位在38元左右。
昌红科技 （300151 股吧,行情,资讯,主力买卖）本次上市1360万股，该股发行价为34元/股，对应市盈率为85倍。公司致力于办公自动化设备和高端医疗耗材领域的精密塑料结构件的设计和制造，主要生产复印机、打印机等办公自动化设备(OA)结构件、外观件模具及其注塑成型，是国内精密塑料模具及成型行业产业链完整的少数厂商之一。本次募集资金将用于昌红科技OA产品技术改造及扩产项目、昌红科技医疗产品扩产及技术改造项目、模具研发中心项目，总投资2.46亿元。预计该股上市后定位在41元左右。

description.hltext_display: Japan: Regierung rechnet mit schwächerem Wachstum
description.content:
TOKIO (dpa-AFX) - Japans Wirtschaftswachstum dürfte sich nach Einschätzung
der Regierung im kommenden Jahr wegen geringerer Konsumausgaben und
Exporteinnahmen spürbar abschwächen. Nach ihrer am Mittwoch veröffentlichten
Prognose wird das Bruttoinlandsprodukt (BIP) in dem am 1. April beginnenden
Steuerjahr nur noch um real 1,5 Prozent zulegen nach 3,1 Prozent in diesem Jahr.
Eine wesentliche Ursache für das langsamere Wachstum ist das Auslaufen
staatlicher Konsumanreize. Die Regierung rechnet zwar damit, dass die
Verbraucherpreise im kommenden Jahr nicht fallen werden. Ein Ende der
hartnäckigen Deflation bedeutet dies jedoch noch nicht gleich.
Dass das Wachstum im laufenden Jahr mit 3,1 Prozent stärker ausfallen dürfte
als erwartet - die Regierung hatte zuvor noch mit 2,6 Prozent gerechnet - liegt
vor allem an den staatlichen Hilfen zur Ankurbelung der Produktion und des
Konsums. Dazu gehörten Kaufanreize für umweltfreundliche Autos. Das Auslaufen
dieser Maßnahmen dürfte sich jedoch schon im kommenden Steuerjahr auswirken.
Jüngste Daten weisen auf eine Verlangsamung der Industrieproduktion hin, vor
allem bei den Autoherstellern. Hinzu kommt, dass Japans stark exportabhängige
Wirtschaft weiter unter dem starken Yen leidet.
Der Exportzuwachs dürfte sich der neuen Regierungsprognose zufolge auf 6,2
Prozent nach 15,8 Prozent abschwächen. Bezüglich der Beschäftigungslage rechnet
die Regierung in Tokio mit einer weiteren langsamen Verbesserung. So dürfte die
Arbeitslosenquote von gegenwärtig 5,0 Prozent auf 4,7 Prozent sinken. Die
Regierungsprognose berücksichtigt nicht kürzlich beschlossene Änderungen der
Steuerpolitik, wonach unter anderem die Unternehmenssteuer um fünf Prozent

description.hltext_display: Schweizer Banken wollen Steuerstreit mit Deutschland schnell abschließen
description.content:
FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX) - Die Schweizer Banken wollen die Diskussion um
unversteuerte Vermögen von Deutschen in der Schweiz schnell hinter sich bringen.
"Die Schweiz möchte ehrlich und endgültig mit der Vergangenheit abschließen",
sagte der Präsident der Schweizerischen Bankiervereinigung, Patrick Odier, der
"Börsen-Zeitung" (Mittwoch). Deshalb würden Kapitalerträge aus in der Schweiz
verwalteten Vermögen künftig gemäß dem deutschen System versteuert. Die
endgültigen Verhandlungen zwischen Deutschland und der Schweiz dazu sollten
"idealerweise" Anfang 2011 beginnen, sagte Odier.
Die Schweizer Geldhäuser wollen sich Odier zufolge auf die Verwaltung
versteuerter Vermögen spezialisieren. Befürchtungen, dass dadurch Gelder
ausfallen könnten, habe man nicht. Die Kunden hätten auch "wegen der Kompetenz
oder der Stabilität" ein großes Interesse an der Vermögensverwaltung in der
Schweiz.
Das Vorgehen müsse jedoch mit Deutschland noch im Detail besprochen werden,
ebenso die Behandlung von Altgeldern. Es liege aber auch in der Verantwortung
der Banken, die Interessen der Kunden zu wahren: "Wir haben in den Verhandlungen
klar gemacht: Unsere Kundschaft können wir nicht verraten", sagte Odier. Die
Schweizer Banken rieten ihren Kunden aber schon jetzt, ihr Geld regulär zu

description.hltext_display: Aktien Frankfurt Eröffnung: Kaum verändert - ohne Impulse - Stimmung gut
description.content:
FRANKFURT (dpa-AFX) Ohne neue Impulse ist der deutsche Aktienmarkt am
Mittwoch kaum verändert gestartet. Der Dax stieg in den ersten Minuten
um 0,03 Prozent auf 7.079,90 Punkte. Der deutsche Leitindex hatte am Vortag bei
7.087,84 Punkten den höchsten Stand seit Anfang Juni 2008 erreicht und seine
Bestmarke vom Wochenstart um rund 20 Punkte nach oben geschraubt. Der MDax
rückte um 0,08 Prozent auf 10.081,25 Punkte vor, nachdem der Index
mittelgroßer Werte am Vortag erstmals seit gut zweieinhalb Jahren über die Mauer
von 10.000 Punkten geklettert war. Der Auswahlindex für Technologiewerte TecDax
gab 0,17 Prozent auf 841,90 Punkte ab.
Die Nachrichtenlage bleibe dünn und auch die Vorgabe der Börsen in Übersee
gebe keine klare Richtung vor, begründeten Börsianer den kaum veränderten Start.
Der Future auf den US-Leitindex Dow Jones gewann 0,08 Prozent seit dem
Xetra-Schluss am Vortag. Auch die Agenda verspricht kaum neue Impulse für den
Aktienmarkt. Laut Börsianern dürfte aber das "Window-Dressing" im Zuge der
Weihnachtsrally weiter das Geschehen bestimmen, wobei mit weiter abnehmenden
Umsätzen zu rechnen sei. Am Nachmittag könnten neue Daten vom US-Immobilienmarkt
kleinere Impulse geben, darüber hinaus steht die finale Schätzung des US-BIP für
das dritte Quartal auf der Agenda./fat/la

description.hltext_display: 맨� 퍼디난드, 박지성에게 온 한국발 ‘소포 폭탄’ 또 인증
description.content: [뉴스엔 김종효 기자] 박지성이 속한 맨체스터 유나이티드(이하 맨유)가 최근 한국에서 날아오는 '소포 폭탄'으로 인해 업무가 마비될 지경이라고 행복한 비명을 질렀다. 맨체스터 유나이티드의 팀 훈련장인 트래포드 트레이닝 센터는 캐링턴 훈련장으로 불리기도 한다. 이곳의 가장 큰 문제는 바로 한국 팬들이 박지성에게 보내는 엄청난 양의 선물들이다. 박지성에게 들어오는 소포 폭탄은 박지성의 팀 동료인 핵심 수비수 리오 퍼디난드를 통해 '인증'됐다. 이번 소포들 역시 퍼디난드가 인증했다. 퍼디난드는 '명백히 한국에서 보낸' 우체국 택배 박스를 찍은 사진을 올리며 "어떻게 이렇게 빨리 박지성의 득점을 축하하는 선물을 보낼 수 있지?!"라고 놀라워했다. 퍼디난드가 박지성에게 온 한국발 소포들을 인증한 것은 이번이 처음은 아니다. 맨유TV를 통해 라커룸을 소개하던 퍼디난드와 긱스는 "박지성에겐 항상 선물이 온다. 매일 큰 박스가 있다"고 말했다. 퍼디난드는 지난 11월 트위터에 "오늘도 박지성의 라커에는 또 다른 선물이 기다리고 있었다. 그는 매일매일이 크리스마스나 생일같다"고 말해 끊이지 않는 소포가 온다는 사실을 증명했다. 지난 12월 4일 한국에서 소포로 날아온 '초코파이 인증샷'과 함께 "박지성에게 온 또 다른 소포를 열어봤다. 웨건 힐즈(Wagon wheels) 같은 맛이었고 나와 동료들이 먹어치웠다"고 말했다. 퍼디난드의 트위터에 한국의 맨유 팬들은 열광했다. 퍼디난드의 '인증'을 유도하기 위해 더 많은 선물을 보냈다. 퍼디난드는 역시 이에 보답하듯 지난 12월 15일 또 인증샷을 트위터에 올리며 "선물이 끊이지 않는다"고 말했다. 이어 "크리스마스를 맞아 우리에게 선물을 보내준 한국 팬에게 감사한다. 모든 선수들이 함께 즐길 것"이라고 고마워했다. 한편 맨유 관계자는 이에 대해 "매일 박지성에게 엄청난 양의 소포가 와 우편물 담당자가 처리하기 힘들 정도"라고 말해 박지성에게 오는 선물의 양을 가늠케했다. (사진=리오 퍼디난드 트위터 캡처) 김종효 phenomdark@newsen.com 기사제보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.com copyrightⓒ 뉴스엔. 무단전재 & 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Aktien Europa Eröffnung: Moderate Gewinne
description.content:
PARIS/LONDON (dpa-AFX) Die wichtigsten europäischen Börsen haben am
Mittwoch an ihre Vortagesgewinne anknüpfen können. Der EuroStoxx 50
rückte um 0,20 Prozent auf 2.882,78 Punkte vor. In London gewann der FTSE 100
minimale 0,01 Prozent auf 5.952,25 Punkte hinzu und für den Cac 40
ging es in Paris um 0,10 Prozent auf 3.931,37 Punkte nach
oben.
Versorger, Technologiewerte und Banken gehörten zu den bevorzugten Branchen.
Entsprechend standen Werte wie Unicredit und Nokia
mit Kursgewinnen von jeweils knapp einem Prozent an der
Spitze des pan-europäischen Leitindex. Der Luxusgüterkonzern rückte mit Hermes
International und LVMH einmal mehr in
den Fokus. LVMH hat seinen Anteil an dem Konkurrenten mittlerweile auf mehr als
20 Prozent erhöht. Hermes zogen um 2,78 Prozent auf 161,00 Euro an. LVMH

description.hltext_display: US-Regulierer legen Regeln für Netzneutralität fest
description.content:
WASHINGTON (dpa-AFX) - Mit neuen Regeln für den Datenverkehr im Internet
haben amerikanische Regulierer eine wichtige Weichenstellung für die sogenannte
Netzneutralität in den USA unternommen. In einem umstrittenen Schritt setzte die
US-Telekom-Aufsicht FCC am Dienstag (Ortszeit) verstärkt durch, dass
Internet-Anbieter alle legalen Inhalte in ihren Netzen gleich behandeln müssen
und nicht bestimmte Endgeräte ausschließen dürfen.
Die Behörde setzte damit weitgehend einen Vorstoß um, den der FCC- Chefs
Julius Genachowski Anfang Dezember gemacht hatte. Die Initiative soll einen
Kompromiss darstellen zwischen den verschiedenen Interessen von Netzbetreibern,
Inhalteanbietern und Konsumenten.
Generell unterscheidet die FCC bei den Regeln zwischen Festnetz- Breitband
und Mobilfunk. Während die Neutralitätsregeln fürs Festnetz strenger ausfielen,
ließ die Behörde beim mobilen Internet die Zügel lockerer. Den
Mobilfunk-Betreibern wird zwar untersagt, Dienste wie den Online-Videoservice
Netflix oder Internettelefonie-Anbieter wie Skype ganz zu sperren.
Unterschiedliche Geschwindigkeiten bei der Zustellung von Datenpaketen bleiben
aber weiterhin erlaubt. Genachowski begründet das damit, dass der mobile
Internet-Markt sich noch im Aufbau befindet.
Über Netzneutralität wird weltweit - auch in Deutschland - kontrovers
diskutiert, die Entwicklung in den USA mit ihrer hoch entwickelten
Internet-Wirtschaft wird aber international besonders aufmerksam beobachtet.
In Amerika war die Debatte 2008 eskaliert, als der Netzbetreiber Comcast
Daten blockierte oder langsamer zustellte, die über den
Dienst BitTorrent flossen. Die Federal Communications Commission (FCC) rügte
dies damals als Verstoß gegen US-Richtlinien. Später urteilte ein Gericht aber,
die Behörde sei dazu nicht befugt gewesen. Damit sehen Kritiker die Autorität
der FCC bei der Regulierung des Breitband-Internets in Frage gestellt./mcm/DP/tw

description.hltext_display: Countdown zur Analog-Abschaltung läuft
description.content:
MÜNCHEN (dpa-AFX) - Der Satellitenbetreiber Astra will den Absatz von
digitalen Empfangsgeräten in den kommenden Monaten kräftig ankurbeln. Gut 500
Tage vor der Abschaltung des analogen Satellitenfernsehens sei die digitale
Alternative noch längst nicht in allen Haushalten angekommen, sagte
Astra-Deutschland-Geschäftsführer Wolfgang Elsäßer am Mittwoch der
Nachrichtenagentur dpa in München. Derzeit würden rund 80 Prozent oder 12,6
Millionen der Satelliten-Haushalte in Deutschland ihr Fernsehprogramm digital
empfangen. "Die Aufgabe ist, die restlichen Haushalte zu digitalisieren", sagte
Elsäßer. Am 30. April 2012 wird der analoge Empfang über Satellit abgeschaltet.
In Deutschland empfangen derzeit insgesamt 16,2 Millionen Haushalte ihr
Fernsehprogramm via Satellit, 3,6 Millionen davon noch mit analogen Geräten.
Insgesamt gibt es mehr als 36 Millionen TV- Haushalte, anders als in vielen
Nachbarländern beziehen viele ihr Fernsehen via Kabel. Dort sei der Anteil
digitaler Empfangstechnik erheblich niedriger. "Im Gegensatz zum Kabel-Fernsehen
sind wir deutlich voraus", sagte Elsäßer. Allerdings könnten viele nicht auf
Satellit umsteigen, weil der Kabelanschluss beispielsweise in der Miete
enthalten ist.
Vor allem hochauflösendes Fernsehen habe das digitale Angebot zuletzt
attraktiver gemacht. "HD-TV ist der Treiber der gesamten Fernsehindustrie."
Angesichts der Abschaltung des analogen Empfangs will Astra aber nicht nur die
Umstellung in den Haushalten forcieren, sondern auch neue Kunden hinzugewinnen.
"Wir investieren einen siebenstelligen Betrag im Handels-Marketing", sagte
Elsäßer. Dabei werde eng mit den Herstellern zusammengearbeitet, vor allem aber
mit dem Handel. "Für die Händler ist das besonders interessant. Das ist fast
eine Milliarde Zusatzumsatz in den kommenden 500 Tagen."/sbr/DP/tw

description.hltext_display: 谷歌Gmail免费网络电话将持续至2011年
description.content:
谷歌Gmail免费网络电话
北京时间12月21日消息，据国外媒体报道，谷歌今日宣布，Gmail用户在2011年可继续免费拨打美国以及加拿大电话。
谷歌在今年8月推出Gmail网络电话服务时曾表示，用户“至少在今年内”可免费拨打北美地区电话，国际拨号服务资费则以最低每分钟2美分开始计算。
谷歌在推出该项服务后引起巨大反响，在服务推出24小时内用户通话数量已达百万，业内人士宣称该网络电话服务将成为Skype杀手。分析称谷歌在2011年继续提供免费通话服务是为了吸引更多的用户。

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer räumt Defizite bei der Bahn ein
description.content:
BERLIN (dpa-AFX) - Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer (CSU) hat
angesichts der aktuellen Verkehrsprobleme jahrelange Versäumnisse bei der Bahn
eingeräumt. "Wir haben mit erheblichen technischen Problemen zu kämpfen, die aus
der Vergangenheit herrühren", sagte der CSU- Politiker am Mittwoch im
ARD-Morgenmagazin. In den letzten zehn Jahren sei zudem an der sogenannten
Bereithaltung gespart worden.
"Es macht sich jetzt bemerkbar, dass man geglaubt hat, man könne sich das
eine oder andere an der Reserve sparen." Diese baue man zurzeit in allen
Bereichen der Bahn wieder auf. Die Probleme ließen sich nicht von heute auf
morgen beheben. "Aber die Öffentlichkeit kann erwarten, dass die Politik
zusammen mit den einzelnen Verkehrsträgern alles daran setzt, dass die Dinge in
Ordnung gebracht werden - und das tun wir."
Ramsauer wies Vorwürfe zurück, dass die Winterreifenpflicht den
Lastwagenverkehr nicht ausreichend einschließe. Natürlich müssten nicht nur die
Antriebsachsen, sondern alle Achsen eines Lastwagens mit griffigen Allwetter-
und Ganzjahresreifen ausgestattet sein. "Jeder Lastwagen, der auf den anderen
Achsen nicht hinreichend bereift ist, wird sofort aus dem Verkehr gezogen",

description.hltext_display: Staffing in atlanta Tips for Finding a Temp Agency
description.content:
Temp agencies can be a great way to find some extra work and are ideal if you are looking for something that isn
't going to be long-term. There are a number of reasons why you might want to use a temp agency to help you find work, but the question we will be dealing with today is how to actually find a good agency.
Unfortunately, there are a lot of temp work agencies out there that just don
't deliver. You could end up sitting around for months without a hint of a job with these agencies, so it
's important to know what to look for. With that in mind, here are some tips to help you find the right company to help you find work.
- Look for specialties. Many temp agencies only represent one industry. For example, they may only place secretaries. It
's a good idea to check for this when looking for a company to work with. Often you
'll have better luck finding work if you opt for a company that specializes in your area of expertise, as Boost your skills. You
'll be far more valuable as a temp employee if you are already familiar with things on the job. That means you may need to learn a few new things in order to come in higher on the list of job applicants. For example, a secretary who is comfortable with Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint is going to be more valuable than one who is simply a fast typist.
- Find one with support. We all know that there are some truly awful jobs out there. Make sure you know exactly what your chosen temp agency will do if you are uncomfortable or detest a particular job. Will they intervene? A good agency will work with the temporary employees to ensure they aren
't being treated badly. If you don
't have the support of the agency behind you, it can be very easy to end up in a position you aren
't happy with.
- Prepare for your interview. Just because you aren
't interviewing for the actual job doesn
't mean you should skimp on preparation. Make sure your resume is up to date, dress the part and treat the interview for a temp agency just like you would an interview for a job. This is also a time to get a feel for those in charge of job assignments. It
's not just an interview for you, it
's also one for them. If you aren
't comfortable with the people you
'll be relying on to find you a job, then look at another agency.
- Talk to other temp workers. This is your best bet for finding out what the company is really like. Are people happy with their placements? Do they have complaints about the way things are run? It
's handy to know what you
're getting into from the very start so you can make an informed decision right from the start. Often, you
'll learn things you would normally need to spend several weeks there to pick up.
Temp agencies offer a huge advantage to anyone not interested in staying with one job for a long period of time. Whether you are simply looking to earn money while between jobs or are looking to make a career out of temp work, an agency can help you by putting you in touch with far more jobs that you would normally have access to. However, it
's important to select the right temp agency for you, which means doing a little research. Ask questions, talk to other workers and get a feel for things before you sign up.

description.hltext_display: Jealous rage leads to arrest
description.content:
MIDDLETOWN — A 19-year-old woman was arrested Friday after allegedly biting and punching another woman in a jealous rage, police said.
The victim arrived at police headquarters at 7:30 p.m. to make a complaint against Cynthia Muff, 145 William St.
The victim said, the couple got into an argument after Muff accused her of cheating. During the argument Muff became enraged and bit the victim on the left arm and punched her in the face several times, according to the police report. Officers noticed bite marks on the victim’s face and reported that her face was swollen.
Muff was charged with third-degree assault, disorderly conduct and violation of a protective order after it was revealed the victim had a restraining order against the accused.
During processing Muff was found to be in possession of marijuana, which she had hidden in her underwear, police said. She was additionally charged with possession of less than four ounces of marijuana.
Muff was released from custody after posting a $5,000 bond. She is scheduled to appear in Middletown Superior Court Jan 28.
She also has a pending case in Middletown where she is facing charges of drug possession and breach of peace, according to court documents.
Walt Gogolya can be reached by e-mail at wgogolya@middletownpress.com.
Reader Comments »

description.hltext_display: China's record kero imports may include disguised diesel
description.content:
* Record Nov kero imports include 100K bpd "other kerosene"
* "Other kerosene" imports averaged 58,000 bpd Aug-Nov
* Asian cash diesel prices at 25-month high
BEIJING, Dec 22 - Record kerosene imports China reported this week for November may include rare purchases of "power kerosene" Chinese independent dealers made in recent months to cash in a domestic diesel shortage.
The General Administration of Customs said China's kerosene imports -- including jet fuel, lamp kerosene and "other kerosene" -- totalled some 860,000 tonnes last month, an increase of 61 percent over a year earlier, and 80 percent above the average monthly rate in the first 10 months of this year.
The customs data also showed China's total jet fuel and lamp kero imports in November at only 470,000 tonnes, implying imports of "other kerosene" were 390,000 tonnes, or about 100,000 barrels per day .
China imports mostly jet fuel, or aviation kerosene, to cover a surging air traffic both of cargo and passenger.
"A month of jet fuel imports at 860,000 tonnes? It's simply impossible," said a trader with top refiner Sinopec Corp .
Asian cash diesel prices hit a 25-month high of $101.95 a barrel on Nov. 11, crossing the $100 a barrel mark in line with buoyant crude prices.
Asian gas oil cracks also hit a 22-month peak of a premium of $14.75 a barrel to Dubai crude on Nov. 11, while the prompt timespread <0#GOSGSPD> swung into backwardation for the first time in eight months on Nov. 12, on firm sentiment after China turned diesel importer for the first time in two years.
Several traders with knowledge of China's recent rare imports of power kerosene, a fuel between kerosene and diesel quality-wise and which can be easily blended into diesel, said the record kerosene data may have included the exotic flows.
"I believe power kerosene is in it. However strange the term is, it still carries the word 'kerosene' in it and I would expect customs to wrap it under the general category of kerosene," said a second trader.
But the difference is power kerosene was not subject to the consumption tax of about $125 a tonne which would otherwise be slapped on diesel or jet fuel.
A statistics official at the General Administration of Customs said she was unable to clarify "other kerosene". She said she had never heard of "power kerosene".
Reuters has both sets of the kerosene import data -- one including "other kerosene" and the other without -- and calculations showed the discrepancy, or the amount of the other kerosene started to surge from August through November with a total of 888,532 tonnes in the four months, or 58,000 bpd.
And detailed import data by suppliers showed kerosene sourced from Singapore, which was all "other kerosene", swelled to 235,000 tonnes in November, nearly half the total shipped from the Asia oil hub in the first ten months of 2010. .
The data matches what traders told Reuters last week: that Singapore was the prime source of power kerosene which started to flow into China from August to plug a diesel supply crunch.

description.hltext_display: [주간 회원권 시세] � 가대 0.11% 상승..보합세 지속
description.content: 22일 현재 전국에 거래되고 있는 주요 회원권(117개·분양 중인 종목 제외)은 1억7613만원으로 지난주 대비 0.28% 상승세를 나타냈다. 가격대별로도 초고가대 0.41%, 고가대 0.11%, 중가대 0.18%, 저가대는 0.10% 오르는 등 전 종목에 걸쳐 상승세를 나타냈다. 하지만 전체적인 시장의 상황은 보합세가 길어지고 있으며 지난주와 비슷한 움직임을 보이는 양상이다. 일부 매수세가 유입된 종목별로 상승세를 보인 종목도 있지만 상승폭은 크지 않았다. 코스피지수가 2000선을 넘어서면서 증시가 활황을 보이고 있는 반면 부동산 시장과 연계성이 높은 회원권 시장은 부동산 시장 분위기를 받아 아직도 바닥을 크게 벗어나지 못하고 있다. 추가 하락을 원하는 매수세의 관망세가 길어지면서 투자심리가 살아나지 않고 있는 상황이다. 다만 하락폭이 컸던 중고가대 종목 위주로 저점 매수 문의가 계속 이어지고 있고 최고점 대비해 시세가 40% 정도 하락한 상태이기 때문에 전문가들은 600조원이 넘는 풍부한 시중 부동자금이 회원권 시장으로 유입되고 기업실적 호조에 따라 법인들이 가세한다면 상황이 나아질 것이라고 전망하고 있다. /easygolf@fnnews.com ※ 저작권자 ⓒ 파이낸셜뉴스 . 무단 전재-재배포 금지 [☞ First-Class경제신문 파이낸셜뉴스 구독신청하기]

description.hltext_display: 联合国大厦泛味会议被迫改地
description.content:
来源：解放牛网 新闻晚报
【收藏】[0]
【评论0 查看】 【我要评论】 【发起话题】
位于美国纽约东河河畔的联合国总部大厦21日早晨因散发不明难闻气味，导致安全理事会和联合国大会相关会议更改开会地点。
由于散发异常气味，联合国安全人员当天早晨临时疏散联合国秘书处大楼、联大大会堂以及联合国院区北侧草坪一座4层临时建筑的外交人员和工作人员。受疏散人员一度撤到联合国院外等候。
安全人员最初担心，不明气味由燃气泄漏导致。经专家现场勘察确认，东河潮水破坏联合国建筑部分下水系统，难闻气味由下水道污物散发。
联合国发言人法尔汉·哈克21日在例行新闻吹风会上告诉记者：“不存在危险，气体是由下水道散发，无害。明天游客参观项目和联大会议将恢复。”哈克没有说明东河潮水如何破坏下水系统以及是否有污物溢溅。但他说，“清理工作正在进行”。

description.hltext_display: 百度撤销对360网盾标注不良搜索结果的指控
description.content:
12月20日，百度诉360案在北京市第二中级人民法院宣判，让人大为意外的是，法庭公布的材料显示：该起诉讼中最主要的诉讼请求，也就是百度公司以“篡改百度搜索页面”为由对360网盾标注搜索结果中不良网站的指控，已经被百度公司主动撤销。
之前，百度因反对360安全卫士标注搜索结果中的不良网站，以及在查杀木马病毒时增加清理恶评插件的功能，于今年8月19日起诉360公司并索赔1000万元。
360安全卫士方面则称：百度所谓的“篡改搜索页面结果”，其实是360网盾推出的“搜索引擎保护”功能。搜索引擎已成为欺诈和挂马网站传播的主要途径，每年导致网民数百亿元损失。安全软件标注搜索结果中的欺诈和挂马网页，向用户提示风险，是安全行业的国际惯例，赛门铁克、麦咖啡(McAfee)、安博士等国外安全软件都有同样功能(国内的金山原来也有同样功能，但是后来撤销了对百度的标注)。而且360网盾对所有搜索引擎都进行标注，并非仅标注百度一家。
360公司提供的材料显示，目前，360安全卫士内置的网盾模块，除了可以标注搜索结果中的木马站、挂马网页和包含危险下载链接的网页外，还可以对八大类的欺诈钓鱼网站进行标注，分别是：虚假中奖类、虚假购物类、假冒登录类、证券欺诈类、彩票预测类、境外博彩类、钓鱼弹窗类、钓鱼广告类。此外，假药和非法医疗类网站因为事关人命，危害特别大，360网盾会直接加以拦截。
有业内人士认为，360网盾标注欺诈网站，对这些网站在百度搜索结果中获取的点击量影响很大，间接影响到了百度的广告收入，这才是百度起诉360的真实起因。而将此诉讼进行到底，一来于法无据，很难获得法庭支持，二来会在舆论上陷自身于被动，或许正是百度主动撤销指控的原因。
在该起诉讼的另外一项请求中，百度称360安全卫士将百度工具栏和百度地址栏插件定义为“恶评插件”，具有“强制安装，自身无法正常卸载”的恶意行为，是“恶意贬损”。而360则反驳称，任何软件是否为恶评插件，都是由网友投票决定的，得分低于6分的会被自动定义为“恶评插件”，百度应该先自查这两款软件是否存在不正当行为、为什么会在网民投票中低于6分。在20日的宣判中，法庭部分支持百度的诉讼请求，一审判决360败诉。
360公司公关部负责人表示，百度撤销对360网盾搜索引擎保护功能的指控是很大的进步。对于法院对360清理插件功能的判决，该负责人说， 360安全卫士在木马查杀时调用清理插件的模块，目的是方便用户一站式查杀，其中对恶评插件与木马做了不同分类，由用户自己选择是否清除，并允许将任意插件设置为“信任插件”。在本次判决之前，360已经调整了相关产品，使得页面显示形式和文字表述更为严谨，能让用户更清晰地区分杀毒、木马和恶评插件的扫描结果。
盈科律师事务所合伙人刘永斌律师分析认为，百度诉360的结果“一撤一胜”，双方打了个平手，估计这个结果不会影响360继续为网民清理恶评插件的决心。清理恶评插件是360安全卫士的核心功能，深受用户的喜欢，但也因此给360带来了多起诉讼。

description.hltext_display: Nixon, el racista universal
description.content:
Entre los políticos del siglo XX que, por la llamada razón de Estado, más apoyaron la causa del sionismo, ha habido curiosamente grandes antisemitas. Ese fue el caso de A. J. Balfour, secretario del Foreign Office británico que en 1917 hizo la declaración que lleva su nombre, con la que ponía los cimientos del futuro Estado de Israel.
Del presidente norteamericano Richard Milhous Nixon (1968-1974) ya sabíamos por las revelaciones del escándalo Watergate que tenía opiniones poco edificantes sobre los judíos, pero la publicación de 265 horas de grabaciones de conversaciones privadas, pocos meses antes de que tuviera que dimitir por felón, convierte la anécdota en enciclopedia, al tiempo que extiende su racismo primario al universo mundo. "Los italianos no tienen la cabeza en su sitio"; "cuando beben, los irlandeses son inaguantables"; y los negros de EE UU "tardarán 500 años en ser útiles al país". Y a eso le llamaba "ciertas características de cada pueblo", que él, avispado, interpretaba como nadie.
Pero son los judíos, a los que sostuvo con denuedo como ciudadanos de Israel contra el mundo árabe, los que salen peor parados. En especial, los judíos norteamericanos, que son "agresivos, exigentes e insoportables"; les acusa de ser numerosos entre los desertores que no quisieron ir a la guerra de Vietnam; y cuando la primera ministra israelí Golda Meir le pide que presione a Moscú para que deje emigrar a los judíos soviéticos, le dice, pero siempre en privado, a su secretario de Estado Henry Kissinger -también judío y al que ponía con frecuencia como chupa de dómine- que aunque los rusos llevaran a sus judíos a las cámaras de gas "eso no concernía a la política exterior de Estados Unidos". Lo de las cámaras era, sin embargo, una metáfora presidencial, puesto que en la Unión Soviética nunca existió tal cosa.
La revelación de las cintas -aún quedan 400 horas por dar a conocer- es un modesto Wikileaks que a su manera contribuye, cuando Nixon ya es apenas un malsano recuerdo, a traspasar el velo de secreto con el que los grandes del planeta muestran en la intimidad una cara muy diferente de la benéfica beatitud con la que gustan comparecer ante la opinión.

description.hltext_display: Vacation Diving Cayman Style
description.content: If you are planning to travel to the Caribbean for you next vacation, you have many islands from which to choose for you destination. On such island that makes a beautiful place for a vacation is the overseas territory of the United Kingdom known as the Cayman Islands. If you love diving, this is an especially great place to visit, since is the world's leading underwater diving tourist destination. The Cayman Islands are made up of Grand Cayman, Cayman Brac, and Little Caymen. These islands are located in the western portion of the Caribbean Sea. The Cayman Islands are about 150 miles from Cuba and about 480 miles from Miami, Florida. Cayman Brac and Little Cayman are sometimes known as the "Sister Islands" and are about 90 miles east of Grand Cayman Island, which is about 75 square miles. The islands are made up of large coral heads and is home to a number of exotic birds, fish, and land animals, including the endangered Blue Iguana, as well as The Grand Cayman Parrot and Cayman Brac Parrot, which are found only on these islands.Tourism accounts for most of this island's revenue, so while you are visiting these islands, the people there will surely cater to your every needs. World famous scuba diving is found here because of the clear waters and the proximity to the Cayman Wall. You can swim beside string rays and number of other amazing sea creatures while traveling in the Cayman Islands, as well as explore shipwrecks.Outside of the water, you can check out popular spots like the black limestone fields, hiking trails, lighthouses, and museums. Cayman Sea Salt Co is also located here, as well as a number of financial institutions. In fact, many business men travel to the Cayman islands because this location is one of the world's leading offshore financial centers.Before you head to the Cayman Islands, it is important to understand a bit about the islands and make sure your paperwork is in order. You'll need a passport to fly there, and maybe a visa, depending on where you live. Camping is illegal in the islands, which many do not realize when leaving, and if you are caught camping, you will spend time in jail. It is also important to make sure that you can show a return flight ticket. Visit the Cayman Islands can be lots of fun if you're ready!

description.hltext_display: AK Parti İl Başkanı Karal, Risiad ı Ziyaret Etti
description.content:
AK PartiRize Ýl Baþkaný Hasan Karal, Rize Sanayici ve Ýþadamlarý Derneði'ni (RÝSÝAD) ziyaret etti.
Beraberindeki il yönetim kurulu üyeleriyle RÝSÝAD Baþkaný Mustafa Külünkoðlu ve yönetim kurulu üyeleri ile sohbet eden Karal, kentte kamuoyunu etkileme gücüne sahip sivil toplum kuruluþlarýný ziyaret ettiklerini söyledi.
Amaçlarýnýn sivil toplum kuruluþlarýnýn görüþ ve düþüncelerini almak olduðunu ifade eden Karal, 'Yapýlan çalýþmalar hakkýnda her kesimin yapýcý eleþtirileri ve katký saðlayacak fikirlerini dinleyeceðiz. Rize'nin geleceði ile ilgili bizim düþünemediðimiz, sivil toplum örgütlerinin uygulanmasýný uygun gördükleri konularý ortak akýlla yapmamýz lazým. Bu anlamda sivil toplum örgütlerini sýk sýk ziyaret ederek düþüncelerine baþvurmayý hedefliyoruz' dedi.
Devletin Rize'ye getirmesi gereken alt yapý çalýþmalarý konusunda çok ciddi mesafe aldýklarýný ifade eden Karal, þunlarý kaydetti:
'Gerek eðitim, gerek saðlýk, gerekse ulaþým alanýnda çok ciddi çalýþmalar yapýldý, yapýlmaya devam ediyor. Elbette eksiklerimiz var. Yapýlmasý gereken çok daha iþ var. Ama iktidarýmýz döneminde bu temel hizmetler anlamýnda çok ciddi yol kat etmiþ durumdayýz. Bu anlamda sivil toplum örgütlerinin gerek düþünce, gerekse plan ve proje olarak desteðiyle ilimizi çok daha modern, yaþanabilir bir haline getirmeyi amaçlýyoruz. Bu siyasi irade olarak sadece bizim iþimiz deðil. Bu, kentte yaþayan toplumun önde gelen kanaat önderleri ve sivil toplum örgütlerinin ortak akýl etrafýnda bütünleþip doðrularý benimsemeyle olur. Rize'yi birlikte kalkýndýracaðýz.'
RÝSÝAD Rize Þube Baþkaný Mustafa Külünkoðlu ise, Rize-Mardin otoyolunun önemli bir proje olduðunu belirterek, 'Rize'nin önünü açmak lazým. Rize'nin tek çýkýþ yolu üniversite ile Güneydoðuyu Anadolu Bölgesi ile bölgemiz arasýnda iliþkiyi artýrmaktýr. Üniversite hýzla geliþiyor. Diþ hekimliði fakültesinin yanýnda mühendislik fakültesinin de bir an önce açýlmasý ile öðrenci sayýsý daha da artacaktýr' diye konuþtu.
Külünkoðlu, Karal'ýn derneðimizi ziyaret ederek yatýrým ve projelerle ilgili görüþlerini almasýndan memnuniyet duyduklarýný kaydetti.

description.hltext_display: 花旗上调谷歌业绩预期 重申买入评级和目标价
description.content:
北京时间12月21日消息，据国外媒体报道，花旗集团分析师Mark Mahaney今日发布了关于谷歌的最新研究报告，重申给予谷歌股票“买入”评级和725美元目标价。他在报告中表示，即便谷歌今年第四季度的业绩不会比去年同期更优异，至少也能持平。
Mahaney原先估计2011年谷歌搜索业务全年增长率在10%到15%，今日则上调至15%至20%。Mahaney还预计谷歌2011年手机搜索广告业务毛收入将超过20亿美元，并在2012年达到35亿美元。YouTube广告业务2011年毛收入将达13亿美元，并在2012年增至16亿美元。
据花旗对搜索引擎营销类型进行调查所得结果显示，由于谷歌推出即时搜索功能，谷歌搜索广告收视率略微出现了增长。
至于欧盟反垄断调查案，Mahaney引述了英国律师事务所Edwards，Angell，Palmer & Dodge的合伙人Becket McGrath的话说：“这件案子非常复杂，证券交易委员会至少要几年的时间才能得出结论。”
Mahaney将谷歌2011年每股收益预期由之前的33.48美元上调至34.22美元，将谷歌2012年每股收益预期由之前的38.23美元上调至39.06美元。

description.hltext_display: Christmas shopping carnage:...
description.content:
TWO student friends heading home for the Christmas break were killed when they were mown down by a Range Rover as it careered along a city centre pavement.Mhairi Convy, 18, and 20-year-old Laura Stewart were struck by the powerful vehicle as it veered out of control into pedestrians.
Crowds of horrified Christmas shoppers saw the girls being hit. It happened just yards from Glasgows huge Buchanan Galleries shopping complex. I feel terrible for the girls families, especially because its happened at this time of year.
Bus station worker Jim Orr, 49, who witnessed the aftermath, added: I saw two girls lying in the road. One had obviously been hit with such force her shoes had come off.
Her handbag had gone flying too.
The paramedics were doing their best to save them.
But you could see that it was too late.
A blood-spattered oxygen mask lay among belongings scattered in the road, including a grey Ugg-style boot, a pair of glasses, a handbag and sheafs of paper.
Another witness said he heard an almighty bang and turned around to see the Range Rover tearing along the pavement.
It took down a lamp post and struck a second, which landed on top of the vehicle, before finally coming to rest on an embankment.
A plastic roadworks barrier had become wedged beneath the 4x4 as it careered 20 yards along the pavement.
It is thought the driver may have slumped at the wheel with his foot jammed on the accelerator.
A trail of mud and debris was left along the pavement, apparently sprayed by the cars spinning tyres.
One man walking near the bus station described the aftermath of the crash as carnage.
A woman doctor who was passing the scene stopped to help, giving first aid and using resuscitation techniques before the ambulance teams arrived.
She said: I stopped to do what I could.
They are very badly injured and I just did as much as I could for them.
Yesterday, a man who answered the door at the home of Mhairi Convy, who lived with her parents Alan and Aileen in Kirkintilloch, East Dunbartonshire, said they were too upset to comment.
Mhairi, who had a brother called Rory, was planning to be a chef.
She had been taking driving lessons and was planning a holiday in Turkey with girlfriends.
Her father sells kitchens and her mother is a retail assistant.
Family friend Sandra Smith, who has a daughter Lindsay who is the same age as Mhairi, said: Mhairi comes from a lovely family. They are very close.
She was brought up beautifully.
She was a quiet, lovely polite girl and was looking forward very much to her holiday.
She had her whole life ahead of her. It is very upsetting.
My heart goes out to them. No one can imagine how they are feeling right now.
Mhairi was very popular with everyone who knew her and she will be greatly missed.
Mhairis friend and fellow student Laura was from Cumbernauld.
Four ambulances were sent to the scene of the accident, along with a fleet of police cars, and the road was temporarily closed, causing tailbacks as an area already extremely busy with students and shoppers.
Superintendent Val Thomson, of Strathclyde Police, said officers would be looking at CCTV footage from the nearby bus station.
Footage may also be available from a nearby multi-storey car park.
Speaking at the scene, Superintendent Thomson said: We will not know the full circumstances of how the two girls were killed until our accident investigators have carried out a full investigation.
This was a very serious incident which has also left another pedestrian in a serious condition and we would like to speak to anyone who saw what happened.
We believe there were cars at the scene when this happened that may have driven away before we arrived.
Police were also seen taking paint scrapings from a red Mercedes car which is believed to have been struck by the Range Rover as it careered out of control.
The Scottish Ambulance Service said the two girls were taken to the Glasgow Royal Infirmary.
The two men, the injured pedestrian and the Range Rover driver, were taken to the citys Western Infirmary.
Students at the nearby Glasgow Caledonian University campus reacted with shock as details of the tragedy unfolded.
One said: This is the last day of term before Christmas and most students will either be going home or spending one last night with their friends before they go back tomorrow.
Its unthinkable that this could happen today.
Police said they were planning to question the driver about the incident after he had been treated for his injuries in hospital.
A report will then be prepared for the procurator fiscal.

description.hltext_display: Nickelodeon & Viacom: SpongeBob SquarePants splashes across the emerging markets
description.content:
Nickelodeon Consumer Products International - December 2010
The world’s favourite yellow sea sponge, SpongeBob SquarePants, is splashing his way across the emerging markets as a wave of new deals are signed by Nickelodeon Consumer Products International.
Major licensee C-Trade has signed a deal for the hit property covering a raft of states from Armenia to Uzbekistan via Azerbaijan, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, Russia, Moldova, Russia, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Ukraine.
The license is for a wide variety of sports equipment and accessories including from bicycles to ride-on cars, tennis sets to playing tents. Aimed at children from five years and upwards, the ranges will be sold in retailers including Auchan, Metro, Real, Detskii Mir, Dochki Sinochki, Korablik and Deti.
SpongeBob SquarePants will be helping to keep children’s teeth healthy in Turkey and Northern Cyprus following a renewal with Unilever for toothpaste in the region. Retailers signed up for the product include Tansas, Migros, Carrefour, Real and Metro.
Covering Poland, Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania, licensee Pentra has signed SpongeBob SquarePants for a range of bags and backpacks, badges and charms, and mobile cases plus clocks, lamps, mugs and stationery. Retailers stocking the products include Auchan, Smyk and Biedronka.

description.hltext_display: 欧洲极端天气近期有望缓解
description.content:
来源：解放牛网 新闻晚报
【收藏】[0]
【评论0 查看】 【我要评论】 【发起话题】
世界气象组织21日在日内瓦说，欧洲部分地区入冬以来的连续低温降雪天气有望于近期得到缓解。
世界气象组织预测，从今年12月底到明年1月初，两度袭击欧洲地区的低温天气将会出现一定程度缓和，但目前尚难预测类似去年冬季的长时间低温天气是否会在今冬重现。
继11月中、下旬之后，西欧地区近日出现入冬以来的第二次低温降雪过程。强降雪和低温天气袭击欧洲多国，致使多处机场关闭，航班延误，空中和地面交通不畅，民众出行受阻。
世界气象组织指出，这种灾害天气与北半球今年秋冬之交出现的异常气压与气流状况有关。正常情况下，冬季西欧上空气流应自西向东运动，带来温和的天气。但近期气流主要呈自北向南运动状态，导致西欧出现大范围低温降雪。

description.hltext_display: Bozyazı daki Cinayet
description.content: Mersin'in Bozyazı ilçesinde yaklaşık 1 ay önce öldürülen gencin katil zanlısı, tutuklandı. Alınan bilgiye göre, 20 Kasım'da, Ahmet Kızmaz'ın Devren Yaylası'nda pompalı tüfekle öldürülmesiyle ilgili soruşturmayı sürdüren güvenlik güçleri, katil zanlısı Ali T'yi suç aleti tüfekle yakaladı. Nöbetçi mahkemeye sevk edilen Ali T, tutuklanarak Silifke Cezaevine gönderildi. Kızmaz, 20 Kasım Pazar günü Devren Yaylası'nda öldürülmüş halde bulunmuştu. (VT-KRM-AYC-SA) - MERSİN (Anadolu Ajansı) 20 dakika önce.. [2430059]

description.hltext_display: 传Hulu放弃IPO 考虑其他融资方式和新业务
description.content:
12月21日消息，据国外媒体报道，据消息人士透露，Hulu目前放弃了通过IPO(首次公开募股)募集资金而获得更多正版内容的计划，正在考虑其他融资方式和推出新的付费服务。
据称，Hulu没有获得网络视频节目的长期版权是董事会和管理层暂缓IPO的一个原因。Hulu现在可能考虑使现有投资方追加投资。Hulu投资方包括新闻集团、迪士尼、通用电气旗下NBC Universal以及私募股权投资公司Providence Equity Partners。
Hulu今夏发布了支持iPad等移动设备和互联网电视的Hulu Plus付费业务测试版，11月份推出其正式版。但部分用户抱怨Hulu Plus内容有限，Hulu将Hulu Plus的月租费由9.99美元下调至7.99美元。投资者一直在促使Hulu考虑其他付费业务，以利用其内容获得更多收入。

description.hltext_display: Pa. education aide urges probe of Ackerman contract award
description.author: DAFNEY TALES
description.content:
Acting Education Secretary Thomas Gluck wants the state auditor general to investigate Superintendent Arlene Ackerman's decision to award a minority-owned firm a $7.5 million emergency contract to install security cameras in 19 schools after district officials failed to provide information he requested.
The district was given nearly two weeks to explain how Mount Airy-based IBS Communication got the job, how the district cancels contracts and how the project was funded.
In his letter to the Bureau of School Audits sent yesterday, Gluck said the district's report failed to show how the project was considered an "emergency." "These unexplained items in the District's report suggest that this matter should be examined more closely, and in a way that is beyond the resources of the Department of Education," he said. District spokeswoman Shana Kemp declined to comment, citing an ongoing internal investigation.
But in a written response to Gluck, district counsel Michael Davis said that a contract was never actually awarded to the white-owned Security and Data Technologies, the Newtown Township-based company that the Inquirer reported received the contract before Ackerman stepped in.
Therefore, he said, the district couldn't provide documents relating to its decision. He said that interactions "occurred orally" between district officials and SDT. "Since SDT never performed any work on the project, there are no documents that show that the District requested SDT to cease work," he wrote. When a district team decided going through a competitive bidding process would take too long, they contacted SDT, a "state-approved" vendor, who submitted a proposal for the project, the letter read.
He said IBS, which installed security cameras inside South Philadelphia High last school year, was selected after Ackerman asked whether a minority business was involved in the selection process.
Meanwhile, state Rep. Michael McGeehan, a vocal critic of Ackerman's contract dealings, said a forensic audit of the school district by the auditor general is "long overdue."

description.hltext_display: В крае сокращаются долги по зарплате
description.content:
Задолженность предприятий края по зарплате на 11 декабря составила 28,3 млн. рублей, сообщила пресс-служба краевого Управления по труду и занятости населения.
Только за ноябрь и первую декаду декабря сумма долга была уменьшена на 8,9 млн. рублей. Почти 85% оставшегося долга приходится на долю четырех предприятий: "Барнаулэнерго", "Бийский сахарный завод", "Рубцовский машиностроительный завод" и ГУП "Колос" Баевского района. Напомним, что в начале года общекраевой долг по зарплате составлял более 150 млн. рублей. Столь существенно сократить сумму удалось за счет выплаты задержанных зарплат рубцовскими предприятиями, в первую очередь "АлтТраком". На 11 декабря долги перед работниками имели 12 организаций.

description.hltext_display: Battalgazi de Bin Kişiye Aşure Dağıtıldı
description.content: Malatya'nın Battalgazi ilçesi Selçuk ilköğretim okulu'nda aşure etkinliği düzenlendi. Okul aile birliği,öğrenci ve öğretmenlerin düzenlediği aşure ikramına ailelerde ilgi gösterdi. Etkinlik kapsamında İlçe kaymakamı Abdulmuttalip Aksoy, Belediye Başkanı Selahattin Gürkan, daire müdürleri öğretmenler ve öğrencilere aşure ikram edildi. Kaymakam Aksoy, bu yapılan sosyal etkinliğin, birlik, beraberlik ve kardeşliğin pekişmesine katkı sağlayacağını ifade etti. Okul Müdürü Ahmet Aydın da, 'Ülkemizin birlik ve beraberliğine ihtiyaç olduğu bir dönemde öğrenci ve velilerimizin aşure kazanı etrafında bir araya gelmenin sevincini ve onurunu yaşıyoruz' dedi. Konuşmaların ardından, bin kişilik yapılan aşure dağıtıldı. (GÖR-AY-ÜNS) - MALATYA (Anadolu Ajansı) 21 dakika önce.. [2430057]

description.hltext_display: ¿Aumentar la edad legal de jubilación?
description.author: JUAN ANTONIO FERNÁNDEZ CORDÓN
description.content:
La reforma consistente en aumentar la edad legal de jubilación no suscita ningún entusiasmo entre los trabajadores, principales interesados, según han manifestado repetidamente las organizaciones que los representan. Obtiene, por el contrario, un apoyo entusiasta por parte de un selecto grupo de economistas y de las patronales. Una medida controvertida, por tanto, que, salvo acuerdo entre los agentes sociales, actualmente improbable, se impondrá por decreto, porque, se dice, es necesaria.
¿Es realmente necesaria? Una medida lo es si su adopción resuelve al menos un problema, sin provocar excesivos daños colaterales. ¿A qué problemas daría solución esta reforma? Pasemos revista a los que se citan con más frecuencia.
A mayor esperanza de vida, más trabajo. Una idea muy extendida es que las dificultades de los sistemas de pensiones provienen exclusivamente de la demografía. Un ministro de Trabajo francés lo expresó hace poco con la máxima brevedad y contundencia: "A problema demográfico, solución demográfica". Siendo el "problema", el aumento de la longevidad.
Es cierto que vivimos más años y es muy probable que la esperanza de vida después de los 65 años siga aumentando. El INE anticipa que la de los hombres pasará de los 17,8 años actuales a 21,9 años en 2048, y la de las mujeres de 21,8 a 26,2 años.
¿Qué sociedad es la nuestra, que puede transformar uno de los mayores logros de la humanidad en un problema? Es evidente que se pueden plantear diversas formas de distribuir el tiempo del que dispondremos. ¿Cuánto vamos a dedicar a trabajar más y cuánto a ocio, a la familia, a la colectividad o al enriquecimiento personal? Es una cuestión importante, que exigiría un debate en la sociedad para contrastar las preferencias individuales, las consecuencias sociales y los costes de las diferentes opciones; que exigiría también soluciones que respetaran la libertad de elegir y las diferencias de penosidad y de apego al trabajo concreto de cada uno.
Tengo amigos catedráticos que pelean en los tribunales su derecho a seguir trabajando después de los 70 años y otros, en diversas profesiones, que, con solo algo más de 50, sueñan con una jubilación anticipada.
Evitar el déficit del sistema público de pensiones. El problema es potencial, es decir, que se pretende evitar o reducir un posible déficit futuro. Porque, en estos momentos, no existe déficit y disfrutamos de uno de los sistemas de pensiones más saneados y mejor gestionados de toda la Unión Europea. Italia y Francia, por ejemplo, están en peor situación, tanto en presente como en perspectivas de futuro, lo que, curiosamente, no parece inquietar a los mercados.
El déficit es potencial, como lo era en 1995, pero admitiendo que pueda darse, su causa principal no sería la mayor longevidad, responsable solo de aproximadamente el 16% del crecimiento de la población de 65 o más años de aquí a 2049. El aumento futuro de la población mayor se explica, sobre todo, porque irán llegando a la jubilación las generaciones numerosas nacidas entre 1950 y 1976, época de alta fecundidad en España. Se trata de personas que han cotizado normalmente, de acuerdo con las reglas que imperaban cuando eran activos, que han cumplido su parte del contrato entre generaciones y que ahora pueden ver frustradas sus legítimas expectativas. Romper el pacto generacional, del que el Estado es garante, es una cuestión importante, que debe ser tratada con suma precaución.
Cuando las personas que llegarán a la jubilación en los próximos años trabajaban, cotizaban en función de la proporción de mayores, entonces inferior a la de ahora. En un sistema de capitalización hubieran tenido que contribuir bastante más, lo que hubiera provocado una presión al alza de los salarios, con efectos negativos sobre la competitividad de las empresas españolas. Incluso, en el improbable supuesto de que los trabajadores hubieran sido los únicos beneficiarios de la menor cotización, el efecto sobre la demanda, debido a su elevada propensión al consumo, beneficia a la economía española.
Algunos economistas (como R. Lee y A. Mason) han estudiado los periodos en los que la carga de dependientes crece menos que la de los activos, lo que ha ocurrido en buena parte de la vida laboral de los que ahora se jubilan, y acuñado el término de "dividendo demográfico" para designar los efectos positivos que esta situación produce sobre el crecimiento económico.
Es la medida de mayor eficacia. El argumento de la eficacia es de los más utilizados cuando el objetivo es reducir el déficit. Si aumenta la edad de jubilación, disminuye el gasto, porque se reduce el número de jubilados, y aumenta la recaudación porque las personas de 65 y 66 años pasan de jubilados a cotizantes. No hay duda de que el gasto se reduce.
Por ejemplo, si los hombres se jubilaran a los 67 en vez de a los 65 años, en las condiciones actuales casi todos verían reducida su pensión en aproximadamente un 11% (dos de los casi 18 años de media que les queda por vivir a los 65 años). Se trata de un valor promedio: perderá una proporción mayor de la jubilación quien viva menos que la media y menor quien supere la media.
Esta circunstancia no sería contraria a la equidad si las diferencias de mortalidad fueran aleatorias, es decir, si cada uno tuviese inicialmente (a los 65 años) la misma probabilidad de morir a cada edad: todo dependería entonces del destino.
Pero sabemos que no es así; existen diferencias apreciables de esperanza de vida según la categoría social. Los pobres viven menos que los ricos y el aumento de la edad de jubilación es una medida que perjudica más a los más desfavorecidos. Como, además, suelen tener pensiones más bajas, el ahorro real resultará menor que el estimado sin tener en cuenta las diferencias de mortalidad.
En cuanto a los ingresos, aumentarán si aumenta el número de ocupados que pueden cotizar. Tiene que haber trabajo para los que retrasan la jubilación sin generar paro en otros grupos de edad, para lo que sería necesario crear unos 500.000 nuevos puestos de trabajo, con los datos de 2010 (admitiendo una tasa de empleo del 60% entre 65 y 67 años) llegando hasta 730.000 en 2049.
Por tanto, parte del efecto que se atribuye al retraso de la edad de jubilación depende, en realidad, de la posibilidad de crear empleo. Alejar la jubilación no crea empleo automáticamente y, teniendo en cuenta que en España los niveles actuales de paro y de inactividad son muy elevados, las empresas no encontrarían obstáculos, por el lado de la oferta, para crear empleo, se retrase o no la edad de jubilación. La rebaja de las pensiones futuras queda como el único efecto claro de la reforma propuesta.
El retraso de la edad de jubilación puede ser una medida injusta, y resulta además engañosa, porque sus efectos sobre el déficit son más limitados de lo que se dice, al reducir las pensiones más bajas y al no incluir los ingresos generados por un hipotético aumento del número de cotizantes, que en ningún caso se deriva de la reforma.
¿Y los mercados? Hasta ahora, no han reaccionado en el sentido esperado ante las medidas de ajuste en nuestro país, o en otros, igualmente objeto de la atención preferente de los especuladores. Resulta poco creíble que el anuncio de que nos vamos a jubilar dos años más tarde vaya a lograr el milagro de aplacar a la fiera.
Reformemos el sistema de pensiones, si es necesario, pero hagámoslo sin excesivas prisas, porque nada justifica la urgencia, con transparencia sobre sus efectos, con debate y acuerdo social y no a base de infundir miedo mediante engaños o medias verdades y de denigrar injustamente nuestro sistema público actual, socavando su credibilidad.El retraso es una medida injusta y engañosa. Injusta, porque afectará sobre todo a los trabajadores más pobres. Engañosa, porque sus efectos sobre las cuentas serán muy limitados. Y no mejorará el desempleo

description.hltext_display: 谷歌将免费Gmail语音服务延长至2011年底
description.content:
12月21日消息，据国外媒体报道，Google今天表示，可以拨打美国、加拿大电话的免费Gmail语音服务将延长至2011年底，而拥有Google Voice账户的用户还能够利用Gmail接听电话。
美国国家卫生统计中心公布的统计数据显示，四分之一的美国家庭只拥有无线电话，个人对传真机需求更是非常少。但使用手机通话时往往出现掉线或听不见声音等问题，免费Gmail语音服务将改进这一状况：用户通过网络浏览器、笔记本内置喇叭和耳麦就能拨号，而且信号好、音质佳。

description.hltext_display: KV Mechelen wil met uitschuiver Duchâtelet forfaitzege bekomen
description.content:
Het Sportcomité van de Belgische Voetbalbond besloot gisteren dat uitgestelde wedstrijd Charleroi-Cercle Brugge een 0-5 forfaitnederlaag voor de Zebra’s wordt. De thuisploeg zou er immers niet alles aan gedaan hebben om het veld sneeuwvrij te maken. KV Mechelen hoopt nu dat ook zij de uitgestelde match tegen Sint-Truiden met 5-0 winnen. De uitschuiver van voorzitter Duchâtelet toont volgens KVM aan dat het veld onbespeelbaar was.Sinds het begin van dit seizoen moeten profclubs beschikken over veldverwarming. Bovendien moeten ze kunnen aantonen dat ze er, bij een eventuele afgelasting, alles aan hebben gedaan om het terrein bespeelbaar te maken. In dat geval kunnen ze overmacht inroepen. Cercle stelde Charleroi in gebreke omdat het op de wedstrijddatum niet over een bruikbare veldverwarming beschikte. Malinwa is dan weer van mening dat de tv-beelden waarop te zien is dat STVV-voorzitter Roland Duchâtelet uitglijdt terwijl hij de goede staat van het veld tracht aan te tonen, aantonen dat de Kanaries er evenmin alles aan gedaan hebben om het veld bespeelbaar te maken. Conclusie volgens KV Mechelen: er waren wel degelijk gladde stroken. Dat wordt ook gestaafd door foto’s van die bevroren en beijsde plekken. Volgens Malinwa had STVV ook niet voldoende geanticipeerd op het slechte weer en waren ook de nodige opkuiswerken niet georganiseerd om het terrein speelklaar te krijgen.
Op het feit dat voorzitter Duchâtelet uitgleed, meldde STVV het volgende: "Meneer Duchâtelet had Ambiorixschoenen aan toen hij uitgleed. Die hebben een gladde zool en daarmee kan je ook in de zomer uitschuiven. Voetballers hebben schoenen met studs. Een wezenlijk verschil".
De beslissing over de afgelaste matchen STVV-KV Mechelen en Lokeren-Cercle Brugge, werd verschoven naar volgende week dinsdag.
Bekijk de uitschuiver van Duchâtelet in de reportage van TV Limburg:
