description.hltext_display: Multa por una quema en Tama sin permiso y en un día de calor y con viento
description.content:
Foto: EP SA
SANTANDER, 22 Dic. (EUROPA PRESS) -
La Dirección General de Biodiversidad del Gobierno de Cantabria ha impuesto una multa de cien euros a un vecino de Piélagos por efectuar una quema en la localidad de Tama (Cillorigo de Liébana) sin tener permiso para ello y en un día de calor y con viento.
Según la notificación de la resolución, consultada por Europa Press, los hechos que han dado lugar a la sanción fueron denunciados por la Guardia Civil de Potes.
Los hechos ocurrieron en la tarde del pasado 19 de marzo y, según consta en la resolución, fueron comprobados a las 18,20 horas por los agentes denunciantes.
En concreto, el motivo del expediente ha sido efectuar una quema en la localidad de Tama (Cillorigo de Liébana), sin estar el expedientado en posesión de la preceptiva autorización de la Dirección General de Biodiversidad.
Además, y según consta en la resolución, dicha quema se efectuó fuera del horario permitido, sin vigilancia alguna de la misma, y en una tarde calurosa y ventosa.
Estos hechos constituyen una infracción leve a lo establecido en la Ley de Montes y lleva aparejada una multa de cien euros.
No obstante, contra la resolución, el sancionado podrá interponer recurso de alzada ante el consejero de Desarrollo Rural, Ganadería, Pesca y Biodiversidad, dentro del plazo de un mes contado a partir del día siguiente a la fecha de notificación.

description.hltext_display: Najbolji božićni koncert u Hrvatskoj, a neće ga vidjeti svi
description.content:
Iako su nastupila zvučna imena poput Josipe Lisac, Olivera, Đanija Stipaničeva i sestara Husar, kamere HRT-a zaobišle su ovogodišnji koncert
Dok za razliku od dosadašnjih nije bilo mondenih okruglih stolova i šampanjca, sve kako bi u skladu sa situacijom i oni manje imućni građani mogli uživati u njegovoj čaroliji, zvijezde večerašnjega 8. božićnoga gala koncerta u Bjelovaru, ne samo svojim imenima nego i odličnom izvedbom dale su doprinos da u punom smislu riječi događaj bude gala.
Dvije i pol tisuće posjetitelja u prepunoj sportskoj dvorani uživalo je u gospel-jazz inačicama stranih i domaćih božićnih klasika i svjetovnih pjesama koje su odlično izveli Josipa Lisac, Oliver Dragojević, Ivana i Marija Husar, Đani Stipaničev i specijalni gost američki gitarist i pjevač Freddie James Cooper, sve uz Revijski orkestar pod ravnanjem Alana Bjelinskog i mješoviti zbor bjelovarske Glazbene škole Vatroslava Lisinskog.
Time je događaj, kako među publikom, tako i među dijelom izvođača još jednom dobio potvrdu najboljeg božićnog koncerta u Hrvatskoj. Jedino ostaje žal što se ostatak Hrvatske izvan dvorane ni ove godine neće moći uvjeriti u točnost takvih ocjena. Naime, već drugi put zaredom kamere HRT-a nisu popratile događaj kako bi barem prenijele snimku njegove čarolije, zbog čega je vrlo jasno negodovao dio izvođača, odnosno sestre Husar i Đ. Stipaničev.

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Post sichert sich milliardenschwere Kreditlinie
description.content:
dpa-afx BONN. Die Deutsche Post hat sich kurz vor dem Jahreswechsel eine milliardenschwere Kreditlinie gesichert. Der neue Verfügungsrahmen von zwei Mrd. Euro habe eine Laufzeit von fünf Jahren, teilte der Post
Gewährt wird die Kreditlinie von einem Bankenkonsortium, zu dem unter anderem die Citibank, die Commerzbank

description.hltext_display: La Juvenil: mucho más que pastas
description.content:
Nueva campaña de La Juvenil para la temporada de fiestas
(Diciembre 2010) La Juvenil pensó en las necesidades de sus clientes y preparó un verdadero menú de soluciones para la temporada de fiestas, época del año en la que se multiplican los encuentros, reuniones y eventos.
Bajo el concepto “Porque nunca queda bien llegar con las manos vacías y porque siempre queda cómodo pasar por La Juvenil” la oferta se amplía y, además de las mejores pastas, se suman platos fríos como matambre casero, Vitel Thoné, ensalada rusa, ensalada Waldorf, lengua a la vinagreta, peceto con salsa criolla, terrinas y tortillas, arrollado de pollo, salpicón de ave y arrollados de pionono, entre otras especialidades exclusivas de cada sucursal, como el carré de cerdo.
La campaña “¿Qué nos toca llevar?” fue ideada y desarrollada por la agencia IQ Argentina, liderada por Hernán Cambiaso y Gonzalo Ladrón Guevara (creatividad, desarrollo e implementación operativa en todos los puntos de venta).
¿Hay algo más lindo que juntarse a celebrar? Sí. Juntarse a celebrar y que la comida ya esté resuelta.
Acerca de La Juvenil
Con más de cinco décadas de vida la marca ha logrado instalarse, crecer y prosperar, manteniéndose fiel al formato de empresa familiar. Cuenta con 21 locales ubicados estratégicamente en Capital y provincia de Buenos Aires. Es líder absoluto en elaboración de pastas artesanales y ofrece en su carta una amplia variedad de opciones que incluyen tartas, empanadas, pizzas, salsas, platos fríos, panadería y postres.
www.la-juvenil.com.ar

description.hltext_display: Conshohocken officer charged in thefts from parking meters
description.author: Jeremy Roebuck
description.content:
A Conshohocken police sergeant has been suspended without pay after admitting he stole hundreds of dollars in coins collected from borough parking meters, prosecutors said.
Antony Santoro, a 22-year veteran of the force, confessed to skimming quarters by the handful from parking collection funds on at least 14 occasions, Montgomery County District Attorney Risa Vetri Ferman said.
Before his arrest Tuesday, investigators found $386 in coins that Santoro allegedly took while on patrol with the borough's parking enforcement officers and hid in his personal vehicle during one day's patrol.
In a statement released Tuesday, Police Chief Michael Orler said such actions amounted to a betrayal of the trust of fellow officers, and more important, a betrayal of the trust the community places in its police.
Prosecutors said Santoro first came under suspicion in July when, after assisting parking officers on their rounds, he was seen transferring a stuffed manila envelope from his patrol unit to his personal car.
County detectives later trailed him and observed him taking coins from collection bins when parking officers weren't looking, prosecutors said.
Santoro is charged with multiple counts of theft, theft by failure to make required disposition of funds, and receiving stolen property.
Contact staff writer Jeremy Roebuck at 610-313-8212 or jroebuck@phillynews.com.

李宁今日股价再次大幅走低，最新报17.21港元，跌4.25%，成交16607万元。
大和发表报告称，将李宁6个月目标价由20.30港元降至18.20港元，这是基于0.85倍的市盈率/预测盈利增长率(耐克公司相应的数据为1.3倍)；维持李宁持有评级，相信过去3个月该股走软已部分反映了公司盈利前景平平的因素。大和指，李宁公司进行分销网络的重建，如果获得成功，将提高李宁品牌产品在二线、三线城市的需求，因此成为股价的长期利好催化剂。

description.hltext_display: Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour 2011: All around the World
description.content:
on 21.12.2010
Comment
Die spektakuläre FMX-Serie macht 2011 in sechs Ländern und auf vier Kontinenten Halt.
Bereits im vergangenen Jahr hat die Red Bull X-Fighter World Tour nicht nur mit ihren sportlichen Leistungen, sondern auch mit ihren tollen Locations für Maßstäbe in der FMX-Szene gesetzt. Mat Rebeaud, Levi Sherwood und Co. sprangen vor den ägyptischen Pyramiden von Gizeh oder auf dem Roten Platz in Russlands Hauptstadt Moskau.
In der Saison 2011 – dem zehnten Jahr des Bestehens der Freestyle Motocross-Serie – will man dem Ganzen noch eins drauf setzen. In insgesamt sechs Ländern und auf vier Kontinenten wird die Red Bull X-Fighters World Tour 2011 Station machen.
Auftakt ist am 15.April in den Vereinigten Arabischen Emiraten, danach geht es am 28.Mai nach Brasilien bevor es am 24.Juni in Italien weitergeht. Spanien am 15.Juli und Polen am 6.August komplettieren die europäischen Stopps im Terminplan der Red Bull X-Fighters Serie 2011.
Das Finale wird im kommenden Jahr am 17.September in Australien ausgetragen, wo die Red Bull X-Fighters-Serie zum ersten Mal in ihrer zehnjährigen Geschichte gastieren wird.

description.hltext_display: 美国知名媒体政治军事评论家: 牵一发动全身 朝鲜丢不得
description.content:
美国知名媒体政治军事评论家:牵一发动全身 朝鲜丢不得
作者:潮水
最近，因韩国在延平岛向朝鲜领有海域开炮，朝鲜还击韩国挑衅，引发朝鲜半岛紧张局势升级。

美国媒体军事政治评论家: 美航母入黄海 中国反对建航母者噤声 (2010-11-28)
北洋军阀头子们的结局：一个军事政治集团的始末 (2009-12-04)
东北亚人就是能干 朝韩政治把戏走向战争门槛 (2010-12-20)
生命绝唱：解放军南京政治学院博导严高鸿倒在研究生论文评判会上 (2010-12-19)
先是11月28日至12月1日美韩在黄海军演。后是12月3日至8日美日在日本海能登半岛海域军演。然后又是12月21日韩国不顾朝鲜警告，恢复延平岛常态炮击军演。韩国更放言，一旦朝鲜还击，韩国战机将袭击朝鲜军事设施。紧张局势一触即发。最后，由于中国从中斡旋，朝鲜以不值得回击为由，偃旗息鼓。紧张局势暂时得以缓和。但是，朝鲜半岛武装冲突并未落幕。北南武力对峙仍然在发展之中。朝韩双方剑拔弩张。
在此非常时期，有国内军方背景人士发声，说一旦朝鲜半岛南北双方开打，中国应派军入朝30公里，设立“缓冲隔离区”，以防止朝鲜难民流入中国境内。这一说法对中国危害甚大。它严重损害了中国在东北亚的地缘政治战略利益。原因有四：
一是，朝鲜是中国在东北亚的门户，其地缘政治战略地位对中国生死攸关，绝对不可以轻视。持上述观点者把朝鲜看成可有可无之一隅，不是历史的无知，就是战略上的短视。
朝鲜是中国在东北亚的地缘政治战略门户。在中国近代史上，美国视中国晋身世界强国地位之开端始于1950至1953年的三年朝鲜战争。美国同时也认为，中国在此前彻底沦为列强奴役之下的殖民地地位，亦始于在朝鲜发生的1894年中日甲午战争。中国成也朝鲜，败也朝鲜。不论中国喜欢还是不喜欢朝鲜，中国都必须在任何时期，任何环境下，保有朝鲜这一位于东北亚战略要冲之地，作为隔离美日韩军事同盟与中国之间的战略缓冲区域。
笔者的父亲耿青，又名杨朝汉，1952年10月率原邓华部队头等主力师第130师，入朝参加朝鲜金城战役，为歼灭韩军首都师白虎团，打开穿插分队的突破口，立下赫赫武功。朝鲜停战以后，该师隶属朝鲜西海岸防御指挥部。驻地距离延平岛并不远。1955年授予上校军衔。笔者本人亦曾于1957年至1958年在朝鲜西海岸该师驻地住留一年，1958年随部队撤军归国。因此，笔者知道许多关于朝鲜在此间的直接负面经验。例如，志愿军归国就是金日成提出的要求。朝鲜驱逐中国军队出境，全面依附于前苏联。之后，朝鲜曾经铲除志愿军烈士陵园墓地；篡改朝鲜战争历史，把志愿军打下的朝鲜半壁江山说成是朝方凭借一己之力摆平美国，并写进朝鲜教科书，在在罄竹难书，诸多令中方所不齿之事。安知天不遂金日成所愿，前苏联解体，朝鲜成孤家寡人。
中国和平崛起，朝鲜落伍，民生凋敝。朝鲜又屡屡拒绝中方有关要求朝鲜效法中国改革开放的好言相劝。但是，朝鲜之对于中国的地缘政治战略地位，仍然一如六十年前一样对中国生死攸关。不论朝鲜的今天与昨天如何教中国爱恨交加，中国都必须把维护朝鲜的安全看成是自己的责任。须知，朝鲜安则中国安，朝鲜亡则中国危矣。
二是，有“放弃”朝鲜之嫌疑，使韩国有可能因之误判，冒险挑起朝鲜半岛战火，一发而不可收也。持上述观点者绝口不提朝鲜的安全对中国之重要，而仅仅着眼于朝鲜半岛武装冲突发生后，朝鲜溃败，难民涌入中国。这无异于“放弃”朝鲜，而令韩国更加变本加厉，有恃无恐，大胆以致疯狂军事挑衅朝鲜，引发朝鲜半岛武装冲突升级。
绝对不可以小视在美国影响力之外，韩国自身的能量。1952年底，美国在朝鲜战争中已经精疲力竭，特别是经过美方所称的“金化攻势”中的“三角山”之役，中方称五圣山上甘岭战役，再也无力挑战中国人民志愿军。因此，美方主张在朝鲜开城坐下来谈判停火。但是，令人没有想到的事情发生了。美方关于停战的建议遭到李承晚为首的韩国政府的反对。李承晚要到鸭绿江饮他的战马。结果，朝鲜战争拖到中国人民志愿军在金城反击战，歼灭李韩首都师主力“白虎团”，把李韩军打残，才使韩方最后接受停火。今天，韩国的李明博与历史上的李承晚似曾相识，有得一比，李明博对朝鲜喊打，喊杀，不绝于耳。韩国单独冒进的可能性也是存在的。因此，中国绝对不能对如此战争狂人言“放弃”朝鲜。
中方不仅不能“放弃”朝鲜，回避朝鲜的安全问题。而且，中国必须恢复对朝鲜的某种形式军事结盟关系，对朝鲜的国家安全作出某种“核保护伞”承诺；“透明化”地军援朝鲜；甚至在必要时，应朝方要求，重新驻军朝鲜。一方面，使朝鲜在与韩国的军事对峙中，扭转目前的“一边倒”绝对劣势，转变成为均势；另一方面，使韩国在维系与中国的更加紧密的经济关系的同时，对中国作为朝鲜的后盾而有所忌惮，因此不敢冒然武力北进。才能真正达成朝鲜放心弃核，韩断犯北念想。
三是，鼓励美国的冒险政策。持上述观点者有悖于中方应对美国东北亚地缘政治战略政策的连续性。有鼓励美方军事冒险的嫌疑。
1994年美国防长佩里访华，同中国磋商，美国欲对朝鲜核设施实施空袭，遭到中方反对，美国作罢。现在，说在中朝边境，朝方一侧建“缓冲隔离区”，等于告知美方，中国“不顾”美国教唆韩国对朝鲜的军事打击升级，造成朝鲜崩溃的后果。等同于为美方的入侵朝鲜开绿灯。
冷战结束后，美国一超独大，自信之下，开始在全球战略收缩，东北亚美军从二十万减少到十万。美国的战略收缩，客观上造成了对韩日两国的控制松绑，这一波冲击对韩日两国造成不同程度的影响。
朝鲜半岛的政治版图发生了微妙变化，金日成提出成立“高丽联邦”；金大中回应“阳光政策”，以对朝鲜的“粮援”取代军事“对抗”，以“阳光”化解宿怨。到了卢武铉执政初期，韩国舆论界甚至出现了“是否有必要维系美韩同盟？”的疑问，韩国对朝鲜与中国的关系趋热，韩国向左转。
美国的战略收缩，使日本帝国从战后的“冬眠蛰伏”中苏醒。日本保有天皇制及明智天皇“开拓万里之海疆，宣布皇威于四方”对外扩张之国策、1868年开始的为天皇对外扩张侵略战争而效命的靖国神社国家祭祀制、为日本帝国对外扩张贯彻始终的皇国史观，这三大军国主义复活支柱开始发生作用。“日本走向何方？”“日本要超越历史”（见日本前外交官小原雅博所著《日本走向何方》）。举起左手，驱逐美军普天间军事基地出日本。举起右手，寻求“对等的美日同盟”、“正常国家”地位，扩军备战，借美日安保染指中国钓鱼岛；在美日安保无效的中国东海油气田，武力威吓中国承认日本“中间线”；制造冲之鸟岛，把领海基点向南延伸1000公里，侵入中国大陆架经济区海域。日本从中国牟取了战后所梦寐以求的几乎所有利益。
韩日两国的动向引起美国的高度警觉。特别是中国的和平崛起，令美国一超独大的自信消逝。美国在西太平洋、东北亚由战略收缩改为战略扩张。美国积极推行冒险政策，打朝鲜牌。通过食言，拒绝兑现两座轻水堆给朝鲜；依据美韩、美日同盟关系，不断举行针对朝鲜的军事演习。刺激朝鲜激烈反应。然后再利用朝鲜的反应威吓韩国，声称要从韩国撤走全部美军退往日本。美国的冒险政策奏效。“在大国的夹缝中求生存”（前韩国总统卢武铉语）的韩国“阳谷政策”刹车。卢武铉在政府在外交通商部下属的外交安保研究院设立中国研究中心。中国研究中心是韩国政府首个加入特定国家名称的政府层面的智库。通过研究中心，积极策划反华政策。例如，煽动韩国对中国的“白头山”领土要求；盗掘中国辽宁境内的中国古代少数民族高句丽古墓壁画；篡改历史，在联合国抢夺中国传统节日的申遗权；废除汉字；拆毁中国明朝援朝抗日的“壬辰之役”之后, 朝鲜李朝报恩中国的“大报寺”；改韩国首都汉语名称“汉城”为“首尔”；等一系列反华仇华活动，向美国献媚。韩国向右转。
日本向右转的脚步比韩国走的更远。2004年，日本在中国的山东省近海经济区海域，打响了战后的第一枪。日本军舰侵入中国专属经济区海域，开炮击沉一艘朝鲜渔船。并且在事后对中国外交部只有口头反对，没有派军舰武力拦截的外交抗议，不肖一顾，公然第二次强行武力侵入同一中国专属经济区海域，武力强行打捞朝鲜沉船。中方在此次事件的软弱与退让，激起日本对中国更大的侵略欲望，中国“从此国无宁日”。2010年，日本修订“新防卫大纲”，公然把中国列人日本防卫的“假想敌”作为对华政策的核心（见附文）。
报有不同地缘政治目的的韩日两国重新绑缚在美国的战车上，随美国的冒险政策起舞。这使美国的东北亚地缘战略扩张冒险政策附加了新内容。美国开始动辄派航母到黄海军演。而中方持上述观点者，对朝鲜的表态，成为美国的帮凶，自毁藩篱，引狼入室。
四是，诱发日本浑水摸鱼。持上述观点者，忽略了在后冷战时期日本军国主义复活这一事实，向日本发出“不援助”，“不支持”朝鲜的错误信号。鼓励日本推行“对外扩张”的帝国国策，乘机坐收渔人之利。
朝鲜是“日本帝国”的前殖民地，日本有打回朝鲜，重占朝鲜的野心；日本防卫省提出“先发制人”空袭朝鲜宁边核设施计划，企图以此突破和平宪法的限制；日本企图武力借机染指韩国，以武力护侨为名，派兵进驻韩国，而这正是甲午战争之前，日本派兵进驻朝鲜的同一个借口，虽然韩国称日本派兵进驻韩国“莫名其妙”，但是，南北战争果真打起来，日本派兵入韩，韩国无可奈何；日韩之间有“竹岛”（韩国称独岛，现在韩国控制之下）领土争端，朝鲜半岛大战爆发，日本必然浑水摸鱼，夺回“竹岛”；美国操弄朝鲜议题，项庄舞剑，意在沛公，日本心领神会，日美军演假借朝鲜之名义，剑锋指向中国。
附文：《日媒称制衡中国军力成为日对华政策核心》
新的《防卫计划大纲》在新一轮内阁会议中通过，它取代了目前已实施6年的以最小防卫力量为核心原则的旧大纲。按照新大纲规定，自卫队将被均衡部署在全国。实际上，新大纲设置的新原则是追求动态防卫能力以灵活应对各种威胁。
同时，它呼吁在日本西南岛屿包括冲绳增强防卫能力，而关注中国军队建设被认为关系到到东亚地区以及国际社会整体利益。
在新大纲中出现的“动态防卫能力”概念在观察家看来是为了追求更有效的军事威慑以及对任何军事威胁给予更可能的回应，它将改善自卫队执行任务能力，比如快速侦察和巡逻。这真实体现了对冷战时期防卫政策的一个新突破。
中国每年快速提高军费开支且缺乏透明性，今年军费开支就是过去22年的总合。此外，近年在日本周围海域可以看到中国海军活动不断增加，中国为发展海军和空军也投入了巨额军费。
如果中国继续扩军并增强在日本周边的活动，这将成为日本以及整个亚太地区的不稳定因素。因此，基于目前安全局势对防卫大纲进行的修订是有效的也是必须的。
尽管如此，考虑到中国在国际政治舞台的作用和中日关系的未来，显然制衡中国军事力量不应成为日本对华政策的核心。
日本现在需要在各个领域启动一个包容的对华战略，包括在政治、经济、外交和安全方面，否则日本与这个日益强大的近邻的关系将越来越僵。
日本已接受了所谓的对华接触政策，与美国合作将中国拉入国际社会体系并鼓励其对国际社会事务承担责任，遵守国际法律和惯例。因此，日本不应过分对抗中国军力并引发军备竞赛，这不利于区域安全。日本应寻求更加平衡的对华政策。
向好友推荐本贴：
标题：《 》
地址： http://ido.3mt.com.cn/Article/201012/show2087922c30p1.html
上一贴：麻木 我的军事技术发明被谁用了？
下一贴：还有台湾问题 : 就象被美国牵着的'牛鼻子"被美国操控着

description.hltext_display: Air chaos eases as Dublin flights resume
description.content:
Disruptions are still hampering many flights in and out of Dublin despite a reopening of the city's airport this morning.
Flights to destinations such as Luton, London Stansted and Leeds have already been cancelled this morning, as well as to a number of continental destinations.
A limited number of cancellations are likely to continue up to mid morning, according to the Dublin Airport Authority website.
The airport had yesterday been forced to postpone the reopening of its runways several times, and finally decided to held off until this morning.
Hundreds of stranded passengers again spent the night sleeping at the airport.
Some services to and from Cork Airport are also being disrupted this morning but Shannon Airport is so far operating normally.
Flights are being hampered by continuing restrictions at airports outside the country, and by aircraft being off station.
With conditions easing a little, other transport services are also recovering, through there are still problems with some Bus Eireann and Dublin Bus services.
The National Roads Authority has warned, however, that freezing weather is continuing to lengthen journey times in many parts of the country.
The NRA says that fresh salt supplies are expected to arrive later today and will be distributed immediately to priority counties.
London's Heathrow, the world's busiest international airport, and Frankfurt Airport, the biggest on the continent, have both said that severe disruptions in their services are easing.
Eurostar, operator of the high-speed train between London and Paris/Brussels, said it would resume normal check-in service today, but has asked passengers not to show up until an hour before departure "to avoid congestion and an unnecessary wait".

description.hltext_display: Tumblr的2010年有多成功？
description.content:
据国外媒体报道,读写网正在进行一年一度的最佳初创企业评选。自2004开始，读写网每年都会评选出“最佳初创企业”。之前胜出的企业分别有Flickr、37Signals、YouTube(于2006年被Google收购)、Twitter(2007年，当时还未成互联网主流)、Zoho、Aardvark。其中大部分企业现今都已发展壮大。在评选最佳初创企业时，读写网会把评选范围设定在小型规模的企业中(员工少于100人)，并且这些企业都为互联网行业带来了新鲜的曙光。
今年，竞争也相当激烈。Foursquare在签到应用上大获全胜，Flipboard具有革命性的iPad应用给人以无限的想象空间，Instagram在图片分享应用上初展头角。然而，给读写网留下最深印象的却是来自纽约的Tumblr。
2010年热门趋势之一便是Tumblr 、Posterous等‘轻博客’服务的崛起。利用这项服务，用户只需点击鼠标便可快速发布、分享自己喜欢的内容。2010年大量传统媒体公司也开始涌向Tumblr。
创立于2007年的Tumblr，今年发展势头强劲，甚至击败了与其势力最为接近的竞争对手，另一家轻博客服务商Posterous。Tumblr取得了如此惊人的成绩，然而支撑它背后的员工数量只有16人，到2010年底预计会达到20人。但是，Tumblr却有雄厚的资金支持，据说该公司现在已经募集到4000万美金。其中3000万美金来自于现有投资机构，包括风险投资机构星火资本(Spark Capital)、 风险投资公司合广投资(Union Square Ventures)以及新加入投资方红杉资本(Sequoia Capital)(早在1999年，红杉资本曾投资过Google)。
据称，Tumblr如今拥有1100万个博客注册用户，但近期内可能步调会有所放缓。
Wordpress vs.Tumblr
最近，读写网对大众的博客服务Wordpress和Tumblr进行了一番比较，结果发现，在人均页面访问量上，Tumblr比Wordpress多，且在页面浏览总量上，Tumblr是Wordpress的两倍。虽然Wordpress在发布者和访客数量上仍然占据优势，但是在用户参与度上，Tumblr无疑做得更好。
进入2011年，以雄厚资金作为后盾，Tumblr必将开足马力，准备为页面浏览量增长而大展拳脚。据预测，网络内容监管是2011年的网络趋势之一，因此，对纽约初创公司来说，来年会成为另一个引爆点。

description.hltext_display: Severin out for two months after ankle op
description.content:
DUNDEE UNITED defender Scott Severin faces up to eight weeks on the sidelines after successfully undergoing an ankle operation.The former Hearts, Aberdeen and Watford man was checked in for a tidy-up procedure after breaking down in training a fortnight ago.
Severin will make a full recovery but boss Peter Houston expects to be without him until the start of February at the earliest.
He said: "I have spoken to Scott, it went well and he's out of hospital. The doctors tidied up a bit of cartilage that had come loose and he'll be out for six to eight weeks.
"He had to get it done, there was no choice because he was feeling quite a bit of pain. It's disappointing to be without him, especially so early in his career here. But he's a great boy, he's desperate to play and he'll be pushing himself to get back as soon as he can.
"If we can get him back for the last three or four months of the season that would be a major boost for the team at an important time."
Mihael Kovacevic is also stepping up his recuperation after knee surgery and will resume full training in January with Hamilton on.
The Tangerines have had five matches postponed recently and Tuesday's encounter against Rangers was the latest to fall foul of the weather.
Tayside police have been reluctant to allow games to go ahead because of the state of the surrounding streets so United have accepted an offer from Tayside company Jamiesons to help out by clearing the snow and ice.
Director Gibby Haggart said: We have been too long without a game and are desperate to get the Hamilton game on. The weather forecast is positive and we are not expecting more snow until after Boxing Day. "We'll be doing everything we can to get the game on."Amazon.co.uk Widgets Share... addthis_pub = 'netro42'; Next story... CHELSEA are at the centre of another international transfer storm after luring promisi... Get RSS

description.hltext_display: NYC Sanitation Worker Killed
description.content:
NEW YORK - New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg says his "thoughts and prayers" are with the family of a municipal sanitation worker who was struck and killed by a car.
Bloomberg said that 39-year-old Angel Roldan was hit by a car outside his sanitation garage in the Bronx on Tuesday.
Sanitation Commissioner John J. Doherty says Roldan was a "dedicated employee" and that he will be missed.
The driver of the car was being questioned by police. No charges are expected to be filed.
The mayor said Roldan had worked for the Department of Sanitation for 11 years. He is survived by his wife, an 18-year-old daughter and a 14-year-old son.
His wife, Rena, works for the police department as a traffic enforcement agent.
Copyright AP Modified,

event_or_fact.property: Roldan was a "dedicated employee" and that he will be missed

description.hltext_display: الكونغرس يوافق على مشروع قانون لتمويل الحكومة حتى 4 مارس
description.author: Aaram.net
description.content: واشنطن وافق الكونغرس الاميركي على مشروع قانون توفيقي لتمويل عمليات الحكومة الاتحادية لبضعة أشهر مع تأجيل المشرعين معركة بشأن الإنفاق والعجز الي العام الجديد. ويعطي المشروع -الذي يمول الحكومة حتى الرابع من مارس اذار- الجمهوريين فرصة لمحاولة تمرير تخفيضات كبيرة في الميزانية عندما يسيطرون على مجلس النواب ويزيدون عدد اعضائهم في مجلس الشيوخ اوائل العام القادم. ويذهب المشروع الان الي الرئيس باراك اوباما لتوقيعه ليصبح قانونا. وسيحرم المشروع اوباما من زيادات في الميزانية يسعى اليها لتنفيذ اصلاحاته لنظام الرعاية الصحية وتنظيم القطاع المالي. وسيمنع ايضا اي زيادة في الرواتب للموظفين الاتحاديين غير العسكريين لمدة عامين وهو اجراء اقترحه اوباما لاظهار انه مستعد لاتخاذ خطوات لضغط الانفاق بعد سنوات من زيادات في الميزانية. ووافق مجلس النواب يوم الثلاثاء على المشروع بأغلبية 193 صوتا ضد 165 صوتا بعد ان أقره مجلس الشيوخ في وقت سابق من اليوم نفسه. وبحلول موعد نهاية سريان المشروع في الرابع من مارس سيكون لدى الجمهوريين قدرة أكبر في التأثير على أولويات الانفاق للفترة الباقية من السنة المالية الحالية التي تنتهي في الثلاثين من سبتمبر ايلول. ويقول الجمهوريون في مجلس النواب انهم يريدون خفض الانفاق بمقدار 100 مليار دولار وهو شيء من غير المرجح ان يوافق عليه اوباما والديمقراطيون الذين سيظلون يسيطرون على مجلس الشيوخ. رويترز

description.hltext_display: Duty to Warn and the Learned Intermediary Doctrine
Red Bull Crashed Ice: Das Starterfeld steht
description.content:
Red Bull Crashed Ice: Das Starterfeld steht
on 21.12.2010
Comment
Die Spannung steigt: Mit dem Ende des 15. Qualifiers am 21. Dezember in Germering steht das Starterfeld der Red Bull Crashed Ice Weltmeisterschaft in München fest. Insgesamt 90 Athleten aus Deutschland, den europäischen Nachbarländern und sogar Kanada konnten sich für den Auftakt der Ice Cross Downhill-WM am 15. Januar 2011 im Olympiapark München qualifizieren.
Frankfurt, Köln, Düsseldorf, Berlin und Hamburg sind nur die größten deutschen Städte, die in den letzten zwei Monaten Qualifier für das Red Bull Crashed Ice in München abhielten. Dabei mussten die Teilnehmer in Eishallen in einem Hindernisparcours über eine Rampe springen, Hürden überwinden oder durch Slalomstangen fahren. Die jeweils sechs Schnellsten dieser 15 Qualifier treten am 15. Januar 2011 beim WM-Auftakt der Ice Cross Downhill-WM 2011 in München an. „Das sportliche Niveau war im Vergleich zum Vorjahr deutlich höher“, vermeldete der Sportliche Leiter Oliver Deby zufrieden. „Dies lässt auch für den WM-Auftakt in München spannende Duelle erwarten.“ Neben Deutschen, Holländern, Österreichern, Schweizern, Tschechen und Slowaken nahmen sogar zwei Starter aus Kanada an den Qualifiern teil.
Wie alle WM-Rennen bei Red Bull Crashed Ice dauert auch der Stopp in München insgesamt drei Tage. Die Ausscheidungswettkämpfe an den ersten zwei Tagen erfolgen unter Ausschluss der Öffentlichkeit. Hier finden zunächst zwei Einzelzeitfahren statt: Im nationalen „Shoot Out“-Rennen werden die 64 besten Athleten herausgefiltert, die bei den deutschen Qualifiern das Ticket nach München gelöst haben. Im internationalen „Shoot Out“ starten dann alle, die sich in anderen Ländern qualifiziert haben, sowie die Top 32 der Weltrangliste. Auch hier erreichen die 64 schnellsten Ice Cross Downhiller die nächste Runde. Beim Qualifying treffen dann die 128 Athleten erstmals im Viererduell aufeinander. Die 64 besten Kufenspezialisten dieser Ausscheidung gehen schließlich beim WM-Auftaktrennen am Samstag vor erwarteten 25.000 Zuschauern an den Start.
Wer dieses spektakuläre Rennen am 15. Januar 2011 im Olympiapark München erleben will, sollte sich bald ein Ticket sichern. Denn der Run auf die 25.000 Plätze ist groß. Stehplatzkarten mit Sicht auf die Strecke, die Live-Bühne und die Videowalls sind für 18 Euro (12 Euro ermäßigt) über München Ticket und bei 170 München-Ticket-Vorverkaufsstellen erhältlich.
Im Ticketpreis inbegriffen sind ein Open Air-Konzert der Münchner Hip-Hopper Blumentopf ab 20.15 Uhr, das Warmup-Programm ab 15 Uhr am Coubertinplatz mit einem Kurzauftritt der Hip-Hop-Band Eljot Quent um 18.30 Uhr und der Après Ice Cross Ausklang mit DJ nach dem Blumentopf-Konzert bis 22 Uhr.
Das Rennen im Olympiapark München ist der Auftakt zur Red Bull Crashed Ice World Championship 2011, bei der die schnellsten Ice Cross Downhiller der Welt in vier Tourstopps ihren Weltmeister suchen. 64 Athleten stürzen sich in Eishockey-Montur jeweils zu viert im direkten Duell in einen eindrucksvollen Parcours. Dieser ist mit Steilkurven, Wellen, Sprüngen und Hindernissen gespickt, rund 400 Meter lang und fünf Meter breit. Bei jedem Lauf der Red Bull Crashed Ice Weltmeisterschaft werden Punkte vergeben: Der Sieger erhält 1000 Punkte, für den 100. Platz gibt es noch 0,5 Zähler. Wer nach den vier Stationen in München, Valkenburg (NED), Moskau (RUS) und Quebec (CAN) die meisten Punkte gesammelt hat, ist Red Bull Crashed Ice Weltmeister 2011. Amtierender Champion ist der Garmisch-Partenkirchener Martin Niefnecker.
FACTBOX RED BULL CRASHED ICE 2011 MÜNCHEN
Datum: 15. Januar 2011, 15 bis 22 Uhr
Ort: Olympiapark München
15.00-18.00 Uhr: Warm up Programm
18.00-20.15 Uhr: Red Bull Crashed Ice WM-Rennen, Finale der 64 Top-Athleten
18.30-18.45 Uhr: Konzert Eljot Quent
20.15-22.00 Uhr: Konzert Blumentopf & Après Ice Cross mit DJ
Erwachsene: 18,- Euro
Ermäßigte: 12,- Euro (Schüler, Studenten, Berufsschüler, Wehr- und Zivildienstleistende, Schwerbehinderte + Begleitperson, Rentner ab 65 Jahre, gegen Vorlage eines entsprechenden Ausweises)
Kinder bis 12 Jahre: Eintritt frei in Begleitung eines Erziehungsberechtigten („Nullkarte“ erforderlich für Eintritt, erhältlich über München Ticket)
VIP-Tickets: 250,- Euro (Zutritt zum Coubertin-Komplex inkl. Catering & Getränke, Zutritt zur VIP-Area im Zielbereich, Aftershowparty)
Ticket-Specials: 10 % Vergünstigung für Vereine/Gruppen ab 25 Personen (über Frau Köstner, Tel. 089 / 36 81 940; wochentags von 9 bis 17 Uhr)
München Ticket, www.muenchenticket.de
Hotline München Ticket
Tel. 0180 / 54 81 81 81 (Mo. bis Fr. von 9 bis 20; Sa von 9 bis 16 Uhr, So von 10 bis 16 Uhr; 0,14 € pro Minute max. dt. Festnetz, 0,42 € pro Minute max. Mobilfunk)
Vorverkaufsstellen: 170 München Ticket-Vorverkaufsstellen im Großraum München
Abendkasse: Im Olympiapark
Die Red Bull Crashed Ice World Championship beginnt am 15. Januar 2011 in München. Infos zu Programm und Tickets hier!

description.hltext_display: KP plays down verbals
description.content:
England firebrand Kevin Pietersen says the alleged verbal barrage from Australia throughout the third Test was tame by Ashes standards.
Much has been made of Australia's increased sledging in Perth after several spot fires broke out over the four days.
Paceman Peter Siddle and England batsman Matt Prior enjoyed a heated exchange, while Mitchell Johnson was also involved in several verbal stoushes with the tourists as Australia levelled the series at 1-1 with an emphatic 267-run victory.
But Pietersen insists the mood at the WACA was no different to the opening two Tests in Brisbane and Adelaide, and a far cry from the previous three Ashes series he's been involved in.
'I think you guys (the media) feed them some good lines and they talk a lot don't they,' Pietersen quipped on Wednesday.
'Nothing's different. I don't see anything different at all.'
'I played against Australia I don't know how many Test matches now (15) and believe me, the first time I played against Australia and the second time out here with the likes of (Shane) Warne, (Glenn) McGrath etc, etc, there were some pretty big verbal contests.'
'But no, I haven't seen or heard anything different (in Perth) to anything that's happened in the first two Test matches, let alone last year in England.'
'There's not really any big chirpers or sledgers (in the current Australian team).'
'It's just England versus Australia,' he said.
'It's an Ashes series, blokes get a little bit red-misted occasionally, and you're allowed to do that on both teams - things happen.'
'We're playing for that little urn, it's historic, it's huge.'
Pietersen is adamant the tourists have put the disappointment of Perth behind them, as they look to retain the Ashes with a win in either Melbourne or Sydney.
'I think we're all disappointed with what happened last week but we're excited about this week's challenges.'
'We're 1-1 going into a Melbourne Test match (in front of) 100,000 people, if you're not excited then I don't reckon you should be doing what we do.'
The 30-year-old openly admitted Johnson's blistering spell on day two 'took us by surprise', but warned the Poms will be better prepared come Boxing Day.
'We knew he could swing it but we didn't realise he could swing it that much,' he said.
'He obviously did some really good work in the week that he had off, but we're going to be a lot better prepared for it here in Melbourne, so we'll play him a lot better.'
Asked if believes the rumours Australia have instructed the MCG curator to prepare a spicy wicket in the wake of their Perth success, Pietersen warned the hosts to tread carefully.
'Of course they're going to do it, they've just had success in Perth, but we've had success around the world on bouncy wickets,' he said.
'We lost that Test match within half an hour at 5-20, that's where we lost that Test match with full swinging balls that knocked over our top order.'
'We didn't lose the Test match to a bouncy wicket ... so I don't think the wicket's going to play any different part.'
Meanwhile, Pietersen is convinced Australian captain Ricky Ponting will play despite a nursing a broken little finger on his left hand, while he also confirmed England quick James Anderson will play despite suffering a side strain in Perth.
'I've played a full series against Sri Lanka with a broken small finger so I don't see it as a big deal,' he said.

It's just England versus Australia; It's an Ashes series, blokes get a little bit red-misted occasionally, and you're allowed to do that on both teams - things happen.
We're playing for that little urn, it's historic, it's huge.

We knew he could swing it but we didn't realise he could swing it that much; He obviously did some really good work in the week that he had off, but we're going to be a lot better prepared for it here in Melbourne, so we'll play him a lot better.

description.hltext_display: 还有台湾问题 : 就象被美国牵着的'牛鼻子"被美国操控着
description.content:
战争，是化解经济危机的灵丹妙药，美国岂能不用？ 朝韩战争肯定要打，只是时间和规模问题！
启动这台战争机器的马达不是朝鲜的反应是否过激，是否存在某个节点上的擦枪走火，而在于美国策动这场战争的目的。
房价为何涨得邪乎 如何牵住房价的牛鼻子？ (2010-03-22)
提高党的建设科学化水平要牵住“牛鼻子” (2009-10-30)

对于汽车常见小问题的解决方法 (2010-12-22)
违规使用土地？谁有问题谁下岗 (2010-12-22)
历史早已证明，战争，是化解经济危机的灵丹妙药，美国岂能不用？美国为了实现全球一超独霸的战略目的，是不惜毁弃它曾经的理想的。
美国现在已经坚定地认为：自己的意志可以凌驾于世界的安全、利益和秩序之上了。――世界，必须要以美国的意志为转移。
所以，美国必须把它在东亚的主导权明确表示给中国政府、尤其是老百姓看――我通过越南、菲律宾等国家告诉中国，我在南海说了算；我通过日本告诉中国，我在东海说了算；我通过韩国告诉中国，我在黄海说了算！
什么，不让我的航母进黄海吗？我略施小计即可。美国要检验李明博的忠诚度，只需在朝韩问题上制造些争端和摩擦即可。美国要检验菅直人的忠诚度，只需在钓鱼岛问题上刺激一下中国就行。就实现逼迫和敲诈中国的目的。
还有台湾问题 : 就象被美国牵着的'牛鼻子",也被外国强敌(无赖美帝)操控着.美国只需牵一下'牛鼻子"就实现逼迫和敲诈中国的目的。
几乎可以断定，这场战争是不可避免的。中国需要研究和应对的，是战争爆发的时间、规模以及我们所应该采取的对策。
(苏.皖宝)2010.12.22

description.hltext_display: Twitter收购在线问答网站Fluther意图纳才
description.content:
12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，Twitter与在线问答网站Fluther达成收购协议，Fluther网站将继续独立运营，但不会再进行升级，Fluther核心团队的4名开发人员和1名设计师将加盟Twitter。
Twitter称，收购Fluther交易的首要目标是人才，他们欣赏Fluther团队的技术才能、企业家精神，以及历时2年开发的问答产品所表现出来的想法。收购Fluther将有助Twitter将用户感兴趣的内容“上升”到消息流顶部，帮助Twitter用户发现关联性最高的内容。
将加盟Twitter的Fluther团队成员包括本·芬克尔(Ben Finkel)、安德鲁·麦克克莱因(Andrew McClain)、蒂姆·杜鲁门(Tim Trueman)、理查德·亨利(Richard Henry)和卡梅伦·杜特罗(Cameron Dutro)。

description.hltext_display: Paddy Shennan: This is the UK, closed until further notice
description.content:
by Paddy Shennan, Liverpool Echo
THIS “global warming” isn’t much fun, is it?
You can’t get a flight.
You can’t get a train.
You can’t get a bus.
You can’t get a private hire cab.
You can’t get your Christmas presents on mail order.
Yes, it’s all well and good emailing us to say our items have been dispatched, but where the hell have they been dispatched to?
Welcome to frozen Britain – where everyone seems to have given up or, at least, decided that’s it’s not worth trying very hard, including (and this is a shame after its sterling performance at the start of the year) Merseyrail.
In January, the ECHO rightly praised Merseyrail for playing a blinder during our last paralysing cold snap – one which brought so much disruption and inconvenience to so many.
Merseyrail, we wrote, “kept much of Merseyside on the move . . . When the buses stopped running and people’s cars stopped moving, Merseyrail provided a vital gateway into and out of the city.”
People had arrived at stations more in hope than expectation and, in light of the chaos all around, were amazed that services were running normally.
They’ve not been running normally this week, though, with a Sunday service being introduced yesterday – leading to some bemused passengers asking: “If the tracks can take trains every 30 minutes, why can’t they take them every 15 minutes?”
Sorry, Merseyrail (God knows why I’m apologising, it took me two hours to travel a few miles to and from work on Monday), but you have become a victim of your previous high standards.
Of course, there are similar gripes across the whole transport system – whether it’s people complaining about a lack of grit on some roads or wondering why some bus services cannot negotiate routes that others can.
No decent person would wish travel misfortune on anyone else, but you’ve got to take your consolations and comforts where you can when you arrive home feeling bitterly cold and bitterly frustrated – and can say to yourself: “At least I’m not sleeping on the floor at Heathrow or queuing around the block at St Pancras” (you know things are bad when the Salvation Army and its mobile canteen come to the aid of stranded Eurostar passengers).
Happy Christmas everyone – hope you all get home in time!
Share
Share

Die Rallye Dakar findet heuer zu 32. Mal statt, zum dritten Mal in Südamerika. 9000 Kilometer lang ist die Strecke, die die Teilnehmer vom 1. bis zum 16. Jänner in Angriff nehmen werden. Vorjahressieger Carlos Sainz und KTM-Pilot Marc Coma haben sich heuer ganz speziell auf das Abenteuer in Chile und Argentinien vorbereitet – mit einem Rallye-Tango.

description.content:

description.hltext_display: Pa. panel finds 'pattern' that Greene sexually harassed PHA employees
description.author: Jennifer Lin
description.content:
The Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission ruled Tuesday that there was probable cause that Elizabeth Helm was sexually harassed by then-Philadelphia Housing Authority Executive Director Carl R. Greene.
In the first outside review of his behavior, the agency also concluded that Greene, 54, "engaged in a pattern and practice of sexually harassing conduct" toward female employees "throughout the course of his employment." In addition to examining the charges made by Helm, 29, investigators probed previous complaints by six women employed from 1999 to 2008. The 35-page report is a chronology of Greene's misconduct going back nearly to the time of his hiring in 1998.
In the other six instances of sexual harassment allegations, three women settled their cases for $648,000. Two were told by PHA lawyers that their claims were unsubstantiated. And one, now a deputy attorney general for Pennsylvania, resigned in 2001 because she viewed legal action as "futile." In April, Helm filed her sexual harassment complaint against Greene with both the Human Relations Commission and the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission.
When the complaints became public four months later, the allegations - coupled with revelations of previous secret settlements of sexual harassment complaints - cost Greene his job. The PHA board fired him on Sept. 23.
In its report, the Human Relations Commission describes the Housing Authority as a place that intentionally kept Greene's behavior under wraps.
The report documented how for years, outside lawyers and senior staff routinely withheld from the PHA board information about sexual harassment complaints. Such action violated the authority's bylaws, the commission said.
At the same time, the report chided the PHA chairman, former Mayor John F. Street, as failing to provide proper oversight of Greene. Greene joined PHA after facing similar sexual harassment charges in his previous job with the Detroit Housing Authority.
The Human Relations Commission recommended that Helm be reinstated as an interior designer, paid back wages, and reimbursed for any expenses. If she rejects that offer, the agency said, PHA will pay her three years' salary.
A meeting to resolve the matter is scheduled for Dec. 30.
John M. Elliott, an attorney for Helm, called the report "a full and thoughtful review." He said the commission outlined in "unprecedented detail" not only Greene's "sexual misconduct, but the sad reality that the board failed in its oversight of Greene." Greene's attorney, Clifford Haines, could not be reached for comment. "I certainly am not surprised at the fundamental finding," Street wrote in an e-mail. "As we all know, Mr. Greene had a problem for which everyone at the agency will pay in one way or another. It is so sad and unfortunate that otherwise good employees had to endure the humiliation of this bad behavior." He added that "the board is working with all our partners and staff to make sure such a thing never happens again." Nichole Tillman, a PHA spokeswoman, said the Housing Authority had received the report "and is currently reviewing it." Greene is suing both the PHA board and Street for terminating him. He charges Street personally with defaming his character.
Helm began working at PHA on Feb. 9, 2009, as a "graduate architect" in the design department. She was warned early on by a coworker that she should watch herself around Greene, as he had many harassment complaints against him. The woman told Helm she was his type. "He likes them young," the older woman said.
Helm had to report directly to Greene "nearly every business day," the report said. No other member of the design team was required to report to him on such a regular basis. The report said Greene made inappropriate remarks about Helm's appearance and personal life. At least once a month, Greene insisted that Helm and another young female colleague join him for dinner and drinks. Given that he was the senior executive at the agency, the report said, the women felt they had no alternative.
He also took them to after-work events and functions, referring to them as his "arm candy." The report said Greene often called Helm late at night and once told her, "I am more important than anyone else in your life. You better call me back." While she was on vacation in Maine, Greene ordered her to ship him a case of lobsters at her expense, the report said.
After Helm's department was transferred to another office building in South Philadelphia, Greene had her relocated to an office next to his at PHA's headquarters at 12 S. 23d St.
The report said that on April 12, 2010, Greene told Helm she needed to meet him for drinks at the Prime Rib restaurant to discuss a promotion. It was during that meal and afterward that Helm claimed Greene made sexual advances, trying to kiss and grab her.
Agitated by the incident, she sought a leave with pay. PHA failed to respond to her request and on May 14, having exhausted her vacation and sick leave, Helm was discharged.
Contact staff writer Jennifer Lin at 215-854-5659 or jlin@phillynews.com.

description.hltext_display: 法国称谷歌等互联网公司应补贴网络维建费
description.content:
12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，法国工业部长埃里克·贝松(Eric Besson)当地时间12月21日表示，Google等互联网公司支付的电信网络使用费过低，法国政府计划成立一个包括互联网公司在内的工作组，让互联网公司“分担”足够的电信网络部署和维护费用。
贝松表示，电信运营商的投资推动了数字经济的发展。该计划是对部分欧洲电信运营商的支持。欧洲电信运营商称其投建的网络推动了Google旗下YouTube等互联网服务的增长，但未获得足够补偿。法国电信CEO斯蒂芬·理查德(Stephane Richard)、西班牙电信CEO恺撒·阿列达(Cesar Alierta)和意大利电信CEO弗朗哥·贝纳博(Franco Bernabe)都表示互联网公司不公平地使用了它们的网络。
沃达丰和法国电信都公布了按流量计费的服务计划。网络支出增加和传统话音业务增长乏力，促使电信运营商通过提高向占用过多带宽的用户和内容提供商的收费增加营收。

description.hltext_display: Naim blir proffs i USA
description.author: per.bergsten@corren.se
description.content:
Naim Terbunja återvänder till ringen - som proffs i USA.
- Jag kan bli den stjärna som boxningen i Sverige behöver, säger Terbunja till Corren.
Bara några månader har gått sedan han avbröt satsningen mot OS i London 2012 och i stället beslutade sig för att lägga av.
Nu är han tillbaka och har skrivit kontrakt med välkände promotorn och managern Al Haymon. Under den senaste månaden har Linköpingskillen i hemlighet varit i New York och tränat.
- Jag kände jag hur mycket jag saknade boxningen, att det var möjligheterna i Sverige jag var trött på och inte själva boxningen, säger han.
26-åringen åker hem till Sverige för att fira jul innan han återvänder till USA. Exakt när han går första proffsmatchen är inte klart.
Men han tvekar inte om de höga målen:
- Med mina meriter, inte minst vinsterna i Golden Gloves- vinsterna och deltagandet i OS, och med kontraktet jag skrivit på kan jag bli den stjärna Sverige behöver, säger Naim Terbunja.
Läs mer i torsdagens Corren.

description.hltext_display: Cameron backs Hearts title credentials
description.content:
THE OLD Firm are united in their view that Hearts are title contenders and not SPL pretenders.And former Jambos star Colin Cameron reckons Walter Smith and Neil Lennon are spot on in their assessment of the Gorgie club.
Last week Hoops gaffer Lennon admitted hed be daft to write off Hearts after six straight wins on the spin had put them within three points of the Parkhead club.
Lennon said: We have to take them seriously.I wouldn't dismiss them because you could end up with egg on your face. I certainly don't want to disrespect anyone at Hearts because I've a lot of time for Jim Jefferies and Billy Brown and think they are doing a great job.
Ibrox manager Smith has now joined the chorus of praise for Jeffs Jambos even though their run of victories ended with a home draw against Caley Thistle on Saturday.
Smith said: "I think they are contenders.They've got themselves up into that position.Ourselves and Celtic had good opening runs to the season and have dropped a couple of points in the last few weeks.
"There wasn't a steadiness about Hearts at the start of the season but it looks as though Jim has a steadiness about his team at the present moment.I feel, over the last few seasons, if there had been a steadiness, Hearts would have been up there, along with Dundee United, challenging the Old Firm.
Former Scotland midfielder Cameron was part of the successful Jam Tarts side which lifted the Scottish Cup under Jefferies in 1998.Cameron still playing at Cowdenbeath netted the opener for the Jambos as they dumped Rangers in a Parkhead thriller.
That season, Hearts also gave the Glasgow giants a run for their money in the title race fading slightly in the final weeks of the campaign to let Celtic sneak back the championship.Cameron sees no reason why Jefferies Hearts of the modern era cant go on and repeat Cup success and also be a factor in the championship race insisting : Its great to see a Hearts team back up threatening the Old Firm.And its no real surprise that its a Hearts team with Jim and Billy Brown in charge.
Unless you are an Old Firm fan I suspect everyone is hoping that there can be a different look to the title race this season.When I was at Hearts with them it was a fantastic spell for the club.
The year we won the Cup people tend to forget we were also in the running for the title.With five or six games to go there was only four or five points between us and the Old Firm.But we just couldnt get to the line I know I was playing with injections to combat a pelvic injury and Celtic edged it on the final day.
Whos to say what will happen this time, but I hope Hearts can keep this going.With Jim and Billy in charge they couldnt have two better guys to give them every chance. Unless you are an Old Firm fan I suspect everyone is hoping that there can be a different look to the title race this season.When I was at Hearts with them it was a fantastic spell for the club.
The year we won the Cup people tend to forget we were also in the running for the title.With five or six games to go there was only four or five points between us and the Old Firm.But we just couldnt get to the line I know I was playing with injections to combat a pelvic injury and Celtic edged it on the final day.
Whos to say what will happen this time, but I hope Hearts can keep this going.With Jim and Billy in charge they couldnt have two better guys to give them every chance.

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: Drug Diversion--The Past 20 Years
Twitter收购在线问答网站Fluther 旨在揽才
description.content:
根据Twitter与在线问答网站Fluther达成的收购协议，Fluther网站将继续独立运营，但不会再进行升级，Fluther核心团队的4名开发人员和1名设计师将加盟Twitter。
过去数月，Twitter曾多次表示，用户不仅仅可以在其平台上发布内容，还可以在其平台上“消费”内容。收购Fluther将使Twitter在这一方向上迈进一步，有助于用户感兴趣的内容“上升”到消息流顶部。
Twitter称，收购Fluther交易的首要目标是人才，而非产品，“在与Fluther团队沟通期间，我们被他们表现出来的技术才能、企业家精神，以及历时2年开发的问答产品所表现出来的想法所折服。Fluther团队加盟我们后，他们将帮助Twitter用户发现关联性最高的内容。Fluther.com网站并非这次收购交易的一部分”。
将加盟Twitter的Fluther团队成员有本·芬克尔(Ben Finkel)、安德鲁·麦克克莱因(Andrew McClain)、蒂姆·杜鲁门(Tim Trueman)、理查德·亨利(Richard Henry)、卡梅伦·杜特罗(Cameron Dutro)。

description.hltext_display: 中国人寿涨1.44% 斥16亿元增资人寿财险
description.content:
股价小幅走高，集团拟向中国人寿保险及财险增资，最新报31.70港元，上涨1.44%，暂成交3.62亿元。中国人寿公布，集团拟与中国人寿保险(集团)公司(简称集团公司)，向中国人寿财产保险股份增资40亿(人民币，下同)，其中母公司出资24亿元占60%，而中国人寿则出资16亿元，占40%。於增资後，财产险公司的注册资本金将达80亿元，而母公司和中国人寿的持股比例则保持不变。

description.hltext_display: 朝韩危机就是一场大国导演的闹剧，该收场了
description.content:
沸沸扬扬的韩国军队20日在西部海域延坪岛举行实弹射击训练所可能引发的第二次朝鲜战争的危机，以北朝鲜一句“不值得这样做（对实弹演习进行反击）”而宣告结束。

数据纠纷再起风波易传媒自导乌龙闹剧 (2010-12-15)
逗士迎接美军来“反贪官”的闹剧 (2010-12-15)

日军导演“击毙马占山” 明知有误仍宣传 (2010-12-20)

朝鲜\'不还击\'就是最好的还击 (2010-12-22)
这就是中国战机不敢打扰美日军演的真相 (2010-12-22)
此人较准确预计了朝韩危机的走向并做下步预测 (2010-12-21)
北京为朝韩危机开偏方，中国东北进入战备状态 (2010-12-04)
专译：朝韩危机，中国对朝立场是关键 (2010-12-03)
至此，这场以3月份的“天安舰”事件为起因和导火索、11月朝韩“延坪岛”炮击事件为升级发展，12月20日韩国实弹射击训练为高潮，以朝鲜的“软蛋”为结束的所谓朝鲜半岛战争危机的真面目彻底浮出水面，事情的真相呈现在几个月来为之忧、为之叹、为之喊、为之急的全世界人民面前，我们将危机的几个环节联系起来，细细品味之下，不难发现，这是一场绝佳的表演，一幕本身绝不可能发生真正危机的戏剧，也是一场轰轰烈烈、纵横捭阖的大国游戏。这场戏剧的前台主要演员是北朝鲜、韩国，友情出演的演员是日本、印度、澳大利亚等，幕后策划、导演加领衔演员是美国，被动演员和导演是中国和俄罗斯。
闹剧结束了，或者说第一场结束了（以后可能还会有第二场和第三场--------，但都是戏剧表演），让我们前后串联之后，从中推演一下剧本和幕后情节：2008年后，随着中国经济的迅速崛起和国际地位的逐年提高，以美国为首的西方阵营对中国的担心甚至是恐惧越来越大，害怕中国崛起后不可收拾，害怕自己世界第一的地位被中国取代，用经济的手段制裁又由于各方对中国经济的深度依赖而屡不奏效。亚太地区，确切的说是东亚地区，日益成为世界经济的中心，美国感到必须以最快的速度重返东亚，加强对东亚这个世界经济的中心的控制，首先是军事上的重返和控制，同时也以此解束数年来深陷伊拉克战争的尴尬和无奈，如何尽快的、堂而皇之地重返亚洲，美国的智囊团们可谓煞费苦心，想出一条
“一石四鸟”的妙计，于是，就有了韩国“天安号 ”舰艇沉没事件，由韩国出击，挑动北朝鲜击沉“天安号 ”舰艇，或者由韩国自毁“天安号 ”舰艇，诬赖北朝鲜，然后美国和西方媒体大吵特吵，人为制造朝韩危机，也为美国军事干预造势。于是，美国在一片高呼危机声中，迅速军事重返东亚，示意韩国拉美国军演，反复强调“华盛顿”号航空母舰要参加演习，并到中国的黄海演习，以激怒北朝鲜和中国，继续为朝鲜半岛危机升温。结果，北朝鲜和中国都不示弱，北朝鲜发出了核威胁，中国也在东海、黄海进行了一系列军事演习相回应，之间，美国为了继续造势并起到离间和分化中国和邻国关系的目的，又穿插安排了希拉里在越南大发厥词挑动南海危机，美越军演、美印军演、台湾军售、中日钓鱼岛之争， 美日军演等一系列小剧目， 目的就是在中国周边制造混乱，为美军大规模布局东亚找借口，创造条件。结果，美国的阴谋被中国和俄罗斯识破，中国极力支持北朝鲜权力新老过渡并要求北朝鲜克制， 以化解危机，防止危机升温，加上不怀好意、无利不起早的俄罗斯的搅局，在第一阶段中，美国的战略目的没有完全达到，于是，又授意或者挑动了第二阶段的“延坪岛”炮击事件，使朝鲜半岛局势继续升温，再次将全世界的眼球吸引到东亚，背后推动韩国向朝鲜军事挑衅。其实，美国也不想真正在东亚打仗，尤其要冒着和一个核大国----中国打仗的巨大危险，它也看准了中国志在极力发展经济，不愿意过早和西方打仗的心理，既然中国不愿意打，就不会真正支持北朝鲜打仗，北朝鲜没有中国的军事支持，加之国内处于权利新老交替的关键时期，更不敢诉诸武力了，于是就有了第三阶段即8月20日韩国实弹射击演习，北朝鲜不敢反击，宣称“不值得这样做（对实弹演习进行反击）”的结果。

description.hltext_display: Ricardo-Mitarbeiter unterstützen die Aktion Familie
description.content:
Es war eine ungewöhnliche, dafür aber umso erfolgreichere Spendenaktion: Angeregt von einem Vorschlag der Ricardo-Mitarbeiter ihre Überstunden für die Aktion „Gmünder machen Wünsche wahr“ zu spenden, konnte sich jeder Mitarbeiter beteiligen.
SCHWÄBISCH GMÜND (pm). Viele Kinder in Deutschland leben in Armut. Das wird besonders an Weihnachten für die Kinder und ihre Angehörigen schmerzhaft spürbar. Ricardo Deutschland hat sich an der Spendenaktion „Aktion Familie – Gmünder machen Wünsche wahr“ beteiligt, um so möglichst vielen dieser Kinder die Weihnachtstage zu verschönern. Der stolze Betrag von 3004,24 Euro kam zusammen. Die Marketingabteilung steuerte noch 50 Geschenke bei – vor Weihnachten wird nicht verraten was drin ist. Nur soviel sei gesagt: Es ist eher etwas für die Buben und hat, wie so vieles bei Ricardo, mit Fahrzeugen und Motoren zu tun.
Im Rahmen der Weihnachtsfeier bei Ricardo Deutschland wurden der symbolische Scheck und die Geschenke an Bärbel Blaue, Projektverantwortliche der Aktion Familie, überreicht. Bärbel Blaue nutzte die Gelegenheit, um die Arbeit der Aktion Familie und das jüngste Projekt „Gmünder machen Wünsche wahr“ vorzustellen, der auch die Spende der Ricardo Mitarbeiter zugute kommt.
Bei Ricardo in Deutschland geht ein spannendes und letztlich erfolgreiches Jahr zu Ende. Das Geschäft hat im zweiten Halbjahr stark angezogen, neue Aufträge wurden gewonnen. Mit Blick auf das Kerngeschäft als Engineering Partner der deutschen Industrie wurde die Geschäftseinheit Prototechnik zur Jahresmitte an Eberspächer veräußert. Sämtliche Arbeitsplätze in diesem Bereich konnten so gesichert werden. Die Weichen für 2011 stehen bei Ricardo klar auf Wachstum. Schon heute richtet man sich auf eine der größten Herausforderungen hierfür ein: Qualifizierte Mitarbeiter zu finden, mit denen die ehrgeizigen Wachstumsziele für die kommenden Jahre erreicht werden.

description.hltext_display: Copiare i «file» non è un furto
description.author: di Giovanni Negri
description.content:
Non c'è furto in caso di copiatura di file con dati riservati sulla clientela di un'impresa. Semmai rivelazione del segreto professionale, se a commettere l'infrazione è un dipendente della società che in questo modo favorisce la concorrenza. A precisare i contorni dei reati è la Corte di cassazione con la sentenza n. 44840 della quarta sezione penale depositata ieri. Il caso approdato davanti ai giudici della cassazione era quello di un impiegato che, poco prima di dare le dimissioni, si era fatto trasmettere da un collega sul proprio computer aziendale una serie di dati e offerte commerciali; inoltre, in un secondo momento, l'uomo accedeva al server centrale dell'azienda, spostando altri dati riservati sul proprio indirizzo privato, utilizzandoli poi a vantaggio di un'impresa concorrente della quale, dopo le dimissioni, diventava co-amministratore.
I giudici precisano innanzitutto che la semplice riproduzione non autorizzata di file contenuti in un supporto informatico altrui non deve essere considerata come furto perché non si verifica la perdita del possesso della cosa interessata da parte del legittimo proprietario. Per la corte, infatti, che richiama la relazione sulle norme in materia di reati informatici, i dati e le informazioni contenuti nel file non sono compresi nel concetto di «cosa mobile». Esclusa anche la possibilità di contestare il reato di accesso abusivo a un sistema informatico con password aziendale per finalità estranee alle ragioni istituzionali.
Non serve, inoltre, la creazione di una nuova fattispecie penale, visto che la presa di conoscenza di notizie riservate può essere incasellata in altri reati. Come per la rivelazione di segreto professionale o di segreto industriale (per la corte non esiste una differenza apprezzabile). Illecito che consiste non solo nel rivelare il segreto professionale ma anche nell'impiegarlo a proprio o altrui profitto, come è avvenuto nel caso esaminato dalla Cassazione, visto che i dati riservati erano poi stati utilizzati dall'imputato per permettere alla società concorrente di formulare ai clienti offerte più convenienti.

description.hltext_display: 法国称Google等互联网公司应当为使用网络付费
description.content:
法国工业部长埃里克·贝松*1け此？Eric Besson)当地时间12月21日表示，Google等互联网公司支付的电信网络使用费过低，需要提高向电信网络公司支付的费用。
贝松称，法国政府计划成立一个包括互联网公司在内的工作组，目标是让互联网公司“分担”足够的电信网络部署和维护费用。
贝松的评论是对部分欧洲电信运营商的支持。欧洲电信运营商称，它们投资建设的网络推动了Google旗下YouTube等互联网服务的增长，但没有获得足够的补偿。法国电信CEO斯蒂芬·理查德(Stephane Richard)、西班牙电信CEO恺撒·阿列达(Cesar Alierta)和意大利电信CEO弗朗哥·贝纳博(Franco Bernabe)都表示，互联网公司不公平地使用了它们的网络。
贝松表示，这些公司都是外国公司，不在法国纳税，在法国市场上占有绝对主导地位，电信运营商的投资推动了数字经济的发展。
网络支出增加，传统话音业务增长乏力，促使电信运营商希望通过提高向占用过多带宽的用户和内容提供商的收费增加营收。沃达丰和法国电信都公布了按流量计费的服务计划。

description.hltext_display: 鞍钢下月钢价每吨涨100至350元 A股靠稳
description.content:

description.hltext_display: Zapatero ha apostado poco este año y Rajoy espera que el 'Gordo' termine en 6
description.content:
El jefe del Gobierno, José Luis Rodríguez Zapatero, ha asegurado hoy que ha apostado "poco" para el sorteo de la Lotería de Navidad de hoy, mientras que el líder del PP, Mariano Rajoy, ha comprado décimos en Galicia y Madrid, y ha confiado en que el 'Gordo' termine en 6, el número que lleva.
Un grupo de amigos disfrazados de Papá Noel esperan en el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid el comienzo del sorteo extraordinario de Navidad, que repartirá más de 2.300 millones de euros, con un premio gordo dotado con tres millones, lo que supone que el poseedor de cada décimo se embolsará 300.000 euros. EFE
A la misma hora que comenzaba el sorteo extraordinario de Navidad, los miembros del Gobierno y los diputados comenzaban en el Congreso el último pleno del año, en el que Zapatero va a explicar las conclusiones del Consejo Europeo celebrado la pasada semana.
Zapatero ha dicho al entrar en el hemiciclo que no sabe exactamente cuántos décimos de lotería ha comprado este año y se ha limitado a decir que "pocos".
Tampoco la ministra de Asuntos Exteriores, Trinidad Jiménez, ha gastado mucho, ya que sólo ha comprado el número del ministerio.
Por su parte, Rajoy ha afirmado que tiene décimos comprados en Madrid y en Galicia, y ha apostado por que el 'Gordo' termine en 6, antes de desear suerte a los informadores que se encontraban en el pasillo del Congreso.

description.hltext_display: Theater builds reputation with national praise
description.author: jmarshall@npgco.com (Russ Simmons, Theater reviewer
description.content:
Local theater aficionados often brag about the quality of the dynamic performing arts scene in our area. But it usually takes an outsider to give the claims some credence.
Since Eric Rosen took over as the artistic director of the Kansas City Repertory Theatre in 2008, national publications have been taking notice.
In Time Magazine’s "Top Ten Everything of 2010" issue that hit newsstands Dec. 9, theater critic Richard Zoglin heralded The Rep’s production of "Venice."
Back in May, Zoglin named "Venice" the country’s best musical of the year. In the "Top Ten" issue, Zoglin placed "Venice" at No. 2 overall on his list for theatrical productions.
In his column, Zoglin summed it up this way:
"Rap musical, political parable, updated Greek tragedy, a reworking of Shakespeare’s ‘Othello’ – there’s more going on in this ambitious musical than in a season’s worth of run-of-the-mill Broadway tuners."
The futuristic opus was co-written by Rosen and composer and actor Matt Sax. Levin praised the show for its "passionate lyricism" and its "wonderful score from Sax."
This is not the first time a national publication has raved about a production at The Rep.
Last year, Terry Teachout, theater critic for The Wall Street Journal, was equally enthusiastic about director David Cromer’s production of Tennessee Williams’ classic drama "The Glass Menagerie."
Teachout’s review said, "The greatest of all American plays has received a production worthy of its beauty and truth."
Teachout’s December 2009 WSJ "The Year in Theatre" article was titled "The Year of David Cromer." Teachout said the nation’s two best productions were directed Cromer, his acclaimed Chicago/New York adaptation of "Our Town," and the KC Rep’s version of "The Glass Menagerie."
In an earlier review of The Rep’s production of the comedy "A Flea in Her Ear," Teachout said, "Eric Rosen…seems well on his way to pushing what was once a second-tier troupe into the top rank of American regional theatres. I’m already looking forward to my next visit."
Since taking the position as artistic director of The Rep in 2008, Rosen has shown a willingness to shake things up a bit. In the April 2010 issue of "American Theatre Magazine," writer Christy Desmith said Rosen was "taking big gambles, but so far he’s made even bigger gains."
Perhaps his boldest move was to forego last year’s annual production of "A Christmas Carol" in favor of an original musical adaptation of the 1983 movie "A Christmas Story." While Rosen was widely criticized for the move, "A Christmas Story: The Musical" turned out to be a box office smash.
Rosen has brought in notable collaborators, including Sax, Cromer, David Cale, Mary Zimmerman and Moisés Kaufman.
In fact, his first production as artistic director was Sax’s one-man rap musical "Clay," an unusual choice for audiences used to seeing The Rep mount plays by Shaw and Chekov. Still, "Clay" was a hit.
And many of the Rep’s recent productions have enjoyed life after their Kansas City incarnations. "Clay" went on to have a successful run at New York’s Lincoln Center and Cale’s "Palomino" traveled west with the Center Theatre Group in Los Angeles.
"A Christmas Story: The Musical" is now playing at Seattle’s 5th Avenue Theatre and "Venice" is appearing at CTG. "The Arabian Nights," a co-production with Berkeley Rep and Lookingglass Theatre, will open at Washington, D.C.’s Arena Stage on Jan. 14.
Rosen has been quick to give credit to The Rep and CTG for their willingness to allow him to take chances, particularly in the case of "Venice."
"No theater I know of, in the middle of an economic crisis, would move forward with this kind of crazy, adventurous idea – after all, we didn’t even have a second act, or know how the play ended, or how many characters were in it," Rosen said.
"But thanks to several miracles, some very generous re-scheduling of other projects in New York and Kansas City, we cleared the time and got really, really busy."

description.hltext_display: Six footer McGregor too small for Villa
description.content:
ALLAN McGREGORS hopes of a move to Aston Villa could be scuppered because hes too small.The 6ft tall Rangers and Scotland shotstopper has been in brilliant form for club and country this season and has been tipped for a £7 million move to the Midlands.
Villa assistant boss Gary McAllister and goalkeeping coach Rafael Gonzalez watched the 28-year-old in action against Manchester United in the Champions League.
But while the general reports to gaffer Gerard Houllier were favourable, its understood Villa have doubts about the keepers penalty box presence and are now looking at other targets.
Borussia Dortmund keeper Roman Weidenfeller a taller and more imposing figure at 6ft 2 has overtaken McGregor in the Villa list of priorities.
A move for the Rangers number one has not been totally dismissed by the Premiership club, but a concrete offer will only be made if other targets fall by the wayside
The 30-year-old Weidenfeller has racked up over 200 games for Dortmund, but is out of contract in the summer and has refused to pen a new deal.
The talented German, therefore represents a cheaper and less risky option for a Villa side who need to find a long-term replacement for 40-year-old American Brad Friedel.
News that Villas interest in McGregor has cooled will be a blow to Rangers bankers but a massive relief to gaffer Walter Smith.Lloyds Bank would have pocketed the huge transfer fee and passed on next to nothing for Smith to sign a replacement.
Smith is desperate to keep hold of his star men in January as bids to bow out with a third consecutive SPL title.Back-up keeper Neil Alexander has proved to be a more than able deputy whenever McGregor has been injured.
But Rangers title credentials would be enhanced with the on-form McGregor between the sticks between now and May. Amazon.co.uk Widgets Share... addthis_pub = 'netro42'; Next story... CHELSEA are at the centre of another international transfer storm after luring promisi... Get RSS Back-up keeper Neil Alexander has proved to be a more than able deputy whenever McGregor has been injured. But Rangers title credentials would be enhanced with the on-form McGregor between the sticks between now and May.

description.hltext_display: Comissão para avaliar PPP tem de ser constituída ainda este ano
description.content:
O secretário-geral do PSD reconheceu ontem, terça-feira, que a constituição de uma comissão para avaliar as parcerias público-privadas está num impasse, mas afirmou que terá de ser constituída até ao final deste ano.
Miguel Relvas lembrou que o acordo entre sociais-democratas e socialistas que permitiu a viabilização do Orçamento do Estado para 2011 «tinha subjacente a constituição de dois grupos», uma comissão para avaliar as parcerias público-privadas e uma agência para fiscalizar a execução orçamental.
«Sim, [há um impasse] mas os impasses existem para ser resolvidos. Essa é a nossa esperança. Essa é a nossa atitude. O PSD não tem uma visão partidarizada, tem uma visão de que deve prevalecer a componente técnica daqueles que vão participar nesta comissão», disse, citado pela Lusa, durante o jantar de Natal do grupo parlamentar do PSD.
«Essa comissão terá certamente de ser constituída e terá de ter os seus membros definidos até ao fim deste ano».
Interrogado sobre o que falta para isso acontecer, referiu que «é público que o PSD entende que o presidente da comissão deve ser alguém com relevância na vida pública portuguesa e que permita, com independência e com isenção, que este trabalho possa ser feito sem pressões» e que «é público que foram sugeridos nomes pelo PSD».
Neste momento, «estão a ser criadas as condições para que se possa chegar a um consenso sobre um bom nome para presidente desta comissão. Aliás, o mesmo sucedendo em relação à entidade que vai fazer a fiscalização das contas públicas».
Tags:
PPP, PARCERIAS PÚBLICO-PRIVADAS, PSD, MIGUEL RELVAS, GOVERNO, AGÊNCIA FINANCEIRA

description.hltext_display: 城市电讯获惠誉调升评级 股价曾升逾4%
description.content:
(01137)获评级机构惠誉调升评级，刺激股价今早一度升逾4%，高见5.93元，最新报5.87元，升3.35%。
惠誉将城电的长期外币及本币发行人违约评级，由「BB-」调升至「BB」，展望稳定，外币高级无担保评级亦为「BB」，以反映其信用指标的持续改善，以及作为香港第二大宽带供货商的强势地位。惠誉又指，尽管本港电讯市场高度饱和，城电仍有坚固的增长潜力。

description.content:
美国环球战略网19日报道称，作为世界上规模最大的陆军，中国陆军未来几年将从160万人缩减到110万人，以打造一支精干和高速的现代化武装力量。

英国媒体称中国将在2020年建庞大航母舰队 (2010-12-20)
英媒称中国2020年将建立庞大航母舰队 规模远超英 (2010-12-20)
报道称，解放军陆军装备有7000辆坦克、7500辆装甲运兵车(其中1/3为类似美军M-2布雷德利战车的现代化步兵战车)；拥有2万门火炮和400架直升机。
报道称，解放军陆军由7个军区、18个集团军、37个师和67个独立团和旅构成。每个军区下设2至3个集团军，驻扎在国家的特定地区。集团军包括3万至6万兵力，由不同师和旅级部队构成，另外还包括支援部队。预备役部队受控于省政府，用于协助保护边境安全，随时等候征召，应对自然灾害。战时，预备役部队可组成30个步兵师和数量与之相当的独立旅。
解放军的主要作战部队包括9个装甲师、25个步兵师(其中2个负责两栖任务)和3个炮兵师；有33个步兵旅、9个装甲旅、15个炮兵旅和10个直升机团。所有步兵都属机动化步兵，其中近半属机械化步兵，配备有装甲运兵车和一些坦克。空军部队也下设3个空降师，海军也下设一个海军陆战队师。解放军陆军装备有7000辆坦克、7500辆装甲运兵车，其中1/3为类似美军M-2布雷德利战车的现代化步兵战车；拥有2万门火炮和400架直升机。

description.hltext_display: 英特尔收购McAfee交易获FTC批准 欧盟仍在评估
description.content:
英特尔收购McAfee交易获美国联邦贸易委员会(FTC)批准，英特尔通过官方网站公布了这一消息，并表示目前正在配合欧盟委员会(EC)针对该交易的评估工作。
今年8月份，英特尔同意斥资76.8亿美元收购McAfee，并表示将利用该交易在芯片内部嵌入安全软件。收购McAfee将是英特尔有史以来金额最大的一笔收购交易。英特尔曾表示，McAfee保护功能与英特尔产品整合后将提高设备效率和安全性。
根据交易条款，英特尔向McAfee支付每股48美元现金，较该交易公布前McAfee收盘价溢价60%。
助力英特尔扩张新市场
全球逾80%的PC运行英特尔芯片。McAfee交易不仅助力英特尔在PC芯片中添加新功能，还是英特尔扩张手机和消费电子产品等新市场计划的重要部分。McAfee是第二大安全软件厂商，仅次于赛门铁克。
被英特尔收购后，McAfee将在现任CEO戴夫·迪沃特(Dave DeWalt)领导下保持独立运营，并继续出售独立的软件产品。包含McAfee安全软件的英特尔芯片将于明年上市。英特尔公布该交易时曾表示，软件直接嵌入芯片后，运行速度更快，黑客攻击难度也将增大。

description.hltext_display: Ziel war der Iran - aber hohe Hürden verhindern das
description.content:
Seit dem 19. Juli befand sich das Gmünder Ehepaar Wolfgang Schlupp-Hauck und Brigitte Schlupp-Wick mit dem Tandem auf dem Weg, dessen Ziel eigentlich der Iran sein sollte. In unregelmäßigen Abständen schrieben sie für die Leser/innen der Rems-Zeitung Reiseberichte. Heute der 14. und letzte Teil.
und Brigitte Schlupp-Wick
SCHWÄBISCH GMÜND. Von Venedig aus radelten wir durch Oberitalien zum Atomwaffenstandort Aviano. Von dort nach Mailand. Meist regnete es, nur am Gardasee schien die Sonne für uns. Eine Lungenentzündung zwang uns, unsere Tour zu beenden.
In Oberitalien waren wir nicht mehr die einzigen Radler. Trotz des trüben Wetters begegneten uns viele Rennradler, die alleine oder in Gruppen unterwegs waren. Häufig grüßten sie uns mit Salve oder Pace, wenn sie uns im Affentempo überholten. Wir freuten uns wieder auf unserem Tandem zu sitzen. Doch unser Radleroutfit hatte sich völlig verändert. Wir zogen unsere warmen und langen Hosen und Shirts an und darüber die Regenhose und -jacke. Für unsere Fahne stand das italienische Symbol gegen den Irak-Krieg Pate. Wir entdeckten unterwegs immer wieder Häuser, an denen die regenbogenfarbigen „Bandiere della Pace“ flatterten. Überrascht haben uns zwei Ortsschilder auf denen wir den Zusatz „atomwaffenfreie Zone“ lasen.
Lisa Clark, die Koordinatorin der Mayors for Peace in Italien, hatte für unsere Tour Kontakte zu Friedensgruppen in Castel Franco, Treviso und Padua hergestellt. Sie kümmerte sich auch um Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten auf einem Bauernhof, bei den Comboni-Missionaren und im Hotel, das uns vom katholischen Pfarrer bezahlt wurde. Mehrfach wurden wir zum Essen eingeladen, privat, in der Pizzeria oder zum Resteessen nach einer Hochzeit. Das Brautpaar war wie wir mit dem Rad auf Hochzeitsreise gewesen.
Drei der Bürgermeistertermine, die sie für uns ausgemacht hatte, fielen buchstäblich ins Wasser. Die Wolkenbrüche und Schneeschmelze führten zu katastrophalem Hochwasser, so dass ihnen die Krisensitzungen keine Zeit für uns ließen. Und auch im Protestcamp gegen die Erweiterung des Militärflughafens Vincensa trafen wir niemanden. Das Camp war überflutet worden.
Zu einem Pressetermin im Rat der Provinz Treviso wurden wir von zwei radelnden Friedensfreunden begleitet, die ihre Räder ebenfalls mit der Pace-Fahne schmückten. Der Bürgermeister von Aviano berichtete uns, dass er im August zum Hiroshima-Tag immer zu einer Gedenkveranstaltung an der Airbase einlädt, auf der die USA Atomwaffen lagert. Er freut sich, dass daran bis zu 20 Amtskollegen aus der Umgebung teilnehmen. Er lud uns ein, im nächsten Jahr dabei zu sein, wenn die Friedensgruppen radeln.
Das Radeln in der oberitalienischen Ebene wird bisweilen eintönig. Die Strecken sind eben und kerzengerade. Im Kilometertakt passiert man riesige Kreisel und dazwischen reihen sich neu errichtete Industriebetriebe aneinander.
Herausragend war deshalb die Umrundung des Gardasees. Petrus war uns hold und ließ für diese drei Tage die Sonne scheinen. Wir konnten so das mediterrane Flair vor den schneebedeckten Bergen genießen. Tummeln sich hier im Sommer zehntausende von Touristen so war nun tote Hose. Die meisten Hotels hatten geschlossen und auf den Straßen war wenig Verkehr. Ideale Bedingungen. Wir wurden gewarnt, auf der Westseite zu radeln, viele lange und schlecht beleuchtete Tunnels. Wir wagten es dennoch und wurden mit vielen herrlichen Ausblicken belohnt.
Im strömenden Regen mussten wir nach Mailand weiter. Wenn uns einer der vielen Lkw überholte, erhielten wir immer noch eine extra Dusche verabreicht. Vor allem Brigitte bekam das Spritzwasser ins Gesicht, durch ihre niedrigere Sitzposition. Trotz guter Regenbekleidung waren wir schon durch und durch nass, als ein riesiger Lkw am Straßenrand stand. Der Fahrer gab uns Zeichen, dass wir anhalten sollten. Wir waren sehr verwundert, was er von uns wollte.
In einer Unterführung stand
das Wasser zehn Zentimeter hoch
Wieder Zeichensprache, er hatte uns überholt und beschlossen anzuhalten, um uns mitnehmen. Da konnten wir nicht nein sagen. Seine Ladefläche war völlig leer und er zurrte dort Tandem und Hänger fest. In Paullo kurz vor Mailand lud er uns direkt vor einem Hotel ab. Im strömenden Regen ging es am nächsten Morgen weiter. In einer Unterführung stand das Wasser über zehn Zentimeter hoch.
Am Ortsrand von Mailand ließ sich das Vorderrad nur noch schwer lenken, der Reifen war platt. Wir schoben das Fahrrad in den gegenüberliegenden Recyclinghof. Dort konnten wir es unter einer Überdachung unterstellen, um es im Trockenen zu reparieren und zu vespern. Ein Mitarbeiter brachte uns etwas zum Trinken und Seife zum Hände waschen. Er erzählte uns, dass wir in Mailand aufpassen sollen, in Gaststätten würden Touristen Speisekarten mit höheren Preisen vorgelegt als Einheimischen. Und tatsächlich, als wir in einem Cafe eine Suppe zu Mittag essen wollen, kostete diese der Karte die wir gereicht bekamen, vier Euro mehr als im Aushang. Vom Nebentisch holten wir uns eine Tageskarte. Wolfgang fragte nach dem Unterschied. Es gab keinen, wir bekamen den niedrigeren Preis.
In Mailand hatten wir ein volles Programm: Pressegespräch mit einer katholischen Wochenzeitung, Vortrag auf einer Veranstaltung einer Gruppe, die Unterschriften für ein Referendum für regenerative Energien und gegen Atomenergie sammelt und einen Empfang in der internationalen Abteilung der Provinz.
Mit dem Zug fuhren wir dann über die Alpen nach Straßburg. Von dort radelten wir nach Offenburg. In dem Nieselregen hustete Brigitte so stark, dass wir beschlossen den Plan, das Mayors for Peace Büro in Belgien und den dortigen Atomwaffenstandort zu besuchen, aufgaben.
Im Hotel bekam Brigitte in der Nacht heftigen Schüttelfrost, der nicht aufhörte. Wir holten den Notarzt. Sie hatte 41 Grad Fieber. Er wies sie ins Krankenhaus ein. Dort wurde eine leichte Lungenentzündung festgestellt. Sie konnte am nächsten Tag entlassen werden, aber das Ende unserer Radtour war damit besiegelt. Sie muss sich zu Hause auskurieren.
130 Tage waren wir unterwegs, 3300 km sind wir mit dem Tandem gefahren und 5750 Kilometer mit Bus, Bahn und Schiff. Unseren Traum, bis nach Teheran zu radeln, haben wir nicht verwirklicht, aber sind dennoch voll von den vielen wunderschönen Erlebnissen, interessanten Begegnungen und guten politischen Gesprächen heimgekehrt.

description.hltext_display: Salário mínimo nos 500 euros só no fim de 2011
description.content:
UGT está disposta a discutir aumento gradual ao longo do ano que vem
PorRedacção PGM
Uma manobra de marcha atrás: o acordo alcançado entre os parceiros sociais há quatro anos fixava a subida do salário mínimo nacional (SMN) para os 500 euros no início de 2011. Mas o Governo, os patrões e a UGT deverão recuar neste propósito, na reunião desta quarta-feira. A UGT mostrou-se disposta, na semana passada, a mudar a sua posição e já admite que o salário mínimo alcance os 500 euros só no final do ano que vem.
O acordo tripartido assinado em 2006 na concertação social previa que o valor fosse atingido no próximo ano, o que pressupunha que a actualização se desse no início de 2011, como aconteceu com aumentos anteriores.
No entanto, em conferência de imprensa, o decretário-geral da UGT, João Proença, não afastou a ideia de um aumento gradual ao longo do ano que vem. O mais importante, diz, é que se decida rapidamente qual será a actualização em Janeiro.
«O nosso objectivo central é atingir os 500 euros em 2011», disse, acrescentando estar aberto a discutir a proposta das entidades patronais, de um aumento faseado ao longo de 2011.
Recorde-se que o SMN está actualmente nos 475 euros brutos e que será necessário um aumento de 25 euros para que, no ano que vem, seja atingida a meta dos 500 euros.
As confederações empresariais têm, no entanto, alegado que não existem actualmente condições económicas para proceder ao aumento acordado, e propuseram um aumento apenas em linha com a inflação (2,2%).
A ideia de um aumento faseado partiu da Confederação do Comércio e Serviços (CCP), com subidas em Julho ou no final do ano.
Tags:
UGT, SMN, SALÁRIO MÍNIMO, AUMENTOS SALARIAIS

description.hltext_display: Pedophilia Guide Author Denies Book Is Obscene
description.content:
BARTOW, Fla. -- A Colorado man who wrote a how-to guide for pedophiles said Tuesday that his book is not obscene.
Phillip Greaves, 47, of Pueblo, Colo., arrived at the Polk County jail in central Florida on Tuesday morning and is due in court Wednesday afternoon, officials said.
He was arrested Monday in Colorado and charged with violating Florida's obscenity law, a third-degree felony. If convicted, he faces a maximum of five years in state prison.
Speaking to reporters outside the jail Tuesday, Greaves denied the book is obscene and said he plans to fight the charge.
"I characterize it as a book of showing people who have been improperly represented," he said. "And also telling people how they can go about to improve their own lives and so that these people that are being incarcerated now can possibly be rehabilitated."
Polk County Sheriff Grady Judd claims jurisdiction because Greaves sold and mailed the book to undercover deputies who had written him requesting a copy.
Florida's obscenity law prohibits the "distribution of obscene material depicting minors engaged in conduct harmful to minors."
The book was briefly for sale on Amazon.com but was yanked in November after it prompted online outrage.
