[Kcikk] => 32 [Klink] => http://kozvita.transindex.ro/?kozvita=32#kommentek [Ccim] => TŐKÉS-PÁRT [datum] => 2010-12-09 13:31:09 ) [25] => Array ( [Knev] => IAnonimxy [Kdatum] => 2010 december 9 13:30 [Kszoveg] => Ugy az MPP-seket minta"Tokes part"hoborgoit, igen HOBORGOIT, az erdelyi magyarsag ARULOINAK tartom. Ha tenyleg megujulast akartak volna, az RMDSZ {romaniai magyarok( Udvarhelytol Nagyvaradig, Vajdahunydtol Szatmarnemetiig) demokratikus szovetsege} -en belul kellett volna ezt megtenniuk. Belulrol kellett volna megreformalni a partot. IGEN az erdelyi magyarsagnak egypartra van szuksege. Elo pelda erre Szlovakia es Szerbia. A parton belul lehet vitazni , lehet barmit csinalni de egyhangban kell lenni a kozos erdekeket illetoen. Egy parton belul is lehet demokracia , sot! A tobbpart hatalmas "vervesztessel" fog jarni. Magyar reszvetel nelkul, marpedig ilyenforman ez biztosra veheto, a romanok azt teszik majd a parlamentben amit akarnak, szepen alcazva, mint Ceau idejeben. Meggyozodesem , hogy nem hazafisagrol hanem anyagiakrol van szo. "Osztd meg es uralkodj". A tragedia az hogy ezt nem is a tobsegiek csinaljak hanem mi onkent megyunk a vagohidra. Meg a barmok sem teszik ezt!!! description.hltext_display: Skype正寻找合作伙伴、加强招募及准备上市
description.content:
12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，互联网电话服务提供商Skype新任首席执行官托尼·贝茨(Tony Bates)日前表示，公司未来将通过寻求更多的合作伙伴、招募技术人员充实新产品研发队伍等途径为Skype的发展注入新的活力。此外，Skype公司表示其已经做好了募股上市的准备。
贝茨本月20日在接受记者采访时表示，寻求更多优秀的合作伙伴将成为未来Skype的发展战略中的重要组成部分，而Skype在明年拟招聘500位技术人员(其中绝大多数为工程师)以提升公司新产品研发队伍的实力。Skype在明年的发展目标即是要让用户在无论是在iPhone、台式电脑还是电视机上都能享受到完美的Skype服务体验。
贝茨指出，目前人类已经进入了一个移动资讯时代，Skype公司的发展着眼点并不在于某一项业务有多么的强大，更重要的是在于公司能否提供更多的服务，而这也是消费者所希望看到的。
根据Skype公司的相关文件显示，目前Skype在全球拥有超过5.6亿用户，不过其中仅仅只有1.4%的用户使用着Skype的付费服务，而为公司创造更多的赢利增长点就成为了贝茨所面临的众多挑战之一。未来Skype的发展重点包括了小组式视频呼叫服务以及积极拓展企业类用户服务等等，而Skype还计划通过IPO融资约1亿美元。
贝茨向记者表示：“类似Skype这样的企业将在未来面临许许多多发展良机，而我们要做的就是专注于自己的发展道路。”

description.hltext_display: "Csiripelõ" egereket tenyésztettek ki japán genetikusok
description.content:
Madárként csiripelő egereket tenyésztettek ki az Oszakai Egyetem tudósai, akik a genetikailag módosított rágcsáló segítségével szeretnék felderíteni az emberi nyelv eredetét.
A genetikailag módosított egerek szervezete hajlamos hibát ejteni a DNS-másolás során, ezért esetükben könnyebben alakulnak ki génmutációk.
"A mutációk az evolúciók mozgatórugói. A génmódosított egereket kereszteztük nemzedékeken keresztül, s figyeltük, hogy mi történik. Egyenként vizsgáltuk az újszülött egereket, s egyszer csak felfedeztünk egy madárként daloló egyedet" - magyarázta a kutatásokat irányító Ucsimura Arikuni, hozzátéve, hogy az "éneklő" egér a véletlennek köszönheti világra jöttét, ám ezt a tulajdonságát átörökíti utódaira.
Mint a kutató megjegyezte, meglepte, hogy a "daloló egér" látszatra ugyanolyan, mint "közönséges" fajtársai, azt várta volna ugyanis, hogy megváltozzon a rágcsáló fizikai megjelenése is. Ugyanakkor a kísérletek során születtek egerek rövid végtagokkal, s a dakszlira emlékeztető farokkal.
Jelenleg a laboratórium már 100 "daloló" egérrel rendelkezik. S hogy miért oly értékesek a "csiripelő" rágcsálók? A madarak egy sor hangelemet variálnak, amelyek olyan szerepet töltenek be, mint az emberi beszédben a szavak, s énekükben egyfajta "lingvisztikai" szabályok követhetők nyomon.
"Az egereket könnyebb tanulmányozni, mint a madarakat. Emlősök, így az agyi szerkezetükben és más biológiai tulajdonságaikban közelebb állnak az emberhez" - mutatott rá Ucsimura.
Ismertetése szerint a kísérletek jelenlegi fázisában azt vizsgálják, hogy a "csiripelő" egerek miként hatnak a "közönséges" egerekre. Abból kiindulva, hogy a mutáns egerek hangosabban csiripelnek, ha ismeretlen környezetbe kerülnek, vagy amikor a hímek nőstények társaságába csöppennek, a kutató szerint a csiripelés az érzelmek egyfajta kifejezését jelenti.
A kutatások során arra is fény derült, hogy amikor "közönséges" egerek énekes fajtársaikkal együtt cseperedtek, a szokásosnál kevesebb ultrahangot bocsátottak ki. Ebből azt a következtetést lehet levonni, hogy a kommunikációs módszerek a nyelvjáráshoz hasonlatosan terjednek a csoporton belül. (mti)
Láthatatlan egérrel fogunk klikkelni?
Az egereknél bevált az őssejtes szívgyógyászat – lehet, hogy az embereknél is működni fog?
Figyelem! Megjegyzése csak moderálás után jelenik meg.

Én konkrétan olyasmikre gondoltam, amit nem a liciben tanítanak. Pl hogy milyen családi szokások vannak nálunk, vagy hogy milyen tipikus román kaját tudnék felsorolni/elkészíteni. Már megbocsáss ha a tudományom valahol a puliszkánál kimerül. Az is kb kisiskolás koromban ragadt rám a blokk előtt, a szomszéd kölykök dobtak meg vele odítva, hogy "disz iz dácsijáááá!", én meg csak pislogtam, hogy mi köze van az autónak ahhoz hogy én magyarul beszélek s ő románul. Amúgy meg köszi a kioktatást, legközelebb több tévét nézek, hogy bármelyik külföldit meggyőzhessem hogy létezik román irodalom, a művészet nem csak Brâncusi (ejtsd Bránkuzi) vagy hogy mi az old school meg new wave a román filmművészetben. Bár tapasztalatom szerint ha valaki komolyabb témák iránt érdeklődik, az általában azt firtatja hogy hogy létezik hogy a románoknak közük van a rómaiakhoz. A vészhelyzet meg a Grace klinika az minden, csak nem "tudományos". Ennyi erővel a Jóban rosszban-t is említhették volna. És sorozat segített belgyó vizsgán? Még a House sem "elég tudományos" ehhez. A belgyó (és bármilyen más) vizsgára édesfiam a könyvekből kell készülni, nem a napi szappanból. Majd ha ott leszel a beteg ágya mellett, a kezelést az alapján választod ki, hogy "a filmben is ezt csinálták s jó lett"... És miért van az, hogy sikerült pont azok közül válasszatok interjúra, akiknek a beszédkészsége tart a nullába (tisztelet az egy kivételnek...) A heherészés és a süketségek összehordása elég szomorú egy huszonX éves orvosistól.... Aki nem tud legalább két stabil érvet (meggyőzően) tálalni, hogy miért pont az a kedvenc sorozata, az vagy az első évad negyedik részénél jár vagy nem is nézi a sorozatot. description.hltext_display: ¿Un Windows para tabletas?
description.author: EL PAÍS
description.content:
Microsoft vuelve a hablar de tabletas. Lo hará, según Bloomberg, en la feria de consumo electrónico de Las Vegas. Allí presentará modelos de Samsung y Dell con Windows 7. Pero también se espera una demostración de una versión de Windows pensada para este tipo de dispositivos. Este sistema operativo para tabletas estaría pensado para trabajar con chips de ARM. Se trataría de otro intento de la compañía para intentar competir con el dominio de Apple en este terreno. Los chips de ARM, fabricados por Qualcomm, Texas y Samsung, son empleados ya por tabletas como la misma iPad.
El nuevo software podría trabajar también con procesadores de Intel y AMD. Con todo, en otros medios, como Zdnet dudan de la noticia , que ello suponga una ruptura de Microsoft con Intel, y recuerdan que el fabricante de Windows ya tiene versiones de su software que pueden trabajar con chips de ARM.
El retraso de la empresa que dirige Steve Ballmer en el planeta de las tabletas hace cada vez más difícil su introducción en el mismo. Apple tiene más de 83% de cuota de mercado en este segmento, una cuota que deberá bajar al 44% en 2012 tras la aparición de potentes competidores como Samsung o Blackberry. Por otra parte, las tabletas equipadas con Android están teniendo una buena aceptación.
Por otra parte, Microsoft ha publicado que su sistema operativo para móviles Windows Phone 7 ha vendido 1,5 millones de unidades en sus primeras seis semanas. Con todo no se trata de unidades vendidas al consumidor si no a los distribuidores.

description.hltext_display: 減重手術救命 男發願當志工
description.content:
曾重達124公斤的許秉富，多年來只能坐著睡覺，還擔心睡眠呼吸中止症，活在死亡陰影中；在大林慈濟醫院進行胃縮小手術，重拾健康。他今天說，開始當志工回饋社會。
以前挺著圓滾滾肚子是許秉富的標誌，高血壓、高血脂、再加上糖尿病，每天與一大堆藥物為伍，讓他更困擾的是介於中到重度的睡眠呼吸中止症，常睡到一半因為呼吸中斷而被嚇醒，多年來只能坐著睡覺。
身高165公分的許秉富，40歲前體重是標準60公斤。他表示，因為生意交際應酬喝酒，又很少運動，身體就像吹氣球般愈來愈重。3個多月前，年逾60的他體重破百，想要運動，卻因一走路就喘而作罷。
大林慈濟醫院一般外科醫師李政鴻表示，病患求診時，體重已飆高至124公斤，在評估病患無法藉由藥物與運動減重後，決定透過縮胃手術來改善。手術後，病患3個月內已減重30公斤，體重仍持續下降中。
許秉富表示，術後終於能夠靠自己運動控制體重，每天運動1個小時，可以走5、6公里。現在可以平躺著睡覺，高血壓、高血脂都改善，糖尿病也獲控制。
許秉富重拾健康，他發願要到大林慈濟醫院當志工，回饋社會。991222

description.hltext_display: Stocks To Watch For December 22 (RHT, BBBY, NKE, WAG, HOV)
description.author: Monica Gerson
description.content:
Some of the stocks that may grab investor focus today are:
Red Hat Inc (NYSE: RHT ) reported its Q3 earnings at $0.13 per share, up from $0.08 per share, in the year-ago period. The company's adjusted earnings came in at $0.20 per share. RHT's revenue increased 21% y/y to $235.6 million. RHT shares fell 2.67% to $46.60 in after-hours trading.
Wall Street expects Bed Bath & Beyond (NASDAQ: BBBY ) to report its Q3 EPS at $0.65. BBBY shares lost 0.06% to $47.52 in the after-hours trading session.
Nike Inc (NYSE: NKE ) reported its FQ2 profit at $0.94 per share, up from $0.76 per share, in the year-ago period. The company's revenue increased to $4.84 billion, from $4.41 billion. However, NKE is expecting to face margin pressures in the remaining fiscal year.NKE shares dipped 5.73% to $87.01 in after-hours trading.
Analysts are expecting Walgreen Company (NYSE: WAG ) to have earned $0.54 per share in the first quarter. WAG shares gained 0.46% to $37.00 in the after-hours trading session.
Hovnanian Enterprises Inc (NYSE: HOV ) reported its FQ4 loss of $1.68 per share, compared with a loss of $3.21 per share, in the year-earlier period. The company's revenue came in at $353 million, down from $437.4 million, in the year-ago period. However, analysts expected a loss of $0.66 per share on revenue of $288.1 million.HOV shares moved down 2.29% to $4.26 in after-hours trading.
Trading Ideas.

description.hltext_display: Belarus sets Russian rouble bond coupon at 8.7 pct
description.content:
* Coupon set at 8.70 pct
* Placement to start on Wednesday
* Issue was postponed last month
* Comes amid improvement in Russia-Belarus relations
MOSCOW, Dec 22 - Belarus set an 8.70 percent coupon on its 7 billion Russian rouble bond on Wednesday, tapping the market after a one-month delay it blamed on unfavourable global conditions. Minsk's debut on the Russian market comes as Alexander Lukashenko was officially re-elected to a fourth term in office in a vote that was followed by a violent police crackdown on the opposition. [ID:nLDE6BD10S]
Relations with Moscow, often tense in the recent past, appear to have thawed a bit, with Russia agreeing to scrap duties on oil products saving Minsk some $4 billion a year and averting the threat of winter energy supply disruptions.
The placement of the 2-year paper in Russia will start on Thursday, disclosure documents showed.
Belarus, hit hard by last year's economic downturn that also affected its main trading partners, Russia and the euro zone, issued its debut $1 billion Eurobond this summer.
It tried to tap the Russian market in late November, but decided to delay the placement. At the time, the order book had been filled with a coupon guidance of 8.75 percent. [ID:nLDE6AN0CS]
The order book was re-opened on Dec. 16, and lead managers said on Wednesday that it had been filled with orders at a 8.70 percent coupon level -- towards the upper end of the 8.50-8.75 percent guidance. [ID:nLDE6BK1K3] Russia's domestic OFZ treasury bonds maturing in March 2013 are currently yielding 6.3 percent RU25065=MM, having eased slightly from last week's 1-year highs around 6.7 percent.
The rouble bond market has been hit by expectations of Russian central bank interest rate hikes, a seasonal influx of liquidity from a year-end government spending splurge and ongoing global risk aversion.
With yields elevated, Russia's finance ministry cancelled two OFZ treasury bond auctions planned for Wednesday [ID:nLDE6BK0QH] and postponed its plans for rouble Eurobonds until conditions improve [ID:nLDE6B2196].
(Reporting by Yelena Fabrichnaya; Writing by Toni Vorobyova; Editing by Jessica Bachman)

description.hltext_display: Liverpool FC 12 days of Christmas - John Barnes: Number 10
description.content:
As the festive season approaches, we have put together a special online 12 days of Christmas with a Liverpool FC twist. A new installment will be online at www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/lfc and www.liverpooldailypost.co.uk/lfc each day up to the 25th
Any Liverpool fan would admit there has been a paucity of genuine, top quality wingers at Anfield in recent years. Since the mid 1990s, perhaps only Steve McManaman has hit the heights expected by Reds from their widemen.
While this is partly due to a few misguided signings and a few recruits who couldn't settle in the Premier League, it also has something to do with the standards set by a certain left-footed genius who gave LFC a decade of fantastic service between 1987-1997.
John Barnes caught the eye of the top brass at Liverpool during a very successful few years at Watford. The Jamaican-born star helped his side gain promotion to the top flight in 1981/82 and guided them to second place - behind Liverpool - the following season. Watford and Barnes would lose out to Everton in the 1984 FA Cup Final, but John would get his revenge.
The Reds came calling and Kenny Dalglish secured Barnes' sevices for £900,000. Arriving at the same time as Peter Beardsley and with John Aldridge ready to start firing, Barnes took no time to settle into a blistering rhythm. Liverpool won the title and Barnes scored 15 league goals, although the FA Cup once again proved elusive as Wimbledon shocked the Reds in the final.
At the end of the following campaign Barnes finally got his hands on the FA Cup, playing a key role in the 3-2 victory over Everton, but the title slipped away from the Reds in the last game of the season in that infamous encounter against Arsenal at Anfield.

description.hltext_display: Fire, smoke damage house
description.content: -Staff reports Argus LeaderNo one was injured in a house fire late Monday night at 623 N. Minnesota Ave.A police officer saw smoke coming from the house, called it in and got 10 people out of the home, said police spokesman Sam Clemens.Sioux Falls Fire Rescue responded at 11:58 p.m. and put out the blaze in the attic in 30 minutes.It was determined that overloaded electrical wires caused the fire, which caused extensive smoke and fire damage to the second floor and roof.

description.hltext_display: 八成禿男寧求偏方 喝尿抹尿勇嘗試 多無用
description.content:
搶救掉髮危機，不過八成男性卻寧願求偏方，避孕藥、四物湯都有人嘗試，皮膚科醫師指出，還真有雄性禿患者勇於挑戰尿療法，內服外用全上陣，不過喝了幾個月還是不見成效，看遍了千奇百怪的治禿方法，醫師表示，雄性禿患者如能及早就醫、對症下藥，還是可以挽救落髮危機。
統計全台男性，每三人就有一個人屬於雄性禿，好發年齡在30歲左右，40歲以上男性，約一半有掉髮問題。搶救掉髮大作戰，避孕藥、四物湯、巧克力竟然都成為男性治禿秘方，一份針對有掉髮困擾的男性調查發現，八成受訪者為了改善落髮，嘗遍各種偏方，甚至有男性不惜內外兼用尿療法、或是塗抹明星花露水等誇張方式，而且有兩成的人「多管齊下」，一次使用超過三種偏方，不過勇於嘗試成效卻不如預期，因為超過八成以上沒有辦法有效改善掉髮。
亞東醫院醫學美容中心主任張英睿解釋，許多患者用外力刺激的方式，誤以為刺激毛囊可以幫助生髮，把尿液、避孕藥塗在頭皮，可能造成頭皮發炎，嘗試這些沒有科學根據的偏方，甚至可能造成更嚴重落髮，對於體內賀爾蒙「二氫睪固酮」過量所引起的雄性禿病沒有實質幫助，建議患者應該及早就醫評估，以免錯失黃金治療期。
「譬如說他是初期的，像是第二、第三期，可以用藥物治療，因為雄性禿有分七期，如果到了第六期、第七期，已經少很多的話，這時候藥物治療效果就有限，可能這時候就必須配合一些外科方式，如果空很多就必須要植髮。」
醫師強調，使用偏方如同把自己當做實驗品，使用來路不明的藥物治禿頭，甚至可能引發腎衰竭危機，呼籲患者絕對不能因為貪求低成本而輕易嘗試偏方，生髮不成反傷身。

description.hltext_display: 安永∶香港明年IPO仍然活跃 料集资4000亿
description.content:
报告表示，本年度大中华区共有442宗IPO，占全球约37%，集资额为1179亿美元，占全球约46%，两者皆属全球首位。本年首十一个月，港交所(00388.HK)集资额达512.93亿美元，为全球集资额最高之交易所。
以全球计，集资宗数最多行业为材料股份，金额最高则为金融业。该行亦指，本年度非内地企业来港上市宗数有所增加，预期明年本港IPO将继续保持活跃，规模虽未如本年农行(01288.HK)及友邦(01299.HK)，但料融资额仍将达4000亿港元。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
报告指，内地企业仍首选本港为上市场所，除H股外，亦有来自广东及福建民营企业及内地房地产企业来港上市，然而房地产企业能否成功上市，仍需视乎内地政策及市场发展而定。

description.hltext_display: China State Grid buys Brazil power assets for $1B
description.author: ELAINE KURTENBACH
description.content:
SHANGHAI -- China's biggest electricity company, State Grid, says it is paying $989 million for seven Brazilian power companies and their transmission lines as it seeks to expand overseas.
The investment includes a 30-year concession to operate the Brazilian power grids that can be renewed for 20 years once it expires, according to a notice seen Wednesday on the website of the Chinese government agency that manages state assets.
The deal marks a further expansion of State Grid into overseas markets following a $3.9 billion, 25-year contract with the Philippines to run that country's power grid.
Though not well known abroad, State Grid says it is ranked eighth among the Fortune 500 and operates power lines across 26 of China's 32 provinces and regions. It is among many state-owned businesses that are heeding the government's call to "go out" by investing overseas.
The investment in Brazil will suit the "strategic cooperation" between the two countries and is expected to yield an average annual profit of $110 million, State Grid said.
Brazil relies heavily on power from Itaipu, the world's second-largest hydroelectric dam after China's Three Gorges. It has faced intermittent blackouts in recent years, though the government says it has invested heavily in transmission lines since President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva took office in 2003.
State Grid's own networks are facing troubles over shortages of coal and gaps in demand and supply that oblige many cities to ration or cut power. Wide areas were left without power nearly three years ago due to icy winter weather that downed transmission lines and towers in central China.

description.hltext_display: Herseth Sandlin gets commission job
description.content: Argus LeaderU.S. Rep. Stephanie Herseth Sandlin has been chosen to serve on the Indian Law and Order Commission, according to the congresswoman's office.The commission was created by the Tribal Law and Order Act, a bill that was introduced by Herseth Sandlin. It was signed into law by President Obama earlier this year. "I look forward to serving on this important commission as we seek to study ways to better address law enforcement on tribal lands," Herseth Sandlin said. "Nowhere is this need more stark and more immediate than in some areas of South Dakota's tribal communities."

event_or_fact.property: I look forward to serving on this important commission as we seek to study ways to better address law enforcement on tribal lands; Nowhere is this need more stark and more immediate than in some areas of South Dakota's tribal communities.

description.hltext_display: 'World's first' glasses-free 3D TV hits Japan stores
description.content:
Toshiba on Wednesday launched in Japan what it calls the world's first television that allows viewers to see 3D images without the need to wear special glasses, amid intensifying competition in the market.
Curious shoppers stopped to test out the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of 119,800 yen (1,400 US dollars). A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images to each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba's screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programmes.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping that the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
"I want to watch on a big screen," said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. "I'll wait for another year before buying," he said.
Another customer, 33, said: "It's great that we don't have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance."
"But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes," he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65 centimetres (26 inches) away.
"Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually" with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touchscreen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo's 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

event_or_fact.property: I'll wait for another year before buying
the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product
But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes

description.hltext_display: N.L. doctors ratify new four-year contract to end prolonged labour dispute
description.content:
ST. JOHN'S, N.L. - Doctors in Newfoundland and Labrador have ratified a new four-year contract with the province that calls for almost $88 million in raises.
Lynn Barter, a spokeswoman for the Newfoundland and Labrador Medical Association, said more than 90 per cent of the membership voted in favour of the deal Tuesday night.
The deal also provides a one-time $12-million retention bonus for doctors who are still in the province at the end of the four years.
The province's fee-for-service physicians and salaried general practitioners will also now be paid on par with their Atlantic counterparts.
About 1,200 doctors in the province had been without a contract for more than a year.
The new agreement covers the period from Oct. 1, 2009, to Sept. 30, 2013.
Under the agreement, salaried specialists would get the same pay raises that were given to oncologists and pathologists in the province in 2008 _ a major sticking point that prolonged talks.
A 42 per cent wage gap existed among those specialists when the last contract expired.
The increases were awarded as the province tried to rebuild after hundreds of patients received botched breast cancer tests.
Thirteen specialists who had threatened to quit en masse as of Feb. 4 have rescinded their resignations as a condition of the new deal.

description.hltext_display: Bus hours change for holidays
description.content:
Sioux Area Metro will operate the following hours during the upcoming holidays:
Christmas Eve, Friday, Dec. 24 - Last pullout from the Downtown Bus Stop will be at 3:30 p.m. for all routes except Route 10, which will be at 2:15 p.m. The last pickup with Paratransit service will be at 4 p.m. There will be no evening Demand Response bus service.
Christmas Day, Saturday, Dec. 25 - No service.
New Year's Eve Day, Friday, Dec. 31 - No change to fixed-route service hours. The last pickup with Paratransit service will be at 7 p.m. There will be no evening Demand Response bus service.
New Year's Day, Saturday, Jan. 1 - No service.

description.hltext_display: Meralco sees net income up nearly 100% to P12B
description.content: Robust electricity sales will likely lift the net income of power utility Manila Electric Co. (Meralco) nearly 100 percent to P12 billion this year, a company official told reporters Wednesday. We are looking at a net income of P12 billion or around P11.5 billion to P11.7 billion. We are also approaching 30-billion-kilowatt hour sales, a record sales level," said Oscar Reyes, Meralco senior vice president and chief operating officer. Last year, Meralcos bottom line totaled P6.356 billion. Double-digit growth in industrial sales and single-digit growth for commercial and residential sales are spurring significant increases in Meralcos net income, Reyes said. We are also hopeful that sales will continue to be healthy next year, but we do not expect the same level of sales growth as this years," he said. Electricity sales are expected to reach nearly P250 billion this year from P185 billion a year ago. Favorable business conditions Meanwhile, the power firm is taking advantage of market liquidity and low interest rates, according to Reyes. The conditions for businesses appear to be favorable this time. Its an extraordinary time for financing. Its certainly helping fund businesses. Normally, the constraint to businesses is financing but now theyve made that available," he said. Meralco had entered into a P2.5-billion, seven-year term loan with Philippine National Bank for general corporate purposes, a P5-billion note facility with First Metro Investment Corp. to finance its debt obligations and growth initiatives, and a P4.8-billion, fixed-rate notes with BPI Capital Corp. Meralco serves over 4.8 million customers in its franchise area. JE/VS, GMANews.TV

description.hltext_display: Recommendations for a Caribbean bookshelf
description.content:
The end of the calendar year always brings some inevitable chores. The government wants to know how much individual taxpayers earned and spent, so bookkeeping duties assume paramount importance. Conventionally, the approaching New Year also elicits explicit or implicit personal wishes of all sorts. For lovers of books, it is the time to review and evaluate the past year's reading. In this case, the original selection ranged too broadly among histories, novels and scientific works, so the decision was made to reduce the recommendations to a few books relevant for a Caribbean bookshelf.
By any ranking, the past year produced some exceptional publications. Although I read just a small fraction of the publications, it is pleasantly surprising how many of these outstanding books dealt with Caribbean themes. The criteria for my list were that each work had to be exceptionally readable, provide some special insight on the subject, and appeal to anyone interested in the Caribbean. The many other excellent books read during the year were automatically excluded owing to space restrictions.
Patrick Bryan of the University of the West Indies at Mona produced an exceptionally written, engagingly nuanced and beautifully illustrated biography of Edward Seaga published by the UWI Press. Bryan, the Douglas Hall Professor of History at Mona, is a prolific writer and this excellent biography testifies to his considerable command of Jamaican history. Based on solid archival research and a superb bibliography, his Edward Seaga and the Challenges of Modern Jamaica expertly covers the principal character in the context of a dynamic and changing country between the 1890s and 2005.
Robert Morris Financier of the American Revolution by the distinguished prize-winning writer Charles Rappleye is a compelling book. Morris is perhaps the least familiar of the movers and shakers who produced the American Revolution. Although a signer of the declaration of independence - his signature appears just below the bold lettering of John Hancock - and the major financier of the revolution, Morris evokes none of the spontaneous resonance of Washington, Hamilton, Franklin, Madison or Adams. Yet his economic wizardry was indispensable for the military success of the colonial insurgents. Like the country he helped found, the life of Morris is a story of improbably magnificent achievement fostered by the unlimited opportunities of the age. Starting his career as an apprentice, Morris became a highly successful international merchant whose ingenuity and collaboration with the wealthy, well-connected Cuban Juan de Miralles y Trailhon made possible the military successes at Valley Forge, Trenton and Yorktown that ended British control of the 13 colonies. By the 1790s Morris lost his fortune and ended up spending nearly four years in the Philadelphia debtor's jail.
Perhaps the two most outstanding individuals in the history of the sugar industry in modern republican Cuba were Manuel Rionda and Julio Lobo. In 2003 Muriel McAvoy produced an excellent biography of Rionda. Now John Paul Rathbone, the Financial Times journalist and World Bank economist with established Cuban ancestry, has published a wonderful, delightfully readable book called The Sugar King of Havana: The Rise and Fall of Julio Lobo, Cuba's Last Tycoon. Like Morris, the life of Lobo parallelled the wildly fluctuating fortunes of his country. He frolicked with movie stars like Esther Williams, Joan Fontaine and Bette Davis while keeping a shrewd eye on the world sugar market that he dominated until the Castro revolution overtook his world in 1959.
Just when one thought there could be nothing new about Bartolom de las Casas, the Dominican friar, humanist and officially designated protector of the early indigenous population, Lawrence Clayton of the University of Alabama comes up with a marvellously fresh study that represents an extraordinary contribution to the general history of the Spanish in the Americas. Bartolom de Las Casas and the Conquest of the Americas deserves a place on every Caribbean bookshelf.
In Matanzas: The Cuba Nobody Knows, native son Miguel Bretos of the Smithsonian Institution presents a magnificently researched, highly engaging and seamlessly organised combination of local urban biography and personal autobiography. This small northern coastal city was the cradle of the larger Cuban history, culture and society.
Methodologically and otherwise it is difficult to think of a better book than Gillian McGillivray's Blazing Cane: Sugar Communities, Class, & State Formation in Cuba, 1868-1959. This superb examination is indispensable for understanding the complex society that developed in Cuba between the middle of the 19th century and the middle of the 20th.
The Haitian Revolution has finally begun to gain its rightful premier place in the age of the great revolutions. Jane Landers' Atlantic Creoles in the Age of Revolutions provides a unique perspective on Georges Biassou, Prince Whitten, Francisco Menendez and a number of other Africans and African-Americans who expertly manoeuvred the kaleidoscopic changes of the period with consummate skill. Jeremy Popkin has followed his remarkable Facing Racial Revolution: Eyewitness Accounts of the Haitian Revolution (2007) with You are All Free: The Haitian Revolution and the Abolition of Slavery (2010). The later book is a brilliant examination of the seminal importance of the declaration of this abolition to the history of France, Haiti, and the wider Atlantic world.
Very few books provide as comprehensive an exploration of the theme of imperialism as Colonial Crucible: Empire in the Making of the Modern American State edited by Alfred McCoy and Francisco Scarano of the University of Wisconsin. Fifty scholars from four continents assess with extraordinary sophistication the unexpected boomerang impact of imperial ventures on domestic US state formation, prison policies, education, race, public health, military training, and environmental management.
The selection of books, like the selection of anything having to do with personal taste, remains a subjective undertaking. Other readers may rightly have other suggestions. But it is clear that books about the Caribbean or relevant to Caribbean history rank highly among international publications. Given that some of the finest publishers are found in the Caribbean, that should come as no surprise. Even more encouraging are the splendid Caribbean books in the pipeline for 2011. --

description.hltext_display: Liverpool FC team of the decade voted for by ECHO readers
description.content:
It may not have the glitz and glamour of X-Factor or Strictly Come Dancing, but at least we didn’t have to put up with Simon Cowell and Len Goodman for this. Yes, the votes have been counted, the results are in, and now the real debate can start.
Last week the ECHO asked you to vote for your Liverpool ‘team of the noughties’. And it is fair to say the response was overwhelming; hundreds and hundreds have cast their votes, and we can now reveal who you have chosen as the best Reds of the last ten years.......
Goalkeeper - Pepe Reina
For the goalkeeper’s jersey, there was only ever one serious contender. Jerzy Dudek may have been the hero of the Reds’ 2005 Champions League triumph but, with just 4.1% of the votes, he was left very much in the shade here. Sander Westerveld (0.8%) trailed in in third place.
That’s because Pepe Reina’s impact since his arrival on Merseyside in 2005 has been undeniable, and the Spaniard’s consistency, presence and popularity among supporters is reflected in the fact that he picked up 95.1% of the votes. He may only have one major trophy - the 2006 FA Cup - to show for his five years at Anfield so far but, at 28, the former Villarreal stopper has plenty of time to elevate himself into the realm of Anfield legends. If he hasn’t already, that is.
"Reina is bar far the best and most consistent, but Sander and Jerzy have their own place in Liverpool history, Dudek, in particular, will never be forgotten for Istanbul alone." - Paul Cunningham
Right back of the decade >>>>>>

description.hltext_display: Banks vow to defend Storm legal action
description.content:
December 2010, 19:15 The banks involved in the Storm Financial collapse say they will fight the legal action launched against them by the corporate regulator.
When Storm Financial folded last year it left investors out of pocket to the tune of at least $3 billion.
The Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) says it has taken the action against the Bank of Queensland, the Commonwealth Bank and Macquarie Group because they refused to offer customers adequate compensation.
ASIC is also alleging Storm ran an unregistered managed investment scheme in which the banks were involved.
In separate statements, the Bank of Queensland and the Commonwealth both denied illegal and dishonest dealings in relation to the collapse.
The Commonwealth added that it has been actively helping affected customers in the past 18 months through the Storm Resolution Scheme.
Law professor from the University of Western Sydney Michael Adams says ASIC badly needs a win after last week's loss in the James Hardie asbestos case.
"They have actually lost major cases and that causes morale and confidence issues within the regulator and also the Storm case itself has raised a lot of publicity," he said.
"A lot of parties, a lot of relatively small investors have been caught out with these particular schemes, and as such ASIC would want to make sure it can win against, in this case, some major parties, including of course the Commonwealth Bank and the Bank of Queensland."
But he says there are no guarantees.
"I think ASIC would still be very open to some sort of commercial settlement if the parties came forward to some sort of agreement and that that was within the limits they would expect," he said.
ASIC has already taken legal action against Storm's founders, Emmanuel and Julie Cassimatis.
It has been a long, hard road for investors who were clients of Townsville-based Storm Financial.
Self-funded retirees were among those who lost their life savings when they took out margin loans to invest with Storm.
Mark Weir from the Storm Investors Consumer Action Group has welcomed today's decision by ASIC.
He says investors have been anxiously awaiting results for two years.
"Whilst we would have hoped, or many of us would have hoped, that they would have been able to reach a commercial settlement, but having come this far, I can only encourage our members to take the positive out of this," he said.
"ASIC weren't prepared to sell us out.
"They weren't prepared to take less than they perceived that we were entitled to and at the shortest, that they're willing to take it to litigation on that basis."
Stephanie Carmichael is from Levitt Robinson Solicitors, the firm which has launched a class action against the Commonwealth and now Macquarie on behalf of Storm investors.
"The Macquarie action follows along the same lines as our action against the Commonwealth Bank," she said.
"The prime reaction is in relation to breaches of the Corporations Act.
"We say there was an illegal and unregistered managed investment scheme that the banks were promoting involving the Storm Financial step investment strategy.
"This was a product or a strategy that should have been under the supervision of the watchdog. It should have been registered pursuant to the Corporations Act and it wasn't, and on that basis it's illegal."

investors have been anxiously awaiting results for two years

The Macquarie action follows along the same lines as our action against the Commonwealth Bank

They have actually lost major cases and that causes morale and confidence issues within the regulator and also the Storm case itself has raised a lot of publicity; A lot of parties, a lot of relatively small investors have been caught out with these parti
ASIC badly needs a win after last week's loss in the James Hardie asbestos case

Whilst we would have hoped, or many of us would have hoped, that they would have been able to reach a commercial settlement, but having come this far, I can only encourage our members to take the positive out of this

description.hltext_display: الولايات المتحدة توقف النقاش حول اتفاقية "ستارت-2"
description.content:
موسكو، 22 ديسمبر (كانون الأول). نوفوستي. صوت 67 سيناتورا أمريكيا لوقف النقاش حول اتفاقية روسية أمريكية جديدة لتقليص الأسلحة الإستراتيجية الهجومية. وسيتم التصويت لتبني هذه الاتفاقية لاحقا، كما أفادت وكالة "أسوشيتيد برس" للأنباء.
وفي وقت سابق وافق العدد المطلوب من السيناتورات الجمهوريين على تلبية دعوة باراك أوباما للمصادقة على هذه الاتفاقية.
وتحتاج المصادقة إلى 67 صوتا بمجلس الشيوخ الأمريكي. ويبلغ عدد الديمقراطيين فيه 59 سيناتورا مقابل 41 جمهوريا.
وتنص الاتفاقية التي وقعها الرئيسان الروسي والأمريكي في الثامن من أبريل الماضي في براغ على تقليص عدد الرؤوس النووية ووسائل نقلها الإستراتيجية الموجودة لدى كل من الطرفين إلى 1550 رأسا و800 وسيلة نقل وذلك خلال السنوات السبع القادمة بعد دخول المعاهدة حيز التطبيق.

description.hltext_display: Christie signs law on arbitration
description.author: David Porter
description.content:
WAYNE, N.J. - Gov. Christie signed a bill Tuesday that caps increases to police and firefighter pay awarded through arbitration, a measure he called the most important of the proposals in his so-called tool kit to help towns control costs.
With Democratic Senate President Stephen Sweeney of Gloucester County looking on, Christie hailed the passage of the bill as a testament to bipartisan cooperation. "We've proven over the last year that Republicans and Democrats can get things done together," he said. "Mayors have been yelling and screaming for these kinds of reforms for years." The bill caps salary awards, including longevity pay and automatic step increases, for police and firefighters at 2 percent when their unions engage arbitrators to settle contracts.
It also fast-tracks the arbitration process by giving arbitrators a 45-day window to rule on disputes and limiting the appeal process to 30 days. In addition, arbitrators' pay will be capped at $1,000 per day or $7,500 per case, whichever is lower.
Christie said Tuesday that some cases in arbitration have dragged on for years, and that fear of excessive arbitration awards has hampered some towns' ability to conduct effective contract negotiations. "Arbitration works when it's balanced," said Sweeney, an organizer for the International Association of Ironworkers. "But the system has gotten out of whack over the last 20 years." Pension and health care costs are not included in the cap. Christie said the cap will lapse in April 2014, at which time lawmakers will review its effects and consider modifications. "This is the most significant individual bill in the tool kit," Christie said. Municipalities have been clamoring for ways to control costs since the Legislature approved - and Christie signed - a 2 percent cap on annual property tax increases that goes into effect Jan. 1.
Christie said residents could see a difference in their tax bills by August, but that the effect likely would not be seen until the end of 2011 or beginning of 2012. "It's one of the major issues we're dealing with," Hoboken Mayor Dawn Zimmer said after the signing. "This gives us the tools going forward to make sure it's fair for the residents of the city of Hoboken and of New Jersey." The governor said another primary target is sick leave policies for public employees, some of whom get tens of thousands of dollars in unused sick time when they retire. Christie noted a case in Parsippany in which four police officers reportedly were due a total of $900,000 upon retirement.
Christie signed a bill this year that limits state employees to receiving $15,000, and he said Tuesday that a similar measure in the Legislature for school, government, and public safety workers needs to be toughened.

event_or_fact.property: a similar measure in the Legislature for school, government, and public safety workers needs to be toughened.
Arbitration works when it's balanced; But the system has gotten out of whack over the last 20 years.
a case in Parsippany in which four police officers reportedly were due a total of $900,000 upon retirement
It's one of the major issues we're dealing with; This gives us the tools going forward to make sure it's fair for the residents of the city of Hoboken and of New Jersey.

description.hltext_display: Tulospalkkiot piti maksaa laittomasta lakosta
description.content:
Työnantaja ei olisi saanut jättää tulospalkkioita maksamatta laittomaan työtaisteluun osallistuneille, katsoo korkein oikeus. Se määräsi Stora Enson Inkeroisten tehtaan maksamaan tulospalkkiot noin kolmellekymmenelle vuonna 2006 lakkoilleelle työntekijälle.
Yhtiö oli kirjannut tulospalkkiojärjestelmään ehdon, jonka mukaan laittoman työtaistelun aiheuttamat menetykset vähennettiin siihen osallistuneiden tulospalkkioista. Korkeimman oikeuden mukaan yhtiö pyrki näin laittomasti rajoittamaan työntekijöiden yhdistymisvapautta.

description.hltext_display: Reconciliaci�n colombo-ecuatoriana
description.content:
Bogotá — Aunque el encuentro más esperado en los últimos meses: el de los presidentes de Colombia, Juan Manuel Santos y el de Ecuador, Rafael Correa, se dio en el marco de la ayuda humanitaria para socorrer a los damnificados del invierno, el mismo selló la normalización de la relaciones diplomáticas entre los dos países.
Esta es la primera reunión de los mandatarios tras el restablecimiento de las relaciones diplomáticas hecha en noviembre y después de un breve encuentro que sostuvieron el pasado siete de agosto, durante la posesión del presidente Santos.
En esa oportunidad, el Jefe de Estado colombiano le entregó a su homólogo la información contenida en los discos duros encontrados en el bombardeo al campamento del jefe guerrillero de las FARC, alias "Raúl Reyes", hecha en marzo del 2008, cuando Santos era Ministro de Defensa, y lo que motivó el rompimiento de las relaciones bilaterales.
"Esto representa una consolidación muy grande de la confianza entre los dos países y en su amistad. La visita humanitaria de Correa confirma que finalmente ha podido superarse el muy grave conflicto en el que estuvimos envueltos", le dijo a El Diario La Prensa el ex canciller Augusto Ramírez Ocampo.
El presidente de la Comisión de Relaciones Exteriores del Congreso, el senador del partido liberal Guillermo García, aseguró que la presencia de Correa "es muy bienvenida, dentro del marco de restablecimiento de las relaciones, es un mensaje de que se restablecen los lazos no sólo diplomáticos, sino de hermandad".
El Presidente ecuatoriano no sólo llegó con siete toneladas de alimentos perecederos, sino con el recién nombrado embajador de ese país en Colombia, Raúl Vallejo, de quien Ramírez Ocampo opinó es un intelectual desacatado y de muy alto nivel. Colombia ya había designado a Fernando Arboleda como su representante en el vecino país.
Para el senador García ambos presidentes han puesto su "grano de arena" para la normalización de las relaciones. Santos, cuando anunció el cambio del esquema de las relaciones internacionales en donde imperaría el respeto y la diplomacia, y Correa, quien se declaró satisfecho con las explicaciones dadas por Colombia sobre el bombardeo a Raúl Reyes.

description.hltext_display: Anti-Semitic website back online: York U student on the run from Interpol
description.content:
i-Semitic Islamic website police say is operated by an Ontario student who is on the run is now back on the Internet after being shut down earlier this year by a Canadian web-hosting provider.
Salman An-Noor Hossain, 25, of Mississauga, operated a website called Filthy Jewish Terrorists and he and the site were the subject of a five-month investigation by the Ontario Provincial Police.
The site was shut down in March and Hossain was suspended from York University as the OPP investigated him.
But the anti-Semitic site has re-launched, using a host in Switzerland.
On Tuesday, Hossain posted a blog identifying himself as the operator of the re-launched site, and using the same design as the old one. The new web site is registered with generic information making it impossible to locate him.
Last July, the OPP said in a statement that Hossain "wilfully promoted hatred and advocated genocide of the Jewish community." His website called for direct terrorist attacks.
Hossain was charged with five counts under the seldom-used hate-crime section of the Criminal Code, but he didn't show up for his court date.
Last month, the Ontario Superior Court issued an international warrant for his arrest on Interpol. Hossain's picture, birth date, height, weight, colour of eyes and hair are listed on the international police web site.
"Every single Muslim in North America and Europe has a right to go and physically fight alongside the Islamic resistance groups in the various regions under external occupation (Afghanistan, Iraq, Kashmir, Lebanon, Palestine, Somalia, and other places)," the website reads.
The Canadian Security Intelligence Service issued a statement Tuesday saying it knows of such sites.
"CSIS is very aware of certain Internet websites which support or incite terrorist violence, and that some of those sites are based in Canada," the statement said.
The Canadian Press reported Monday that an al Qaeda-linked website names more than 100 Arab Christians living in Canada.
The site apparently targets them, accusing them of playing a role in converting Muslims. The site, Shumuk Al Islam, includes pictures, names, addresses and cell phone numbers of Coptic Orthodox Egyptians mostly living in Eastern Canada.
Two of those listed on the site said CSIS investigators met with Coptic representatives to discuss safety concerns.
Public Safety Minister Vic Toews said Tuesday the list of Canadian names is worrisome.
"It's very disconcerting that Canadians would be targeted in this way, but it simply illustrates the fact that Canadians are not immune from terrorism," Toews said.
"There is also a very fine line between what is freedom of speech and what is a criminal act. I think, in this kind of a situation, we are looking at criminal activity and criminal statements and all I can say is RCMP and CSIS are monitoring this very closely and working together with affected people."
Shumukh Al-Islam has also posted dozens of sensitive Canadian sites, such as nuclear facilities and dams, and noted them as potential targets.
The information was grabbed from a U.S. State Department cable among those released by the whistle-blowing website Wikileaks.
"CSIS continues to work to keep abreast of the changes in telecommunications and the Internet, and more specifically their use by individuals and groups who pose a security threat to Canada and its interests," said the CSIS statement.

description.hltext_display: 'Heroes' blood drive
description.content:
Argus LeaderThe 16th Annual "Heroes Behind the Badges" competition kicks off Monday with blood drives at the Sioux Falls Police Department and Sioux Falls Fire Rescue Headquarters.The public can donate blood from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. at the Sioux Falls Police Department, 320 W. Fourth St., and at Sioux Falls Fire Rescue Headquarters, 2820 S. Minnesota Ave., from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. The departments will compete to recruit the most blood donors for the community's blood supply.The public can donate at various blood drives hosted by both departments through Jan. 7.
For more information and a complete blood drive schedule for Heroes Behind the Badges, log on to www.cbblifeblood.org or call (605) 331-3222.

description.hltext_display: Fussball: Inter dementiert Trennung von Benitez
description.content: Inter-Chef dementiert Trennung von Benitez Inter Mailands Präsident Massimo Moratti hat Spekulationen über eine Entlassung von Trainer Rafael Benitez zurückgewiesen. „Benitez ist in diesem Moment immer noch Inter-Trainer”, betonte der Chef des italienischen Fußball-Meisters am späten Dienstagabend in Mailand. Meldungen, wonach Inter bereits mit Luciano Spalletti (Zenit St. Petersburg) und dem ehemaligen AC Mailand-Coach Leonardo verhandle, dementierte Moratti. „Ich habe zu keinem Trainer Kontakt aufgenommen”, sagte der Öl-Magnat.

description.hltext_display: Drouot envisage d'ouvrir en nocturne un jour par semaine
description.content:
L'hôtel des ventes Drouot à Paris envisage d'ouvrir en nocturne un jour par semaine, pour permettre aux visiteurs de voir plus longuement en exposition les objets qui seront vendus le lendemain.
photo : Jean-Pierre Muller, AFP
"Nous avons de plus en plus de monde à Drouot. Cinq à six mille personnes se pressent tous les jours dans l'hôtel des ventes", a déclaré mardi à l'AFP Georges Delettrez, président de Drouot Holding.
Actuellement, les portes de l'hôtel des ventes ferment à 18H00. "L'idée est d'étendre ces horaires d'ouverture le jeudi jusqu'à 21H ou 22H, afin que les objets soient montrés sur une durée plus longue", a indiqué Me Delettrez. Toutefois, il n'y aura pas de vente aux enchères le soir, a précisé le commissaire-priseur.
Par ailleurs, Drouot est disposé à "aménager" ses statuts pour permettre aux sociétés de vente volontaires, personnes morales, d'entrer dans son capital alors qu'actuellement seuls les commissaires-priseurs, personnes physiques, sont autorisés à détenir des actions.
Une assemblée générale des actionnaires de Drouot Patrimoine examinera en janvier cette proposition. Si elle est adoptée, "nous aurons fait un grand pas", a considéré Me Delettrez.
Le fonctionnement de Drouot a été la cible de vives critiques après la révélation en décembre 2009 d'une vaste affaire de détournement d'oeuvres d'art au sein de l'hôtel des ventes. Des commissionnaires et un commissaire-priseur ont été mis en examen. L'enquête judiciaire se poursuit.
En revanche, Me Delettrez n'entend pas céder sur la règle qui interdit à un actionnaire de Drouot, quel que soit le montant des actions détenues, de détenir plus de 5% des droits de vote de Drouot Patrimoine.
"En 2002, j'ai été l'initiateur d'un projet visant à permettre à Drouot de rester indépendant, face à des prédateurs financiers. Je n'ai pas envie qu'on ouvre une brèche à nouveau. Nous n'avons pas besoin de financiers", a-t-il dit.

description.hltext_display: Gyurcsány: "mi sem voltunk tökéletesek"
description.author: hvg@hvg.hu
description.content:
"Most tessék mégis megnézni, hogy mi állt, mi áll velünk szemben. Az undorító hatalmi cinizmus ocsmány, dölyfös pöffeszkedése. Ez áll velünk szemben, ez ellen küzdöttünk, amíg volt hozzá erőnk, amíg volt hozzá többségünk" - írja Gyurcsány Ferenc legfrissebb blogbejegyzésében. /* hvg.hu - 200x200 A */ "Elköszönök ettől az évtől. Minek minősítsem? Egyetlen szó csak hazugság lenne, elemzést meg most minek adnék? De azért nem tudom nem megkérdezni: erre vártatok, drága barátaim? Tényleg, ebben reménykedtetek? Abban, hogy bicebóca jogállam leszünk, ha egyáltalán?" - teszi fel kérdéseit a volt kormányfő a blogjában.
Gyurcsány azt írja: "én többször is beszéltem saját felelősségemről. Leghosszabban a Röpiratban. Van, akinek ez is kevés, és talán igaz a kritika, de mégsem látok senkit, aki legalább annyira elvégezte volna a dolgát, mint én. Persze, nekünk, aki vezettük az országot, és kitüntetetten nekem nagy a felelősségünk, ha nem ment minden jól. De hol vannak a Fideszt megértő elemzők, a kétharmadot támogató publicisták, az „egyrészt-másrészt” középen állók (?) vallomásai. Nekik nincs szerepük ebben a förmedvényben?"
"Mert persze, mi sem voltunk tökéletesek. Volt, hogy megbicsaklott jogérzékünk, volt, hogy igazunk keresése közben önmagunk meggyőződése ellen is vétkezhettünk, lehet, hogy mindez igaz. De demokraták maradtunk, tökéletlenek, de demokraták. Hallom mondják, csak azért, mert nem volt elég erőnk hozzá, mert nem volt kétharmadunk. Egy frászt, drága barátaim, egy frászt".

description.hltext_display: 港股成交欠奉 暂以反弹看待
description.content:
在周一涨跌不一。今天内地股市受地产股上涨激励而呈现探底反弹走势，香港股市同样是高开高走的反弹走势。恒生指数早盘轻微高开大约72点后略有下探，随后追随A股涨势，并回升至10天移动平均线附近。最终，恒生指数收盘报22993.86点，上涨354.78点，或1.57%，成交了599.54亿港元；国企指数收盘报12607.43点，上涨198.94点，或1.60%，个股全面回升。
隔夜，芝加哥联储银行公布，11月份全国活动指数为负0.46,10月份的数据由之前公布的负0.28向上修订为负0.25。经济数据并没有给周一的美国股市提供多少指引，而投资者一方面为朝韩局势趋缓感到高兴，另一方面却受到欧洲银行业评级遭到调降的消息影响，美国股市也就继续着各自表现的走势。
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
本周是2010年最后的交易周，由于周五是平安夜，美国股市在本周将交易到周四。在假期因素影响下，市场交投难免清淡，但美国方面仍有多项经济数据会公布，这应该会对圣诞节假期后的美股表现有指引作用。其中，我们应该关注的经济数据是将在周三公布的第三季国内生产总值(GDP)的最终值、成屋销售数据；将在周四发布的11月个人开支、上月耐用品定单、上周首次申领失业救济人数、新屋销售以及12月的消费信心指数等。考虑到过去几周，美国经济数据表现还算不错，反映出美国经济复苏动力正在转强，如果上述即将公布的经济数据表现仍然良好，估计有机会让美国股市继续保持在相对高位运行。
当然，美国经济在联储局的刺激措施呵护下继续着增长势头，是应该要出现的事情，美国财金官员们做了这么多事情，总要有成果才行。虽然当下的美国经济复苏势头看似可以接受，但美国楼市仍未走出谷底，财政赤字规模依然在不断增长中，消费增长也仍旧缓慢，我们对美国经济增长报有的希望可不能太高。现在，国际投行们就纷纷调高美国明年经济增长预测，是否是太乐观的表现呢？况且，最近美国国债息率正逐步回升，我们可以认为是因为投资者看好美国经济以及风险偏好逐渐上升，但如果美国长期国债息率上升太快及太高，对房地产市场的负面影响，可能会逐渐显现出来，这对美国经济复苏是好事？因此，我们得留意美国国债息率上升与股市之间的联动性及幕后真正原因。
再来说下香港股市的表现。港股近期跌幅明显，年度结算、外围股市欠方向及成交清淡，都让大户们有机会上下其手。连日的下跌让好友不论是股票还是衍生工具方面的损失都不算小。今天，内地股市反弹为恒生指数在跌至100天移动平均线后，创造了回升机会，而期指也难得出现升水情况，暂时只能说恒指在支撑线附近得到喘息机会。原则上，恒指仍处在小型下降通道中，若其后市能回升到10天移动平均线上方，再依靠23000点的支撑，恒指跌势或有机会告一段落。不过，港股重新上升还得有成交量配合才行。

description.hltext_display: Weissrussland: Unterstützung für Inhaftierte
description.content: Solidarität mit den Gefangenen - die zeigten über 100 Menschen vor einem Gefängnis im weissrussischen Minsk. Rund 600 Menschen waren inhaftiert worden, weil sie gegen die umstrittene Wiederwahl von Präsident Alexander Lukaschenko protestiert hatten.

description.hltext_display: Thomas J. Iacovacci Jr.
description.content:
Crystal Rock employee
WATERTOWN — Mr. , 70, of 6 Country Drive, died Wednesday, Dec. 15, 2010, at his residence in the presence of his loving family after a brief courageous battle with leukemia. He was the beloved husband of Barbara L. (Teufel) Iacovacci.
Tom was born in Stamford on June 21, 1940, son of the late Thomas J. and Madeline (Antonelli) Iacovacci Sr. He graduated from Stamford High School. He moved from Stamford to Watertown 22 years ago. He worked at Crystal Rock LLC of Watertown for the past 40 years.
He was a member of the Rotary Club of Watertown and was the recipient of the "Paul Harris Fellowship Award." He was a former president of the Watertown Age Group Swim Team. He was an avid golfer and loyal fan of the New York Yankee's and the New York Giants.
Besides his wife of 33 years, he leaves a son, Thomas M. Iacovacci and his wife, Susan, of Stamford; three daughters, Gina Iacovacci of Stamford, Melissa Iacovacci and her husband, Adam Blank, of Norwalk, and Lindsey Iacovacci of Watertown; a brother, James Iacovacci and his wife, Susan, of Brookfield; a sister, Donna Iacovacci-King of Norwalk; four grandchildren, Matthew, Samuel and Raeanne Iacovacci of Stamford, and Emma Blank of Norwalk; and many nieces and nephews.
Arrangements: A funeral service will be held 9 a.m. Saturday at Chase Parkway Memorial/The Albini Family Funeral Home, 430 Chase Parkway, Waterbury. Burial will follow in St. John's Cemetery, Darien. Calling hours are 5 to 8 p.m. Friday at the funeral home.
In lieu of flowers, contributions can be made to: Leukemia and Lymphoma Society, Connecticut Chapter, 372 Danbury Road, Wilton 06820.
For more information and online condolences, visit www.chaseparkwaymemorial.com.
Guestbook » Show Guestbook »Hide Guestbook
marion capizzi wrote on Dec 20, 2010 4:28 PM:
" Tom was a customer of mine at the coffee shop for a lot of years and a very nice man. We had many a conversation about Italy and our love of Italian food. He will be missed. "
Cheryl Membrino wrote on Dec 20, 2010 2:35 PM:
" Barbara,
My thoughts & prayers are with you and your family. I was the Insurance Agent at (Gary's) O'Brien Russo & Quint and spoke to Tom on a regular basis. I always enjoyed our conversations, he was a wonderful man & will be greatly missed.
Cheryl "
Brian Clark wrote on Dec 16, 2010 9:04 PM:
" My world is indeed emptier to know that Tommy Iacovacci is no longer in it. Although it has been a number of years since we've spoken, Tom is very often in my heart and mind. That we were at the opposite ends of the political spectrum is well documented, but the bond that tied us was our passion, and the desire to create a better life for our children and our children's children. These recent tumultuous years have routinely led to my imagining what conversations we might still be having in our mutual effort to create a better world despite the cast of characters that run it.
Politics aside, we had many similar likes and dislikes and laughed out-loud and often about the foibles of life.
A day-in, day-out relationship such as the one I had with Tom at Crystal Rock for thirty years tends to foster the belief that a person will always be around, and I am sorry to have ignored the many opportunities I had to call and say "I'm thinking fondly of you, old friend". Now, it's too late. And my heart aches tonight. I miss you Tom. "
Melissa Lockwood-Gruse wrote on Dec 16, 2010 2:24 PM:
" We were so sorry to hear about Tom's passing. He put up a good fight and you can feel comfort now that he is at peace. Our hearts go out to you and your family.
Sincerely,
Melissa and Ron Gruse "
Kara Stevens Wolf Company wrote on Dec 16, 2010 2:21 PM:
" Barbara - I am deeply sorry to hear about Tom. He was such a kind and friendly man and I really looked forward to seeing him each time I was in Watertown. He always made a point to stop in and say hi to me, which always made my day a little brighter. He will be very missed. "
Sharon Miket wrote on Dec 16, 2010 7:32 AM:
" Barbara,
My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family at this time. May God cradle Tom in His arms until the time you can be together again.
Sharon "
Tom Tracy wrote on Dec 16, 2010 6:07 AM:
" Tommy,
To a great man who I enjoyed working with. We had some great conversation and a little harmless banter when we saw each other. I will miss you. My heart goes out to your family.
RIP "
Jo Bower wrote on Dec 16, 2010 6:05 AM:
" Lindsey,
I was so sorry to hear. My heart and prayers are with you and your family.

description.hltext_display: Bewaffneter Raubüberfall auf Getränkehandel - Räuber plündern die Ladenkassen
description.content: In Berlin-Tempelhof haben am gestrigen Dienstagabend zwei derzeit noch nicht bekannte maskierte Täter einen Getränkemarkt überfallen und ausgeraubt. Die bewaffneten Räuber haben bei dem Überfall auf den Getränkehandel die dort beschäftigte 40 Jahre alte Mitarbeiterin mit einer Schusswaffe bedroht und diese zum Öffnen der Ladenkassen aufgefordert. Die Angestellte kam daraufhin der Aufforderung der Räuber nach. Danach entnahmen die Täter das Bargeld aus den Kassen und ergriffen die Flucht. Bei dem Überfall erlitt die 40-Jährige keine Verletzungen.

description.hltext_display: Liikenteessä kuoli useita tuiskuisen marraskuun aikana
description.content:
Tieliikenteessä kuoli lähes tuplasti enemmän ihmisiä marraskuussa kuin vuosi sitten. Kuolleita oli yhdeksän enemmän ja loukkaantuneita 96 enemmän kuin viime vuonna, kertoo Tilastokeskus.
- Viime vuonna marraskuu oli aika lailla musta. Nyt lumikelit ja liukkaat säät tulivat aiemmin, sanoo aktuaari Raini Östlund Tilastokeskuksesta.
Tieliikenteessä sattui marraskuussa 474 henkilövahinkoon johtanutta onnettomuutta. Niissä loukkaantui yli 600 ihmistä ja kuoli 19.
Kuolleista 15 oli autoilijoita. Lisäksi kuoli kolme jalankulkijaa ja yksi polkupyöräilijä. Valtaosa kuolleista oli miehiä.
Marraskuun kuolleisuusluvut muodostavat vain pienen piikin tilastoissa. Tieliikenteessä kuolleiden määrä on jatkuvasti laskenut viimeisen kahdenkymmenen vuoden ajan, kertoo Tilastokeskus.

description.hltext_display: La Tuta llama a rebeli�n social en Michoac�n
description.content:
MÉXICO, D.F.- Servando Gómez "La Tuta", cabecilla prófugo de La Familia Michoacana, se comunicó con seguidores del grupo criminal para solicitar una especie de rebelión social cobijada en los pueblos de la sierra occidental contra el Estado que ha embestido con soldados y policías en la región para desmantelar el cártel.
"Todos pónganse listos, estén listos con las armas, ténganlas a un ladito, no las abandonen, no abandonen las armas, por favor. Háganlo saber a todos los compañeros que se encuentren en todas partes, todos los encargados de área, son responsables de su área", puntualizó en una frecuencia de radio intervenida.
El narcotraficante de 44 años, nativo del poblado de Arteaga, fue presuntamente grabado por una persona que entregó el audio a una televisora que difundió dos discursos que incluye citas del líder guerrillero argentino, Ernesto "Che" Guevara.
"Hasta la victoria, compañeros", cierra una de las alocuciones también impregnada de alabanzas a Dios y a uno de los fundadores de La Familia, Nazario Moreno, muerto en días pasados durante un enfrentamiento con la Policía Federal cuando ésta ingresó al escondrijo principal de los delincuentes en la zona serrana del estado.
"Es nuestra tierra, si ellos vienen a agredirnos y no entienden, les vamos a tirar, pero ya saben únicamente a quien. Pero no nos vamos a dejar por ningún motivo", advierte.

description.hltext_display: 港股低开高收 50日线料成今年阻力
description.content:
(20日)个别发展，主要是虽然朝鲜半岛局势缓和下来，纾缓市场紧张情绪，但市场忧虑欧洲银行业评级遭下调的消息，影响投资气氛。外围继续牛皮，港股开市高开72点，其后升幅扩大至近300点。午后港股继续发力，一度突破23000点，但收市前未能企稳。恒指全日收报22993点，升354点或1?57%，主板成交近600亿元。国指收报12607点，升198点或1?6%。
分析指法或失三A评级，欧元汇价料暂反弹乏力
年前部分股有望一飞冲天! 秘闻!行情近期将出现逆转
机构资金流向已发生巨变! 主力资金正密谋全新布局
欧洲债务危机持续，评级机构穆迪上周接连出手，先将葡萄牙列入负面观察名单，其后将爱尔兰连降5级。有分析预期，欧元区国家明年可能遭逐个调降，其中有机会的是「二哥」法国。
众所周知，法国及德国为欧元区的两大经济龙头，早前第四经济体西班牙陷入危机已使投资者人心惶惶，如果法国的AAA评级不保，势使欧洲弥漫一片降级恐慌，届时欧元料面对强大沽压，而近日欧元汇价明显反弹乏力，兑美元始终未能重上1?32水平。
港股沽盘昨暂告一段落，欠缺基金参与难再突破
至于港股方面，由于昨日受到南韩演习影响，亚太股市全线下跌，港股一度跌穿22500点。不过，由于昨日午后见到沽盘暂告段落，因此今日港股出现反弹可说是预期之内。但在成交仍然偏低下，反弹幅度算近日较大，相信暂时阻力位在23500点(50日线)，料该水平亦为今年阻力位。因为大部分基金已开始套现锁定利润，现阶段出现粉饰橱窗机会较微，在欠缺基金参与下，大市或再难以突破。
多数零售股今逆市下跌，体育用品股续跑输大市
大市淡静，但今年全年都是焦点的零售股依然受市场注目，因为多只股份跌幅都大于恒指，明显跑输大市，相信是基金沽马潮仍然持续，相信零售股要回升都需要消化上述沽压。此外，体育用用品股仍旧显著受压，相信是与龙头李宁(02331)公布的订单数字出现倒退有关，身为龙头的营运数据下跌，使市场忧虑体育用品市场已到达饱和水平，因此预期体育用品股难免于短线继续跑输大市。

description.hltext_display: Azərbaycan Ombudsman təsisatı Beynəlxalq Ombudsmanlar İnstitutuna institusional üzv qəbul edilib
description.content:
Azərbaycan, Bakı, 22 dekabr /Trend, müxbir K.Zərbalıyeva/
Azərbaycan Ombudsman təsisatı Beynəlxalq Ombudsmanlar İnstitutuna institusional üzv kimi qəbul olunub. Bu barədə Trend-ə çərşənbə günü Ombudsman Aparatının mətbuat xidməti məlumat verib.
Məlumatda bildirilir ki, Azərbaycan ombudsmanı həmin quruma institusional üzvlüklə bağlı müraciət edib. İnsan hüquqlarının müdafiəsi və təmini sahəsində çoxşaxəli fəaliyyəti, innovativ təşəbbüsləri nəzərə alınaraq, Azərbaycan Ombudsman təsisatının müraciətinə müsbət cavab verilib.
Bu, Azərbaycan ombudsmanına Beynəlxalq Ombudsmanlar ailəsinin bərabərhüquqlu üzvü kimi, yenə də Milli İnsan hüquqları təsisatlarının mötəbər toplantılarında, konfranslarda iştirak etmək, insan hüquqlarının müxtəlif aspektləri üzrə əldə olunmuş nailiyyətləri paylaşmaq, fəaliyyət dövrü ərzində qazanılmış təcrübəni beynəlxalq treninq və seminarlarda ekspert qismində çıxış edərək həmkarları ilə böluşmək, eyni zamanda onların təcrübəsindən faydalanmaq imkanı verəcək.
Azərbaycan Ombudsmanı 2003-cü ildən Avropa Ombudsmanlar İnstitutu və Asiya Ombudsmanlar Assosiasiyasının, həmçinin Beynəlxalq Ombudsmanlar İnstitutunun üzvü seçilib.

description.hltext_display: Alberto Aquilani keen to stay with Juventus rather than return to LFC
description.content:
by James Pearce, Liverpool Echo
1
Alberto Aquilani 300
ALBERTO AQUILANI is eyeing Serie A title glory with Juventus and has no desire to return to Liverpool.
The Italian midfielder is on a season-long loan at the Turin outfit who have the option to buy him next summer.
Aquilani has impressed back in his homeland after an injury-ravaged spell with the Reds following a £18million switch from Roma in August 2009.
Juve are flying high in fourth place – just five points behind leaders AC Milan – and Aquilani believes he’s rediscovering his form under the guidance of coach Luigi Delneri.
“I’m feeling fine and the injuries are behind me,” he said.
“I have had some difficult moments but with hard work and the help of those who love me I have overcome them.
“Delneri is an excellent coach, prepares us well and has created an excellent team spirit.
“It hasn’t taken us long to become united as a squad and I believe this will help us enormously.
“If Delneri talks about winning the title then there is a reason. We are going through a good period and have to consolidate this week after week.”
The 26-year-old, whose injury problems and failure to adapt to the physical demands of the Premier League meant he started just 14 games for the Reds, hasn’t looked back since returning to Serie A.
He earned a recall to the Italy squad last month and has helped Juve embark on a 13-game unbeaten run.
Aquilani believes he benefited from his time at Anfield but wants to remain in Turin.
1

description.hltext_display: 'Hay que dejar atr�s el pasado'
description.content:
Cali/efe — El presidente Juan Manuel Santos agradeció el gesto de su homólogo de Ecuador Rafael Correa en estos "momentos difíciles" para Colombia y calificó su visita como la "culminación del proceso de normalización de relaciones" entre ambos países vecinos.
Correa aterrizó en la mañana en la base aérea Marco Fidel Suárez de la ciudad de Cali.
A continuación, los dos gobernantes abordaron un helicóptero hacia el norte del Valle del Cauca, donde visitaron el municipio de La Victoria, anegado desde hace un mes por el desbordamiento del río Cauca y donde entregaron ayuda a sus habitantes. Allí, ambos prometieron "mirar hacia delante" en la nueva etapa iniciada con la reanudación de las relaciones bilaterales, acordada a fines de noviembre pasado y que se completará con la toma de posesión de los respectivos embajadores.
"No se pueden volver a cometer los mismos errores, pero siempre hay que mirar hacia el futuro (y) dejar atrás el pasado", subrayó Correa al recordar el bombardeo militar colombiano contra un campamento de las FARC en Ecuador en marzo de 2008 que provocó la ruptura de las relaciones.
Tanto Correa como Santos confirmaron que se ha incrementado la seguridad en la frontera común para combatir a las FARC y a otros grupos ilegales, pero también coincidieron en que aún falta mucho por hacer.
"Apenas lleguemos a Bogotá, firmamos el beneplácito para el embajador" nombrado por Ecuador, el ex ministro de Educación Raúl Vallejo, anunció Santos desde La Victoria.

description.hltext_display: Hudson man's death 'suspicious'
description.content:
Lincoln County sheriff's officials are investigating the death of a long-time Hudson resident, who died of head trauma Monday.The death of Asaf Sorum is considered suspicious at this point, Lincoln County Sheriff Dennis Johnson said late Tuesday.
"There are certainly some questions that we feel need to be answered regarding how this person received the injuries that he received," Johnson said. Sorum is thought to have suffered the head injury in Hudson, and died later at a Sioux City hospital. An autopsy is being performed by the Iowa Medical Examiner's Office, Johnson said.Two people and Sorum reportedly were at a home in Hudson when the injury occurred, authorities said.Sheriff's officials received a call shortly after 4 p.m. Sunday, and were told the two people who had been at the home were driving Sorum to a hospital, Johnson said.A deputy was dispatched and stopped the car, and an ambulance then took Sorum to the hospital in Hawarden, Iowa.
He was later transferred to the Sioux City, Iowa, hospital."He had lived in Hudson for as long as I can remember," Johnson said. He was known around town as "Ace.""We're hoping that we'll have some more answers about this soon," Johnson said.

description.hltext_display: Nadchodzi koniec solariów?
Japan exports post better growth in November
description.author: TOMOKO A. HOSAKA
description.content:
TOKYO -- Japan's export growth improved for the first time in nine months in November, a possible sign that global demand is turning up again.
Exports from the world's third-largest economy rose 9.1 percent from a year earlier, the government said Wednesday.
While exports have expanded throughout the year, the rate of growth has steadily fallen as overseas demand cooled and the yen rose to 15-year highs. In February, exports jumped more than 45 percent. By October, that had slid to less than 8 percent.
The slowdown triggered widespread concern about the fate of Japan's recovery, which has depended heavily on exports.
The central bank on Tuesday kept interest rates on hold at virtually zero and maintained its cautious assessment of the economy. The recovery "seems to be pausing" and exports are flat, it said.
On Wednesday, the Cabinet Office went a step further in its monthly economic report. It cut its view on exports, describing them as "decreasing moderately."
Companies are worried too, as Europe's ongoing debt problems and possible monetary tightening in China add to the uncertainty. A key central bank survey last week showed that business sentiment fell for the first time in seven quarters.
Some economists predict that Japan's gross domestic product contracted this quarter.
But the latest figures offer a hint of hope for Japan. Goldman Sachs economist Chiwoong Lee is optimistic about 2011 and expects the country's exports to keep improving.
"With assistance from an easier yen, exports should sustain growth on the strength of the U.S. economy," Lee said in a note to clients.
Exports to China, Japan's biggest trading partner, rose 18.3 percent in November from a year earlier, the finance ministry said. Shipments to the European Union climbed 10.1 percent, while those to the U.S. rose a lackluster 1.2 percent.
Robust demand for general machinery, particularly from China, offset declines in electrical machinery such as semiconductors and audiovisual devices.
Imports rose 14.2 percent, shrinking Japan's trade surplus for the month by 55 percent to 162.8 billion yen ($1.9 billion).
Injecting life into Japan's economy is the government's top priority as it faces falling approval ratings.
Last month, it passed a new $61 billion stimulus package with support for small businesses and regional economies. Then last week, Prime Minister Naoto Kan announced plans to cut the country's corporate tax rate by 5 percentage points in a bid to help Japanese businesses stay competitive.
The government on Friday is expected to release a draft budget for the next fiscal year starting April.
If Japan's economy doesn't improve, the government may press the central bank for more help. With huge public debt, Japan has limited room for new stimulus spending.
"The government expects that the Bank of Japan will support the economy by appropriate and flexible monetary policy management while working closely with the government," the Cabinet Office said.

event_or_fact.property: plans to cut the country's corporate tax rate by 5 percentage points in a bid to help Japanese businesses stay competitive
With assistance from an easier yen, exports should sustain growth on the strength of the U.S. economy

description.hltext_display: A pécsiek és az EKF
description.author: hvg@hvg.hu
description.content:
Felkerül-e Pécs Európa kulturális térképére? - ez volt a szakmai tétje a most zárult EKF-évnak. De vajon megváltoztatta-e a város gondolkodását, jobb-e Pécsett élni a programsorozat után? /* hvg.hu - 200x200 A */ � „Ha azt akarjuk, hogy egy hanyatló városba tőke települjön, képzett munkaerő vándoroljon, s ne költözzenek el a fiatalok, akkor érdekesebbé, élettel telibbé, egyedibbé kell változtatnunk a városunkat, hogy ne azt sugározza magáról, hogy hanyatló és tanácstalan, hanem hogy izgalmas és kísérletező.” Ezt az ars poeticát fogalmazták meg nyolc évvel ezelőtt azok a pécsi értelmiségiek, akik kitalálták, hogy Pécsnek pályáznia kellene az Európa Kulturális Fővárosa (EKF) címre.
Ahogy az EKF-év elején készített közvélemény-kutatások is mutatták, kezdetben a tősgyökeres pécsiek többsége is a szkeptikusok táborához tartozott. Ám miközben őket is bosszantotta, hogy például a közterek egyidejű felújítása miatt feldúlt-feltúrt városban már gyalogosan is alig lehetett közlekedni, amolyan dacszövetség kovácsolódott. Egyre többen elégelték meg, hogy a város neve mindig csak negatív előjellel kerül elő, és ez felélesztette a „csak azért is megmutatjuk” érzését – idézte fel a HVG-nek Páva Zsolt polgármester.
Míg a performance-jellegű események, fesztiválok inkább csak a Kispál-generációhoz tartozókat mozgatták meg (a város legújabb kori védjegyévé vált, idei Kossuth-díjas Lovasi András énekes maga is több eseményen működött közre), az év vége felé a pécsiek már a magas kultúrába sorolt eseményekkel is magukra tudták vonni a figyelmet. Azok lettek a legsikeresebbek, amelyekben szerencsésen kapcsolódott össze a pécsi identitás és a világhírnév. Az együvé tartozás, a „jó pécsinek lenni” érzését erősítette – mondták a HVG-nek többen is –, hogy a Pittsburghben élő Gyugyi László hazahozta páratlan Zsolnay-gyűjteményét.
A teljes cikket a HVG karácsonyi dupla számában olvashatja el!

description.hltext_display: WOMEN'S BASKETBALL: Cardinals losing streak reaches four
description.author: Mat Mikesell
description.content:
Finishes trip in Mexico with loss to Nevada
Updated: Wednesday, December 22, 2010 01:12
DN PHOTO DYLAN BUELL
Ty'Ronda Benning looks for room against Butler earlier this season. Benning had 12 points in Ball State's 74-70 loss against Nevada in Mexico.
Ball State finished the Caribbean Classic without a win after a 74-70 loss to University of Nevada Reno Tuesday afternoon.
The Cardinals started the game on a 12-4 run against the Wolfpack but lost the lead halfway through the first half.
After four lead changes in the first half, Ball State went into the locker room trailing 30-27. Ball State had 15 points off turnovers in the first half.
In the second half, Ball State jumped out early again to take a 50-42 lead before Nevada rallied back with a 14-2 run.
In the final minutes of the game, the Cardinals twice tied the game before foul situation allowed the Wolfpack to extend the lead.
Senior forward Emily Maggert made two foul shots with a minute to play to cut the Nevada lead to 72-70 but could not get another basket.
Maggert led the team with another 18-point performance and grabbed seven rebounds. Senior guard Ty'ronda Benning and freshman guard Brandy Woody each scored 12 points. Woody also committed eight turnovers in the game.
The loss to Nevada extends Ball State's losing streak to four games, the longest losing streak of the season.
